en: Although the bodies, speech, and minds of the buddhas have noafflictions,
cn: 佛⾝語意無煩惱，

en: To purify the obscurations of body, speech, and mind of beings,
cn: 為淨有情三⾨障，

en: I offer this ablution to the bodies, speech, and minds of thebuddhas.
cn: ⽽奉沐佛⾝語意，

en: May the obscurations of body, speech, and mind of all beings bepurified.
cn: 有情⾝⼝意得淨。

en: I bathe the sugatas and bodhisattvasI bathe the sugatas and bodhisattvasFrom precious vases that have been filled full
cn: 備諸珍寶瓶，盛滿妙⾹⽔，

en: Of water imbued with many fragrances,Of water imbued with many fragrances,Of water imbued with many fragrances,Accompanied by song and instruments.Accompanied by song and instruments.Accompanied by song and instruments.
cn: 洋溢美歌樂，請佛佛⼦浴。洋溢美歌樂。請佛佛⼦浴。

en: With cloths that are beyond compare and clean,With cloths that are beyond compare and clean,
cn: ⾹熏極潔淨，浴⼱拭其⾝。

en: Well-dyed and most delightfully perfumed.Well-dyed and most delightfully perfumed.
cn: 拭已復獻上，⾹極妙⾊⾐。

en: I drape Samantabhadra, Lokeshvara,I adorn the buddhas, bodhisattvas,Manjushri, and the other noble beingsAnd great, exalted beings as well
cn: 亦以細柔服，最勝莊嚴物，亦以細柔服。最勝莊嚴物。

en: With fabrics that are delicate and softAnd hundreds of the finest ornaments.
cn: 莊嚴普賢尊，⽂殊觀⾃在。

en: Like polishing the purest refined gold,Like polishing the purest refined gold,I apply the finest scents, whose fragrancesI apply the finest scents, whose fragrances
cn: ⾹遍三千界，妙⾹塗敷彼，⾹遍三千界。妙⾹塗敷彼。

en: To the radiant bodies of all sugatas.To the radiant bodies of all sugatas.
cn: 猶如純煉⾦，發光諸佛⾝。猶如純煉⾦。發光諸佛⾝。

cn: 寂天菩薩 著如⽯法師 譯

en: You are without root or location.
cn: 無形顯⾊無狀貌，是中無滅亦無⽣，

en: Unceasing, you do not arise.
cn: 無住亦復根本無，無所緣尊今讚禮。

en: Not abiding, you are beyond location.You are beyond acceptance and rejection.
cn: 以無住故無出⼊，亦復無彼諸分位，

en: You are fully liberated from the six ayatanas.
cn: 已能解脫六處⻑，無所緣尊今讚禮。

en: You have abandoned the real and unreal.
cn: ⼀切法中無所住，有性無性皆遠離，

en: You are fully liberated from the three realms.You comprehend spacelike equality.
cn: 已能出離於三界，虛空平等性中住，

en: You always remain in meditationThroughout all actions,
cn: 恆常安住等持中，⾏住坐臥亦復然，

en: Such as walking, sitting, and sleeping.
cn: 諸威儀事妙肅成，無所緣尊今讚禮。

en: You abide in equality.
cn: 平等⽽來平等去，平等性中妙安住，

en: Your equanimity is undisturbed.
cn: 不壞平等性法⾨，無所緣尊今讚禮。

en: You abide in equality.You rest equally in all dharmas.
cn: ⼤聖善⼊平等性，諸法皆住等引⼼，

en: You have entered the absence of attributes.
cn: 遍⼊無相妙法⾨，無所緣尊今讚禮。

en: Not abiding, you are without concepts.Having developed wisdom, you rest evenly.
cn: ⼤聖無住無所緣，定中⾼積慧峯峻，

en: You have achieved mastery of dharmas.
cn: 普遍諸法得圓成，無所緣尊今讚禮。

en: The languages of all beings,
cn: 眾⽣威儀及⾊相，語⾔⾳聲亦復然，

en: Their forms, and their doings.
cn: 普能⽰現剎那間，無所緣尊今讚禮。

en: You are liberated from name and form.All causes and skandhas have ceased.
cn: ⼤聖已離於名⾊，於蘊界法亦普斷，

en: You have entered the absence of appearances.
cn: 復能善⼊無相⾨，無所緣尊今讚禮。

en: You are without attributes.You have abandoned even their appearance.
cn: ⼤聖善離於諸相，諸相境界亦遠離，

en: You have entered their absence.
cn: 已能善⼊無相⾨，無所緣尊今讚禮。

en: Your genuine thought is free from misapprehensions.Your mind does not abide in conceptuality.
cn: 無所思惟無分別，淨意亦復無所住，

en: You are without mental engagement; you do not think.
cn: 無諸作意無念⽣，無所緣尊今讚禮。

en: Like space, you are beyond location.You are without impediment or elaboration.
cn: 譬如虛空無含藏，已離戲論無所著，

en: Space is without center or end.The nature of Buddhas is like that.
cn: 譬如虛空無中邊，諸佛法性亦如是，

en: You have transcended the three times.
cn: 已能超越三世⾨，無所緣尊今讚禮。

en: The characteristic of space is Buddha.Space is without characteristics.
cn: 諸佛猶如虛空相，即此虛空亦無相，

en: You are liberated from cause and result.
cn: 已能解脫事及因，無所緣尊今讚禮。

en: You have neither self-fixation nor words.You are beyond apprehension, like the moon in water.
cn: ⼀切法中無依⽌，如⽔中⽉無所取，

en: Ayatanas, or dhatus.
cn: ⼤聖不依⽌蘊法，界處諸法亦復然，

en: You are liberated from the two extremes.
cn: ⼤聖已離於⼆邊，亦復斷除於我⾒，

en: You have abandoned all that is not Dharma.
cn: ⾊相名數已解脫，亦復遠離不正法，

en: You have neither taking nor giving.
cn: 無取無捨平等⼼，無所緣尊今讚禮。

en: You comprehend the realization of all dharmas.
cn: 已能超越諸魔法，⼀切法中悉通達，

en: You have become free from obscurations.
cn: 妙⼊無障礙法⾨，無所緣尊今讚禮。

en: They also do not speak of nonexistence.
cn: 正智不說諸法有，亦復不說諸法無，

en: You plant everywhere the victory banner of the vehicles.
cn: 聖不依⽌於⼆法，久已摧折我慢幢，

en: You are liberated from duality and nonduality.
cn: 解脫⼆無⼆法⾨，無所緣尊今讚禮。

en: You are inconceivable and incomparable.
cn: 不可譬喻不可思，無所緣尊今讚禮。⼤聖無轉無發悟，⼀切過失悉遠離，

en: Your conduct is always led by wisdom.
cn: 智為先導遍所⾏，無所緣尊今讚禮。

en: Your wisdom is tranquil and undefiled.
cn: 無漏淨念最微妙，實不實法悉了知，

en: You are without location or thought.
cn: 亦無繫著無思惟，無所緣尊今讚禮。

en: Fully knows the minds of all beings.
cn: ⼤聖於⼼無所緣，⽽能遍知⼀切⼼，

en: You have become unobscured.
cn: 無障礙法已圓明，無所緣尊今讚禮。

en: Concepts and minds
cn: ⼤聖於⼼無所緣，亦復⾃性無所有，

en: You have achieved inconceivable equality.
cn: 無⼼平等得圓成，無所緣尊今讚禮。

en: Your wisdom, which has no location,
cn: ⼤聖不依於智法，⽽能遍觀諸剎⼟，

en: The actions of all beings.
cn: ⼀切眾⽣⾏亦然，無所緣尊今讚禮。

en: You know with omniscience all dharmas.
cn: 於⼀切法正遍知，無所緣尊今讚禮。

en: All dharmas are like illusions.Illusion itself is nonexistent.
cn: 知⼀切法皆如幻，即此幻亦無所有，

en: You are liberated from illusory dharmas.
cn: 已能解脫幻法⾨，無所緣尊今讚禮。

en: Although buddhas act in the world,
cn: 正覺雖⾏於世間，亦不依⽌於世法，

en: You do not have mundane thoughts.
cn: 復無世間分別⼼，無所緣尊今讚禮。

en: You are the empty pointing out emptiness.
cn: 空與⾮空聖所宣，無所緣尊今讚禮。

en: With illusory samadhiThrough the illusionlike samadhi,You emanate great magical illusions.
cn: 現⼤神通起化事，悉依如幻三摩地，

en: You have entered nondifferentiation.
cn: 離種種性遍⼊⾨，無所緣尊今讚禮。

en: Neither many nor one,
cn: 了知⾮⼀⾮多性，若近若遠無所轉，

en: You are beyond raising and placing.
cn: 無⾼無下平等⼼，無所緣尊今讚禮。

en: Through the vajralike samadhiAnd through the vajralike samadhi,In one instant you achieved buddhahood.
cn: ⾦剛喻定現在前，⼀剎那中成正覺，

en: You rest in unreality.
cn: 遍⼊無對礙法⾨，無所緣尊今讚禮。

en: You, our guide, are at all times unmoving.You have realized nirvana.
cn: 雖知涅槃無所動，亦於三世善調伏，

en: You have diverse means.
cn: 具⾜種種⽅便⾨，無所緣尊今讚禮。

en: You have become skilled.
cn: 於彼⼀切眾⽣類，善解智慧及⽅便，

en: Without attributes, you are spontaneously present.Without elaborations, you are flawless.
cn: ⼤聖無相無發悟，已離戲論無對礙，

en: Without appearances, you are without “mine.”
cn: 無我故無對礙⼼，無所緣尊今讚禮。

en: Without thoughts, you are faultless.
cn: 已離疑惑無過失，無我我所亦復然，

en: Knowing all, you are omniscient.
cn: 於⼀切處正遍知，無所緣尊今讚禮。

en: strengths.
cn: 稽⾸⼗⼒度煩惱，

en: I prostrate to the fearless one who bestows fearlessness.
cn: 稽⾸廣⼤施無畏，

en: Who has comprehended the unshared dharmas.
cn: 稽⾸世間尊勝者。

en: bonds.
cn: 稽⾸能斷眾結縛，

en: I prostrate to you, the guide of weary beings.
cn: 稽⾸救世諸苦尊，

en: I prostrate to you who have entered samsara but do not abidewithin it.
cn: 稽⾸不住於⽣死。

en: You abide among all beings,
cn: 普遍通達眾⽣⾏，

en: But your mind is utterly detached.
cn: 於⼀切處離意念，

en: You have destroyed all attributes.
cn: 聖師種種無上句，

en: There is nothing to which you aspire.
cn: 稽⾸無緣度染海，

en: Teacher, your state is unsurpassable satisfaction.
cn: 普遍善觀諸相⾨，

en: I prostrate to you who have crossed the rivers nonconceptually.
cn: 於諸願求無所有。

en: The power of the Buddha is inconceivable.
cn: 佛⼤威⼒不思議，

en: I prostrate to the nonabiding equality of space.
cn: 猶如虛空無依⽌，

en: I prostrate to you who have the best of all attributes.
cn: 稽⾸廣持勝德⾨，

en: I prostrate to you who are like a glorious mountain.Praises from The Sutra Requested by NobleRashtrapala
cn: 稽⾸猶如妙⾼勝。

en: Immaculate, there’s none like you in the three worlds.worlds.Immaculate, there’s none like you in the three worlds.I prostrate to and praise you whose great wisdom is peerless.
cn: 功德智慧無等倫，永離三有常清淨。

en: That ushnisha is unseen; no one is your equal.Shakyamuni, the space between your brows is beautified by ahair.
cn: 我觀無等無邊佛，眉間毫光普照耀。

en: In your compassion, you see all beings.
cn: 如軍那花及朗⽉，過於珂雪與硨磲，

en: Your excellent eyes are like blue utpalas.I prostrate to the Buddha, whose eyes are stainless.
cn: 如是皎潔⼤光明，除滅眾⽣諸罪暗。

en: By teaching Dharma, you tame beings.I prostrate to you whose speech is soft and smooth.
cn: 怨親無⼆平等觀，有情無情俱獲益。

en: Your excellent teeth are very strong, like vajras.
cn: ⾆如⾚銅⽽廣⻑，或覆⾯輪或⼤千，

en: You tame beings with your smile.
cn: 應機流演⼤⼩乘，普救世間諸有苦。

en: Its light illuminates a hundred realms.
cn: 我今頂禮如來⿒，四⼗⿑密⽩如珂，

en: Brahma, Indra, and the lokapalas of the worldAre overwhelmed, bhagavan, by your light.
cn: 四⽛鋒利若⾦剛，俱發光明濟群品。

en: You shake the earth, its mountains, and the wilderness.
cn: 通達性相甚深⽂，破暗除迷百千剎。

en: You have a peerless form.
cn: 如是蒙光苦惱除，俱出輪迴⽣死海。

en: You delight in all generosity, gentleness, and giving.
cn: 我佛雙⾜如⿅王，⾏似⽜王舉步穩，

en: I prostrate to the most compassionate one.
cn: 下⾜登涉地⾯時，⼭川⼤地俱震動。

en: You are always delighted by generosity and morality.
cn: 我佛⾝相妙端嚴，⽪膚柔軟真⾦⾊，

en: You have the light-rays of meditation and wisdom.I prostrate to you who have peerless pristine wisdom.
cn: ⼀切世間無有⽐，眾⽣⾒者無厭⾜。

en: Your proclamations to your retinue are like a lion’s.
cn: 佛於過去百千劫，能捨⼀切利眾⽣，

en: You are the king of healers and overcome the three stains.
cn: 俱令離苦出樊籠，我今歸禮⼤慈⽗。

en: Shakyamuni, your body, speech, and mind are completely pure.
cn: 佛以法財施⼀切，持戒忍辱精進修，

en: kalavingka.realms.
cn: 禪定智慧悉圓明，我今禮佛無等智。

en: Through not knowing emptiness, peace, birthlessness,We wander in migration.
cn: ⾝⼝意業無塵染，三界無著出⽔蓮，

en: With compassion and hundredfold skillful means,You establish us in the knowledge of them.
cn: 梵⾳深妙如梵天，迦陵頻伽聲莫⽐。

en: You always regard beings who are tormentedBy hundreds of sicknesses such as desire.
cn: 我今禮佛出三有，常觀世界如幻化，

en: Sugata, you liberate hundreds of beings.You are a peerless physician.
cn: 如夢如電⾮久停，無⼈無我無眾⽣。

en: You have seen the suffering of the hundred illnessesOf birth, aging, death, the oppression of misery,
cn: 法本空寂無有⽣，不能知悟隨輪轉，

en: Loss, and wailing with grief.Shakyamuni, you compassionately liberate us.
cn: 垂慈廣為諸眾⽣，⽅便隨機宣妙法。

en: All beings spin like a cartwheel throughThe migrations of animals, hungry ghosts, and hell.
cn: ⼤聖醫王眾所歸，恆治⽼死憂悲惱，

en: To the foolish, the blind, and those without protector,You show the sublime path.
cn: 如是普利諸眾⽣，各令善逝⼈天路。

en: What you, our peerless leader, have taught
cn: 如是慈悲牟尼主，常憫輪迴六道中，

en: The lords of Dharma, for beings’ benefit.
cn: 如蟻循環無了期，引彼愚盲得正路。

en: You are gentle, soft, and supremely pleasing.You are far more delightful than even Brahma.
cn: 如是依法證菩提，具法⾃在利世間，

en: Your speech surpasses even that ofGandharvas, kinnaras, and the greatest divine maidens.
cn: 如佛所說⼋正道，聞者適悅⽣敬愛。

en: Truthful, honest, and of inexhaustible means,Your speech has innumerable qualities of training.
cn: 佛聲微妙過梵天，巘達哩與緊那羅，

en: Hearing it, hundreds of trillions of beingsAre placed in the peace of the three vehicles.
cn: 及諸天⼥美妙⾳，⾮似佛聲多⽅便。

en: Those who present offerings to you gain the many pleasures
cn: 清淨語⾳功德普，眾⽣隨類各得聞，

en: They become rulers of humanity who benefit beings,
cn: 如是為乘趣菩提，⼀⼀離凡得解脫。

en: Those who generate faith in you, peerless one,Become rulers of the four continents, supreme chakravartins.
cn: 種種上妙物供佛， 獲得最上⼈天福，

en: They gain the seven most precious things.
cn: 或為帝主或宰⾂，常受⼤富⼤快樂。

en: The veneration of you, Buddha,
cn: 或作⾦輪王四洲，具⾜千⼦及七寶，

en: Of Others’ Emanations, and of Beyond Disputation.
cn: 恆⾏⼗善利世間，⼀切眾⽣皆隨順。

en: You dispel the many sufferings of beings.Anyone who venerates, sees, or hears you, peerless one,
cn: 或為護世或忉利，或處夜摩睹史陀，

en: Will achieve the result,The ultimate state, free from aging and death.
cn: 及⾄他化與梵天，皆因供養諸佛得。

en: You turn this world away from the path of negativity.
cn: 如是⾒佛及聽法，俱能出離諸苦惱，

en: Bhagavan, you place beings on the arya path,Happy, peaceful, and immaculate.
cn: 令彼不墮惡道中，安樂寂靜無塵染。

en: You treasure of merit, the merit accumulatedThrough your veneration will never be gone.
cn: 佛能安住諸世間，求福之者皆令福，

en: Until their achievement of awakening, the merit of those
cn: 如是獲福⻑相續，俱胝多劫不可盡。

en: They will continually experience the delight of Others’Emanations.They will become pure and virtuous.
cn: 最上微妙莊嚴剎，眾⽣⽣者無塵垢，

en: In body, speech, and mind.
cn: ⾝光照耀勝天⼈，⾝⼝意業俱清淨。

en: People who venerate the Buddha will attainMany qualities in this and other lives,
cn: 成就種種功德相，名聞流佈諸世間，

en: Such as higher births, liberation, human happiness,And the treasure of all beings’ merit.
cn: 天上⼈間俱敬愛，彼⼈供養諸佛得。

en: Are continuously proclaimed in the sugatas’ assemblies.
cn: ⼀切徒眾悉歸依，無不愛樂慈悲相。

en: I prostrate to you, the best of human beings,Who end contagion and free beings, who are delightful to see,
cn: 我今稽⾸⼈中尊，湛然不動無為相，

en: Who have the utmost compassion,The Bhagavan whose faculties are tranquil and who delights inpeace.
cn: 令我獲證五神通，住⽴虛空伸讚佛。

en: The five clairvoyances and abide in space.
cn: 稽⾸無畏佛世尊，無垢清淨出世間，

en: May I become heroic and equal to the sugatas.
cn: 所有稱讚諸功德，迴施⼈天成正覺。

en: Worshipped by gods, humans, and nagas,
cn: 編註：此中譯為梵譯中古譯，因此句數和藏⽂略有出⼊，但意義相同。

en: I prostrate to you who have affection for beings,Who intend that they encounter happiness and avoid suffering,
cn: 合⼼及離⼼，不離利益⼼，

en: Who intend that they never be without joy,Who intend the benefit and happiness of all.
cn: 憐憫諸眾⽣，救世我頂禮。

en: You, Shakyamuni, are definitely liberated from all obscurations.You overwhelm all worlds.
cn: ⼀切障解脫，⼀切世間勝，

en: I prostrate to you, whose mind is liberated.
cn: ⼀切處遍滿，⼼脫我頂禮。

en: Of all sentient beings.
cn: 能遮彼惑起，亦能害彼惑，

en: You destroy kleshas yet are kindTo those with kleshas. I prostrate to you.
cn: 染汙諸眾⽣，悲者我頂禮。

en: Spontaneously present, you are withoutAttachment or impediment
cn: 無功⽤無著，無礙恆寂靜，

en: And always in meditation.I prostrate to you who answer all questions.
cn: 能釋⼀切疑，勝智我頂禮。

en: Regarding what is to be taught—words and meaning—And the means of teaching—speech and wisdom.
cn: 說者無礙慧，善說我頂禮。

en: Coming among us, you know our conduct.I prostrate to you who clearly teach us,
cn: 能去及能聞，知⾏知來去，

en: In our own languages,What has been, what will be, and emancipation.
cn: 令彼得出離，教授我頂禮。

en: Causes great awe.
cn: ⽣起淨信⼼，⽅便我頂禮。

en: I prostrate to you who have masteryOver taking birth, remaining, and letting go,
cn: 取捨住變化，定智得⾃在，

en: And over emanation,Transformation, samadhi, and pristine wisdom.
cn: 如此四清淨，世尊我頂禮。

en: I prostrate to you who conquerThe maras that deceive beings
cn: ⽅便及歸依，清淨與出離，

en: About means, refuge, purity,And the mahayana emancipation.
cn: 於此破四誑，降魔我頂禮。

en: I prostrate to you who, by demonstrating the benefitOf yourself and others through pristine wisdom,
cn: 於智亦於斷，於離亦於障，

en: Relinquishment, emancipation, and the overcomingOf impediments, are unrivaled by tirthikas.
cn: 能說⾃他利，摧邪我頂禮。

en: You are beyond observance and free from forgetfulness.In assemblies, you teach at ease.
cn: 在眾極治罰，⾃無所護故，

en: You have relinquished the two aspects of affliction.I prostrate to you who gather assemblies.
cn: 離⼆染正住，攝眾我頂禮。

en: Omniscient one,Whether you are moving or remaining still,
cn: ⾏住⼀切處，無⾮⼀切智，

en: You are never other than omniscient.I prostrate to you who have the authentic meaning.
cn: 由斷⼀切習，實義我頂禮。

en: In benefiting beings,You are never untimely.
cn: 利益眾⽣事，隨時不過時，

en: Your deeds are always meaningful.I prostrate to you who are never forgetful.
cn: 所作恆無謬，不忘我頂禮。

en: You regard every world during
cn: 晝夜六時觀，⼀切眾⽣界，

en: You have great compassion.I prostrate to you whose intention is to bring benefit.
cn: ⼤悲具⾜故，利益我頂禮。

en: I prostrate to you who, in your conduct,Realization, pristine wisdom, and activity,
cn: 由⾏及由得，由智及由業，

en: Shravakas and pratyekabuddhas.
cn: 於⼀切⼆乘，最上我頂禮。

en: You attained the all-encompassingGreat awakening of the trikaya.
cn: 三⾝⼤菩提，⼀切種得故，

en: Resolve the doubts of all beings.
cn: 眾⽣諸處疑，能除我頂禮。

en: No wrongdoing, no defilements, and no indolence;
cn: 無著及無過，無穢亦無息，

en: You who never waver;You who are without complexity toward all dharmas.Prostrations to the Hundred Lives
cn: 無動無戲論，清淨我頂禮。

en: namo shākyamunayeNAMO ŚHĀKYAMUNAYE
cn: 南無釋迦牟尼耶

en: I prostrate to the giver to the tigress, Śhibi, Kosala,The two merchants, the rabbit,
cn: 餵⻁⼫毗憍薩羅，⼆商主與捨⾝兔，

en: Agastya, the giver of flesh,
cn: 阿給思達慈⼒王，普渡太⼦供施者，

en: The austere one, and the merchant;
cn: 鷓鴣⽰酒害富⼦，苦⾏者與⼤商主。

en: Awakening, the king of swans, Mahābodhi,The monkey, the śharabha,
cn: 菩提鵝王⼤菩提，忍辱猴與舍羅婆，

en: The ruru, the monkey king, Kṣhāntivādī,Brahma, the elephant: these ten;
cn: ⿅與猴王忍辱⾔，梵天⼤象⼗數等。

en: The water buffalo, the woodpecker,
cn: 明⽉鐵屋⽣出離，⽔⽜啄⽊⿃獅王，

en: The captain, Suvarna, Kundha,The outcaste, and Yaśhaprabha: these ten;
cn: 舵⼿⾦⾊王昆達，劣族稱明⽐丘⼗。

en: The householder, Lamplight, the rabbit,
cn: ⻑者燈明王兔⼦，⻑解王與⼆童⼦，

en: Padma, Lokananda: these ten;
cn: 恆威施樂悅⽿光，蓮華世喜王等⼗。

en: Brahmadatta, the seeker of Dharma, Jñānavatī,Jalavāhan, Ādarśhamukha,
cn: 梵施尋道具智⼥，降⽔童⼦與鏡⾯，

en: Gośhalīwarta, Kumāra, the naga king,The beaver, and the rishi: these ten;
cn: ⽜圈⽣靜慧⻘年，⿓王⽔瀨梵志⼗。

en: The two compassionate ones, Jyoti,
cn: 具悲⼆者星童⼦，帝釋婆羅舞蹈⼥，

en: Māndhatā, the naga king,
cn: 我乳轉輪王⿓王，健碩獅王雲童⼗。

en: Bhāsvara, the Brahmin, the gambler,Peśhala, the elephant,
cn: 具明梵志博奕者，和順者與六⽛象，

en: Udayanaḥ, Dhanika, Somanandī,Ākāśha, and Śhrisena: these ten;
cn: 烏佗夷具寶喜⽉，虛空瑞部王等⼗。

en: Mahāsattva, Chandraprabha,Śhivi, the Brahmin, Sadāparibhuta,
cn: ⼤勇者與⽉光王，⼫毗梵志⻑忍辱，

en: The lion, the captain, Sudhana,
cn: 獅⼦舵⼿與善財，酥夏德⽡福德⼒，

en: Suprabha, the rishi, Ketumati,Śhyāmaka, Sūryamala,
cn: 妙光梵志與頂慧，⻘藍以及舍⽇鬘，

en: The camel, Nemi, Utpala,And the two bodhisattvas: these ten.
cn: 駝驢輪圍⻘蓮⾯，⼆⼤菩薩等有⼗。

en: I prostrate to you, the Buddha who perfected the qualities of thetwelve deeds,Who left Tushita, entered the womb, were born,
cn: 降臨住胎與誕⽣，⼯巧技藝與出離，

en: Mastered crafts, disported, renounced the world,Engaged in austerities, approached the bodhi tree,
cn: 苦⾏臨樹降魔軍，正覺說法與涅槃，

en: Turned the Wheels of Dharma, and passed into nirvana.
cn: 佛⾏功德究竟者，佛陀尊前我頂禮。

en: May I, like you, perfect the qualities
cn: 願我如尊為利他，佛⾏功德究竟得。

en: Skilled in means, from compassion you took birth as a Shakyan;Through skill and compassion you took birth in the Shakyaclan,You vanquished Mara’s forces while others could not.You conquered Mara’s forces while others could not.
cn: 善巧慈悲⽣於釋迦族，摧伏他⼈難伏之魔軍，⽅智⼤悲釋⽒⽣，摧破無勝⼤魔軍，

en: Your body resplendent as a golden Mount Meru,Your body resplendent as a golden Mount Meru,
cn: 威儀赫赫⾝似⾦須彌，釋迦佛之⾜蓮前頂禮。

en: It’s you who at first roused the mind of enlightenment,Then perfected the accumulations of merit
cn: 世尊⾸先⽣起菩提⼼，隨後圓滿福慧⼆資糧，

en: I praise you who are the protector of wanderers.
cn: 此時所作佛⾏極廣⼤，眾⽣依怙尊前我讚嘆。

en: You benefited gods, then knowing it was timeTo tame humans, you came down from heaven as an elephant.
cn: 利益諸天了知調伏機，⾃天⽽降如巨象降臨，

en: Of the Queen Mahamaya: I prostrate to this deed.
cn: 親⾒種性⽽後⽅進⼊，天⼥幻化⺟胎我頂禮。

en: When ten months had passed, you, son of the Shakyas,Were born in the auspicious grove of Lumbini.
cn: 圓滿⼗⽉懷胎釋迦⼦，吉祥藍毗尼園誕⽣時，

en: Of the family of enlightenment: I prostrate to this deed.
cn: 梵天因陀咸禮彼勝記，決定菩提種性我頂禮。

en: A youth with great strength, a lion among men,You showed your great prowess at Angamagadha.
cn: ⼤⼒童⼦彼乃⼈中獅，昂卡摩竭陀國顯技藝，

en: You vanquished all people inflated with arrogance.You are without rival: I prostrate to this deed.
cn: 凡夫驕慢⾒眾咸摧折，世尊舉世無匹我頂禮。

en: A retinue of queens. Thus through means that were skillful,You governed your kingdom: I prostrate to this deed.
cn: 世尊深明善巧⽅便法，以此護衛國家我頂禮。

en: You saw the affairs of samsara are pointlessAnd left your household, going off in the sky.
cn: 洞察輪迴諸⾏無實義，逃離家宅漫遊於虛空，

en: Near the Stupa of Great Purity, you by yourselfWent forth to ordain: I prostrate to this deed.
cn: 清淨佛塔之前逕⾃⾏，完全出離之⾏我頂禮。

en: With the thought to accomplish enlightenment through effort,For six years you practiced austerities on the banks
cn: 作意由精進⾏證菩提，尼連禪河河畔六年間，

en: You gained the supreme dhyana: I prostrateto this deed.
cn: 難⾏苦⾏精進達彼岸，獲致殊勝禪定我頂禮。

en: As your efforts from beginningless time had a purpose,
cn: 無始以來具義精進故，摩竭陀國菩提聖樹下，

en: Unmoving you sat and manifestly awakenedTo perfect enlightenment: I prostrate to this deed.
cn: ⽰現不動⾦剛跏趺坐，圓成正等正覺我頂禮。

en: You soon with compassion regarded all wanderersAnd in Varanasi and other great places
cn: 以⼤悲⼼迅疾視眾⽣，於⿅野苑等殊勝聖地，

en: Into the three vehicles: I prostrate to this deed.
cn: 轉妙法輪凡諸所化眾，皆安置於三乘我頂禮。

en: The six tirthika teachers, Devadatta, and others.The Sage triumphed in battle: I prostrate to this deed.
cn: 擴摩吉之境內降魔眾，能仁勝諸戰⾾我頂禮。

en: Your qualities unparalleled in the three realms,In Shravasti you displayed wondrous miracles.
cn: 於三有中以無⽐功德，於舍衛國⽰現⼤神通，

en: All gods and humans make you great offerings.You spread the teachings: I prostrate to this deed.
cn: 天⼈⼀切眾⽣咸供養，法教廣為流佈我頂禮。

en: To the Dharma, on Kushinagar’s good, clean ground
cn: 為散逸眾迅疾惕勵故，於拘⼫城清淨⼤地上，

en: You departed the deathless, vajralike bodyAnd passed to nirvana: I prostrate to this deed.
cn: 無死⾦剛之⾝壞滅已，契⼊寂滅涅槃我頂禮。

en: In that very place you left many relics—The eight parts of your remains: I prostrate to this deed.
cn: 世尊化現眾多舍利⼦，靈⾻分作⼋份我頂禮。

en: As many as appear, excepting none,As many as appear, excepting none,As many as appear, excepting none,
cn: 所有⼗⽅世界中，三世⼀切⼈獅⼦，所有⼗⽅世界中，三世⼀切⼈獅⼦，所有⼗⽅世界中，三世⼀切⼈獅⼦，

en: In the three times in worlds of ten directionsIn the three times in worlds of ten directionsIn the three times in worlds of ten directions
cn: 我以清淨⾝語意，⼀切遍禮盡無餘。我以清淨⾝語意，⼀切遍禮盡無餘。

en: With the power of this prayer for excellent conduct,With the power of this prayer for excellent conduct,With the power of this prayer for excellent conduct,I fully prostrate to all victors withI fully prostrate to all victors withI fully prostrate to all victors with
cn: 普賢⾏願威神⼒，普現⼀切如來前，普賢⾏願威神⼒，普現⼀切如來前，普賢⾏願威神⼒，普現⼀切如來前，

en: With all the victors right before my mind.With all the victors right before my mind.
cn: ⼀⾝復現剎塵⾝，⼀⼀遍禮剎塵佛。

en: All sorts of flowers, canopies of flowers,Flower arrangements radiant with light,
cn: 放⼤光明嚴飾華，種種微妙華雲海，

en: Diverse flowers spread everywhere,I offer to those great beings, the buddhas.I offer to those great beings, the buddhas.I offer to those great beings, the buddhas.I offer to those great beings, the buddhas.I offer to those great beings, the buddhas.I offer to those great beings, the buddhas.I offer to those great beings, the buddhas.I offer to those great beings, the buddhas.I offer to those great beings, the buddhas.I offer to those great beings, the buddhas.
cn: 如是妙華普周遍，廣⼤供養作佛事。

en: All sorts of incense, canopies of incense,Incense arrangements radiant with light,
cn: 放⼤光明塗⾹獻，種種塗⾹妙雲海，

en: I offer to those great beings, the buddhas.I offer to those great beings, the buddhas.I offer to those great beings, the buddhas.I offer to those great beings, the buddhas.I offer to those great beings, the buddhas.I offer to those great beings, the buddhas.I offer to those great beings, the buddhas.I offer to those great beings, the buddhas.I offer to those great beings, the buddhas.I offer to those great beings, the buddhas.Diverse incense spread everywhere,
cn: 如是塗⾹普周遍，廣⼤供養作佛事。

en: I offer to those great beings, the buddhas.I offer to those great beings, the buddhas.I offer to those great beings, the buddhas.I offer to those great beings, the buddhas.I offer to those great beings, the buddhas.I offer to those great beings, the buddhas.I offer to those great beings, the buddhas.I offer to those great beings, the buddhas.I offer to those great beings, the buddhas.I offer to those great beings, the buddhas.Diverse fragrances spread everywhere,
cn: 種種微妙⾹雲海，廣⼤供養作佛事。

en: All sorts of garlands, canopies of garlands,Garland arrangements radiant with light,
cn: 放⼤光明鬘嚴飾，種種微妙鬘雲海，

en: I offer to those great beings, the buddhas.I offer to those great beings, the buddhas.I offer to those great beings, the buddhas.I offer to those great beings, the buddhas.I offer to those great beings, the buddhas.I offer to those great beings, the buddhas.I offer to those great beings, the buddhas.I offer to those great beings, the buddhas.I offer to those great beings, the buddhas.I offer to those great beings, the buddhas.Diverse garlands spread everywhere,
cn: 如是妙鬘普周遍，廣⼤供養作佛事。

en: I offer to those great beings, the buddhas.I offer to those great beings, the buddhas.I offer to those great beings, the buddhas.I offer to those great beings, the buddhas.I offer to those great beings, the buddhas.I offer to those great beings, the buddhas.I offer to those great beings, the buddhas.I offer to those great beings, the buddhas.I offer to those great beings, the buddhas.I offer to those great beings, the buddhas.
cn: 如是妙⾹普周遍，廣⼤供養作佛事。

en: All sorts of fabrics, canopies of fabrics,Fabric arrangements radiant with light,
cn: 放⼤光明嚴飾⾐，種種微妙⾐雲海，

en: I offer to those great beings, the buddhas.I offer to those great beings, the buddhas.I offer to those great beings, the buddhas.I offer to those great beings, the buddhas.I offer to those great beings, the buddhas.I offer to those great beings, the buddhas.I offer to those great beings, the buddhas.I offer to those great beings, the buddhas.I offer to those great beings, the buddhas.I offer to those great beings, the buddhas.Diverse fabrics spread everywhere,
cn: 如是妙⾐普周遍，廣⼤供養作佛事。

en: Parasol arrangements radiant with light,
cn: 放⼤光明嚴飾蓋，種種微妙蓋雲海，

en: I offer to those great beings, the buddhas.I offer to those great beings, the buddhas.I offer to those great beings, the buddhas.I offer to those great beings, the buddhas.I offer to those great beings, the buddhas.I offer to those great beings, the buddhas.I offer to those great beings, the buddhas.I offer to those great beings, the buddhas.I offer to those great beings, the buddhas.I offer to those great beings, the buddhas.Diverse parasols spread everywhere,
cn: 如是妙蓋普周遍，廣⼤供養作佛事。

en: All sorts of jewels, canopies of jewels,Jewel arrangements radiant with light,
cn: 放⼤光明寶嚴飾，種種微妙寶雲海，

en: I offer to those great beings, the buddhas.I offer to those great beings, the buddhas.I offer to those great beings, the buddhas.I offer to those great beings, the buddhas.I offer to those great beings, the buddhas.I offer to those great beings, the buddhas.I offer to those great beings, the buddhas.I offer to those great beings, the buddhas.I offer to those great beings, the buddhas.I offer to those great beings, the buddhas.Diverse jewels spread everywhere,
cn: 如是妙寶普周遍，廣⼤供養作佛事。

en: All sorts of lotuses, canopies of lotuses,Lotus arrangements radiant with light,
cn: 放⼤光明蓮華嚴， 種種蓮花妙雲海，

en: I offer to those great beings, the buddhas.I offer to those great beings, the buddhas.I offer to those great beings, the buddhas.I offer to those great beings, the buddhas.I offer to those great beings, the buddhas.I offer to those great beings, the buddhas.I offer to those great beings, the buddhas.I offer to those great beings, the buddhas.I offer to those great beings, the buddhas.I offer to those great beings, the buddhas.Diverse lotuses spread everywhere,
cn: 如是妙花普周遍，廣⼤供養作佛事。

en: All sorts of ornaments, canopies of ornaments,Ornamental arrangements radiant with light,
cn: 放⼤光明瓔珞嚴，種種瓔珞妙雲海，

en: I offer to those great beings, the buddhas.I offer to those great beings, the buddhas.I offer to those great beings, the buddhas.I offer to those great beings, the buddhas.I offer to those great beings, the buddhas.I offer to those great beings, the buddhas.I offer to those great beings, the buddhas.I offer to those great beings, the buddhas.I offer to those great beings, the buddhas.I offer to those great beings, the buddhas.Diverse ornaments spread everywhere,
cn: 如是瓔珞普周遍，廣⼤供養作佛事。

en: Those banners white, yellow, red, blue,
cn: 放⼤光明幢莊嚴，彼幢⻘⿈具⾚⽩，

en: And of diverse colors and array:
cn: 無數妙寶眾莊嚴，眾幢嚴飾彼佛剎。

en: Parasols decorated by diverse nets of jewels,Well-draped with ribbons, banners,
cn: 種種嚴飾摩尼網，懸繒幡蓋妙花鬘，

en: And nets of little bells resounding with the buddhas’ speech:I hold these over the tathagatas’ heads.
cn: 垂珠瓔珞演佛⾳，持蓋常在如來上。

en: From the palms of my hands I present inconceivable offerings.
cn: 假使供養⼀如來，⼿⾃供給不可數，

en: I offer them in the same way to all buddhas without exception.
cn: 如是盡諸⼀切佛，此仙變化三摩地。

en: I make fine offerings to the tathagatas,To the True Dharma, the immaculate jewel,
cn: 為持珍寶⼼，我今供如來，

en: And to the oceans of qualities, bodhisattvas.As many fruits and flowers as there are,
cn: 無垢妙法寶，佛⼦功德海。鮮花與珍果，

en: Whatever kinds of medicine exist,However many jewels there are in the world,
cn: 種種諸良藥，世間珍寶物，

en: All clean and pleasant waters there may be,Mountains of jewels and likewise forest groves
cn: 悅意澄淨⽔。巍巍珍寶⼭，

en: Bushes adorned with ornamental flowers,
cn: 靜謐宜⼈林，花嚴妙寶樹，

en: And trees whose branches bow with splendid fruit,Incense and perfumes as from divine worlds
cn: 珍果垂枝樹。世間妙芳⾹，

en: And so forth, wish-fulfilling trees, jewel trees,
cn: 如意妙寶樹，⾃⽣諸莊稼，

en: All ornaments that are fit to be offered,And lakes and pools bedecked with lotuses
cn: 及餘諸珍飾，蓮花諸湖泊，

en: Where lovely swans have most delightful calls—Everything that’s unowned extending to
cn: 悅吟美天鵝，浩瀚虛空界，

en: The edges of the realms of infinite space—I imagine taking these and offer them well
cn: ⼀切無主物，意緣敬奉獻，

en: To the sages, greatest of beings, and their offspring,Sublime and greatly compassionate recipients.
cn: 牟尼諸佛⼦，祈請勝福⽥，

en: Think of me lovingly; accept these from me.
cn: 悲憫納吾供。福薄我貧窮，

en: May the protectors, who think of others’ weal,
cn: 無餘堪供財，祈求慈怙主，

en: Forevermore I offer all my bodiesTo the victorious ones and to their offspring.
cn: 願以吾⾝⼼，恆獻佛佛⼦，

en: O Sublime Beings, accept me entirely,And I will be your dedicated servant.
cn: 懇請哀納受，我願為尊僕。

en: Not fearing existence, I will benefit beings.
cn: 尊既慈攝護，利⽣無怯顧，

en: I offer the great beings I venerate,The lords of sages, every fragrant flower—
cn: 於諸勝供處，供以⾹蓮花，

en: Mandarava, lotus, jasmine, and so forth—And pleasing garlands strung attractively.
cn: 曼陀⻘蓮花，及諸妙花鬘。

en: I also offer billowing clouds of incenseFilled with the sweetest, most enchanting scents.
cn: 亦獻最勝⾹，⾹溢結⾹雲，

en: Replete with an assortment of food and drink.
cn: 復獻諸神饈，種種妙飲⾷。

en: Further, I make an offering of jeweled lampsArranged in rows on golden lotuses.
cn: 亦獻⾦蓮花，⿑列珍寶燈，

en: On a paved floor anointed with perfume.
cn: ⾹敷地⾯上，散佈悅意花。

en: I offer those who are compassionateNumberless palaces adorning the sky,
cn: 廣廈揚讚歌，懸珠耀光澤，

en: Beautifully glowing with strings of pearls and jewelsAnd echoing with melodious songs of praise.
cn: 嚴空無量飾，亦獻⼤悲主。

en: Beauteous, jeweled parasols with golden staves,
cn: ⾦柄撐寶傘，周邊綴美飾，

en: Their rims festooned with winsome ornaments.
cn: 形妙極莊嚴，亦展獻諸佛。

en: And furthermore, may there extendClouds of attractive offerings,
cn: 別此亦獻供，悅⽿美歌樂，

en: That soothe all beings’ sufferings.
cn: 願息有情苦，樂雲常住留。

cn: ⼀切聲聞辟⽀佛等，亦以善根如是迴向，

en: nyen pa’amI entirely dedicate the roots of virtue of all beings who have so
cn: 若有眾⽣⼀彈指頃聞佛法聲，

en: to all shravakas, and to all pratyekabuddhas, in the same way
cn: 學佛教者之所迴向。

en: the bodhisattva will entirely dedicate all roots of virtue to allbeings.
cn: ⼜彼菩薩亦以善根迴向⼀切眾⽣，

en: I entirely dedicate them so that all beings develop enthusiasmfor unsurpassable awakening.
cn: 令彼眾⽣樂欲增⻑無上菩提迴向，

en: I entirely dedicate them so that they may be without craving forany composite.
cn: 乃⾄所有飲⾷、⾐服、臥具、病緣、醫藥，

en: My clothing, food, medicine, possessions,
cn: 於⾝承事去來坐⽴，

en: my actions, such as sitting down or entering a place;
cn: 種種作業住律儀道，

en: the places in which I live; my calm demeanor;
cn: 於律儀道不⽣瞋恚，

en: massaging, and washing my body;
cn: 密緻諸根⽽或⾃⾝消息，

en: bending and straightening my limbs; glancing and looking;
cn: 按摩等事，眾味飲⾷，
若觀不觀，

en: there is none of this whatsoever that is not dedicated toomniscience.
cn: 若臥若覺，⽽復⾃⾝詣彼承事。

en: I entirely dedicate the giving of even a morsel or handful of rice
cn: 以要⾔之，彼畜⽣趣者，

en: I entirely dedicate it to the freeing of those beings from theiranimal births,
cn: 彼畜⽣者，是為苦海，

en: from that basis of suffering, from that root of suffering,
cn: 是苦遷流，是苦邊際，是苦根本，

en: Generating bodhichitta, I will persevere in awakening.
cn: 不墮輪迴，離諸險難，得佛妙樂，

en: I turn away from the wilderness of samsara.
cn: 現前無礙，超輪迴海，永斷相續，

en: Pacify the suffering of lower states, the suffering of Yamas,
cn: ⾦光明⿎出妙聲，遍⾄三千⼤千界，

en: In the three realms of these billion worlds.
cn: 能滅三塗極重罪，及以⼈中諸苦厄。

en: Through the sound of this great drum,Through the sound of this great drum,Pacify all the deprivation in the world.
cn: 由此⾦⿎聲威⼒，永滅⼀切煩惱障，

en: Just as Shakyamuni is fearless and pacifies fear,
cn: 斷除怖畏令安穩，譬如⾃在牟尼尊。

en: Just as in samsara, the omniscient Shakyamuni
cn: 佛於⽣死⼤海中，積⾏修成⼀切智，

en: May all beings become oceans of qualities,With the qualities of samadhi and the branches of awakening.
cn: 能令眾⽣覺品具，究竟咸歸功德海。

en: Through the sound of this great drum,Through the sound of this great drum,May all beings have the melody of Brahma.
cn: 由此⾦⿎出妙聲，普令聞者獲梵響，

en: May they reach the sublime awakening of buddhas.May they turn the virtuous wheel of Dharma.
cn: 證得無上菩提果，常轉清淨妙法輪。

en: May they abide for innumerable kalpas.
cn: 住壽不可思議劫，隨機說法利群⽣，

en: May they conquer kleshas and dispel suffering.May they pacify desire, anger, and ignorance.
cn: 能斷煩惱眾苦流，貪瞋癡等皆除滅。

en: May those beings who abide in lower states,
cn: 若有眾⽣處惡趣，⼤⽕猛焰周遍⾝，

en: And the words, “I prostrate to the Buddha.”
cn: 若得聞是妙⿎⾳，即能離苦歸依佛。

en: May all beings remember hundreds, thousands,
cn: 皆得成就宿命智，能憶過去百千⽣，

en: May they always recollect Shakyamuni.May they hear his vast teachings.
cn: 悉皆正念牟尼尊，得聞如來甚深教。

en: Through the sound of this great drum,Through the sound of this great drum,May beings always be in the company of buddhas.
cn: 由聞⾦⿎勝妙⾳，常得親近於諸佛，

en: May they abandon wrongdoing.May they engage in virtuous actions.
cn: 悉能捨離諸惡業，純修清淨諸善品。

en: May the sufferings of all beingsIn all worlds be pacified.
cn: ⼀切世界諸眾⽣，悉皆離苦得安樂，

en: May all beings with incomplete faculties or damaged limbsGain complete faculties today.
cn: 所有諸根不具⾜，令彼⾝相皆圓滿。

en: Be quickly freed from sickness.May they acquire healthy faculties and vigor.
cn: 咸令病苦得消除，諸根⾊⼒皆充滿。

en: May those threatened with death at the hands of kings,brigands, or enemies
cn: 若犯王法當刑戮，

en: Be freed from the hundred unbearable dangers that threatenthem.
cn: 無有歸依能救護。

en: May all those who are beaten, bound in fetters,Placed in desperate situations,
cn: 若受鞭杖枷鎖繫，種種苦具切其⾝，

en: Agitated by thousands of kleshas,And undergoing unbearable dangers and misery
cn: 無量百千憂惱時，逼迫⾝⼼無暫樂，

en: Be liberated from their fetters.May the beaten be freed from being beaten.
cn: 皆令得免於繫縛，及以鞭杖苦楚事，

en: May the killed regain life.May the desperate become fearless.
cn: 將臨刑者得命全，眾苦皆令永除盡。

en: Acquire food and drink.
cn: 若有眾⽣飢渴逼，令得種種殊勝味，

en: May the blind see various forms.May the deaf hear pleasant sounds.
cn: 盲者得視聾者聞，跛者能⾏啞能語。

en: May impoverished beings find treasure.
cn: 貧窮眾⽣獲寶藏，倉庫盈溢無所乏，

en: May all beings become happy and haveAbundant wealth, grain, and various precious things.
cn: 皆令得受上妙樂，無⼀眾⽣受苦惱。

en: May no being be tormented by sensations of suffering.May all beings become pleasing to see,
cn: ⼀切⼈天皆樂⾒，容儀溫雅甚端嚴，

en: With fine forms, beauty, and auspiciousness.May they always have many sources of happiness.
cn: 悉皆現受無量樂，受⽤豐饒福德具。

en: Clay drums, hand-drums, lutes, tamburas,Springs, lakes, ponds, pools,
cn: 念⽔即現清涼池，⾦⾊蓮花泛其上。

en: Golden lotuses and utpalas with their petals,Food, drink, clothing, wealth, pearls, jewels,
cn: 隨彼眾⽣⼼所念，飲⾷⾐服及床敷，

en: May the sound of suffering be unheard in any world.May no being see any other as disagreeable.
cn: 勿令眾⽣聞惡響，亦復不⾒有相違，

en: May all beings be vibrant
cn: 所受容貌悉端嚴，各各慈⼼相愛樂。

en: May whatever excellence there is in the human world
cn: 世間資⽣諸樂具，隨⼼念時皆滿⾜，

en: May the result of merit be perfectly complete.
cn: 所得珍財無吝惜，分布施與諸眾⽣。

en: May incense, garlands, balms,
cn: 燒⾹末⾹及塗⾹，眾妙雜花⾮⼀⾊，

en: Fall from the trees throughout the three times.May beings gather and enjoy them.
cn: 每⽇三時從樹墮，隨⼼受⽤⽣歡喜。

en: May offerings be presented throughout the ten directionsTo all innumerable tathagatas,
cn: 普願眾⽣咸供養，⼗⽅⼀切最勝尊，

en: Bodhisattvas, shravakas,
cn: 三乘清淨妙法⾨，菩薩獨覺聲聞眾。

en: May all beings abandon inferior births.May they transcend the eight unleisured states.
cn: 常願勿處於卑賤，不墮無暇⼋難中，

en: May they attain sublime, royal leisure.May they always acquire the company of buddhas.
cn: ⽣在有暇⼈中尊，恆得親承⼗⽅佛。

en: May they always be born in high families.
cn: 願得常⽣富貴家，財寶倉庫皆盈滿，

en: May they be well adorned for kalpasBy fame, renown, form, and color.
cn: 顏貌名稱無與等，壽命延⻑經劫數。

en: May all women become powerful persons forever.
cn: 悉願⼥⼈變為男，勇健聰明多智慧，

en: In front of precious trees.
cn: 處妙琉璃獅⼦座，恆得親承轉法輪。

en: With body, speech, or mind,
cn: 我⾝語意，所成功德，

en: Through those roots of virtue,I will reach supreme awakening.
cn: 以此善業，迴向菩提。

en: I will manifest the buddhas’ qualities.I will radiate the qualities of the buddhas.I will liberate beings from the ocean of samsara.I will free beings from the ocean of samsara.
cn: 成佛無上，功德光明，令諸眾⽣，度三有海。

en: The powers, the strengths, and the branches of awakening,The powers, the branches of awakening,I will accomplish the sublime ten strengths.
cn: 不可思議，諸陀羅尼，⼗⼒世尊，我當成就。

en: Through the merit of doing that,
cn: 從此⾏我德，已作及未作，

en: Unsurpassable bodhichitta.
cn: 因此願眾⽣，皆發菩提⼼。

en: May all beings have stainless, complete faculties.
cn: 度⼀切障難，圓滿無垢根，

en: May they have freedom of conduct.May they have good livelihood.
cn: 具淨命相應，願彼⾃在事。

en: Jewels in their hands
cn: ⼀切具無邊，與寶⼿相應，

en: And unlimited resources of all typesThat will remain as long as samsara lasts.
cn: 窮後際無盡，願眾⽣如此。

en: May all women becomePowerful persons forever.
cn: 願⼀切⼥⼈，皆成勝丈夫，

en: Awareness and means.
cn: 恆於⼀切時，明⾜得圓滿。

en: May all beings have luster,Fine form, and magnificence.
cn: 勝形貌威德，好⾊他愛⾒，

en: May they be pleasing to see, healthy,Strong, and long-lived.
cn: 無病⼒辦具，⻑壽願彼然。

en: May they all become skillful,Free from all suffering,
cn: 解脫諸苦畏，⼀向歸三寶，

en: Immersed in the Three Jewels,And have the great wealth of Buddhadharma.
cn: 於⽅便善巧，佛法為⼤財。

en: May they be adorned by love, compassion, joy,Impartiality in the face of affliction,
cn: 慈悲喜淨捨，恆居四梵住，

en: Generosity, morality, patience, diligence,Meditation, and wisdom.
cn: 施戒忍精進，定智所莊嚴。

en: May they complete the accumulations,Manifest the signs and marks,
cn: 圓滿福慧⾏，相好光明照，

en: And continuously traverseThe ten inconceivable levels.
cn: 願彼難思量，⾏⼗地無礙。

en: Have supreme love for all beings.
cn: 解脫⼀切過，願我愛眾⽣。

en: And wishes of all beings.
cn: 圓滿⼀切善，及眾⽣所樂，

en: Who are saddened through fear
cn: 若他有怖畏，⼀切時及處，

en: Become utterly fearless
cn: 由唯憶我名，得脫⼀切苦。

en: Become fully lucid, undisturbed, and sane.May their perfect awakening be certain.
cn: 極靜無紛擾，願彼定菩提。

en: The five clairvoyances.
cn: 願我得五通，恆隨⼀切⽣，

en: Bring benefit and happiness to all beings.
cn: 願我恆能⽣，眾⽣善及樂。

en: Be all at once and forever preventedFrom harming anyone.
cn: 願遍斷彼惡，如理令修善。

en: Like earth, water, fire, and air;Wherever the elements of earth, water,Like medicine; and like trees in the wilderness;
cn: 如地⽔⽕⾵，野藥及林樹，

en: May I cherish beings like life itself.
cn: 願我於他愛，如念⾃壽命，願我念眾⽣，萬倍勝⾃愛。

en: May their wrongdoing ripen for me.
cn: 願彼所作惡，於我果報熟，是我所⾏善，於彼果報熟。

en: Remain unliberated,
cn: ⼀⼈未解脫，於有隨⽣道，

en: Unsurpassable awakening, may I remain.Click here for Mandala Offerings with the Thirty-Seven FeaturesXIX. The Branch of Aspirations
cn: 願我為彼住，不先取菩提。

en: With all the victors right before my mind.With all the victors right before my mind.
cn: ⼀⾝復現剎塵⾝，⼀⼀遍禮剎塵佛。

en: Upon one atom, numerous as atomsUpon one atom, numerous as atomsAre buddhas in the midst of bodhisattvas.Are buddhas in the midst of bodhisattvas.
cn: 於⼀塵中塵數佛，各處菩薩眾會中，於⼀塵中塵數佛，各處菩薩眾會中，

en: Completely fill the entire dharma expanse.Completely fill the entire dharma expanse.
cn: 無盡法界塵亦然，深信諸佛皆充滿。

en: With sounds from oceans of melodious traitsWith sounds from oceans of melodious traitsI extol the qualities of all the victors,I extol the qualities of all the victors,
cn: 各以⼀切⾳聲海，普出無盡妙⾔辭，各以⼀切⾳聲海，普出無盡妙⾔辭，

en: Whose oceans of praiseworthiness will neverWhose oceans of praiseworthiness will never
cn: 盡於未來⼀切劫，讚佛甚深功德海。

en: I also imagine offering to all victorsI also imagine offering to all victorsThat which is vast and unsurpassable.That which is vast and unsurpassable.
cn: 我以廣⼤勝解⼼，深信⼀切三世佛，

en: The power of faith in excellent conduct.The power of faith in excellent conduct.
cn: 悉以普賢⾏願⼒，普遍供養諸如來。悉以普賢⾏願⼒，普遍供養諸如來。

en: Under the influence of desire, hatred,Under the influence of desire, hatred,Under the influence of desire, hatred,And ignorance, I have committed wrongsAnd ignorance, I have committed wrongsAnd ignorance, I have committed wrongs
cn: 我昔所造諸惡業，皆由無始貪瞋癡，

en: Pratyekabuddhas, learners, and nonlearners,Pratyekabuddhas, learners, and nonlearners,Pratyekabuddhas, learners, and nonlearners,Of all the wanderers of the ten directions.Of all the wanderers of the ten directions.Of all the wanderers of the ten directions.
cn: ⼀切如來與菩薩，所有功德皆隨喜。

en: Wakened to buddhahood and found detachment—Wakened to buddhahood and found detachment—Wakened to buddhahood and found detachment—
cn: ⼗⽅所有世間燈，最初成就菩提者，⼗⽅所有世間燈，最初成就菩提者，

en: The lamps of the worlds of the ten directions—The lamps of the worlds of the ten directions—The lamps of the worlds of the ten directions—To turn the Wheel that cannot be surpassed.XVII. The Branch of Supplicating to RemainTo turn the Wheel that cannot be surpassed.To turn the Wheel that cannot be surpassed.
cn: 我今⼀切皆勸請，轉於無上妙法輪。

en: To aid and bring well-being to all wanderers.Click here for:The Dedication from The Light of Gold SutraTo aid and bring well-being to all wanderers.To aid and bring well-being to all wanderers.
cn: 唯願久住剎塵劫，利樂⼀切諸眾⽣。

en: I dedicate to enlightenment whateverWe dedicate to enlightenment whateverI dedicate to enlightenment whateverSlight merit I have gathered from prostrating,Slight merit we have gathered from prostrating,Slight merit I have gathered from prostrating,
cn: 所有禮讚供養福，請佛住世轉法輪，所有禮讚供養福，請佛住世轉法輪，

en: And offering, confessing, and rejoicing,By thus aspiring for excellent conductOffering, confessing, rejoicing,And offering, confessing, and rejoicing,
cn: 隨喜懺悔諸善根，迴向眾⽣及佛道。

en: And those who dwell in worlds in ten directions.
cn: 我隨⼀切如來學，修習普賢圓滿⾏，

en: And swiftly awaken to enlightenment.
cn: 供養過去諸如來，及與現在⼗⽅佛。

en: Directions become vast, completely pure,
cn: 未來⼀切天⼈師，⼀切意樂皆圓滿，

en: And filled with bodhisattvas and with victorsWho’ve gone beneath the lordly Bodhi Tree.
cn: 我願普隨三世學，速得成就⼤菩提。

en: Be in harmony; may their hopes be fulfilled.
cn: 眾會圍遶諸如來，悉在菩提樹王下。

en: May I perform the conduct of awakeningAnd in all realms remember my past lives.
cn: ⼗⽅所有諸眾⽣，願離憂患常安樂，

en: May I go forth from home to homelessness.
cn: 獲得甚深正法利，滅除煩惱盡無餘。

en: May I act with pure, stainless disciplineMay I act with pure, stainless disciplineThat never lapses and is free of faults.That never lapses and is free of faults.
cn: 常得出家修淨戒，無垢無破無穿漏。

en: May I teach Dharma in every single language—The language of the gods, the tongue of nagas,
cn: 天⿓夜叉鳩槃荼，乃⾄⼈與⾮⼈等，

en: The tongues of yakshas, kumbandhas, and humans,And all the languages that beings speak.
cn: 所有⼀切眾⽣語，悉以諸⾳⽽說法。

en: And may I never forget bodhichitta.May I never forget bodhichitta.
cn: 勤修清淨波羅蜜，恆不忘失菩提⼼，

en: May I completely purify all wrongsWithout exception that are obscurations.
cn: 滅除障垢無有餘，⼀切妙⾏皆成就。

en: Unhindered like the sun and moon in space.
cn: 猶如蓮華不著⽔，亦如⽇⽉不住空。

en: I’ll act to benefit all beings throughoutThe reaches of the realms and the directions.
cn: 如是經於剎塵劫，⼗⽅利益恆無盡。

en: And bring enlightened conduct to perfection.
cn: 我常隨順諸眾⽣，盡於未來⼀切劫，

en: I’ll teach the Dharma of this excellent conduct
cn: 恆修普賢廣⼤⾏，圓滿無上⼤菩提。

en: Always may I associate with those
cn: 所有與我同⾏者，於⼀切處同集會，

en: As one in conduct and in aspirations.
cn: ⾝⼝意業皆同等，⼀切⾏願同修學。

en: And may I always meet those spiritual friends
cn: 所有益我善知識，為我顯⽰普賢⾏，

en: By teaching conduct that is excellent.I’ll never do anything to disappoint.
cn: 常願與我同集會，於我常⽣歡喜⼼。

en: Protectors in the midst of bodhisattvas,
cn: 願常⾯⾒諸如來，及諸佛⼦眾圍遶，

en: Never discouraged, in all future aeons,In every future aeon, never discouraged.
cn: 於彼皆興廣⼤供，盡未來劫無疲厭。

en: And purify excellent conduct, too.
cn: 究竟清淨普賢道，盡未來劫常修習。

en: Cycling through all existences, may IGain merit and wisdom inexhaustible
cn: 我於⼀切諸有中，所修福智恆無盡，

en: And be a bottomless store of all means, prajñā,Samadhi, emancipations, and good traits.
cn: 定慧⽅便及解脫，獲諸無盡功德藏。

en: As atoms, and within those realms are buddhas
cn: ⼀塵中有塵數剎，⼀⼀剎有難思佛，

en: Beholding them, I’ll act for awakening.
cn: ⼀⼀佛處眾會中，我⾒恆演菩提⾏。

en: Of oceans of the buddhas of three times—I’ll enter these and act for oceans of aeons.
cn: 佛海及與國⼟海，我遍修⾏經劫海。

en: Of which one tone has oceans of great traits,
cn: ⼀切如來語清淨，⼀⾔具眾⾳聲海，

en: The pure melodic tones of all the buddhasThat are just as all beings are inclined.
cn: 隨諸眾⽣意樂⾳，⼀⼀流佛辯才海。

en: I enter also through the strength of mindThose inexhaustible tones of the speech
cn: 三世⼀切諸如來，於彼無盡語⾔海，

en: Of all victorious ones who will appear
cn: 恆轉理趣妙法輪，我深智⼒普能⼊。

en: Through just one single instant I will enter
cn: 我能深⼊於未來，盡⼀切劫為⼀念，

en: The lions among humans of three times.
cn: 我於⼀念⾒三世，所有⼀切⼈獅⼦，

en: I’ll always enter their sphere through the powerOf the emancipation of illusions.
cn: 亦常⼊佛境界中，如幻解脫及威⼒。

en: Upon a single atom I’ll produce
cn: 於⼀⽑端極微中，出現三世莊嚴剎，

en: I’ll enter the arrays of buddha realms.
cn: ⼗⽅塵剎諸⽑端，我皆深⼊於嚴淨。

en: Who will become enlightened, turn the Wheel,And demonstrate nirvana’s final peace.
cn: 究竟佛事⽰涅槃，我皆往詣⽽親近。

en: The power of vehicles in every way;
cn: 速疾周遍神通⼒，普⾨遍⼊⼤乘⼒，

en: The power of conduct, every quality;The power of love, pervasive everywhere;
cn: 智⾏普修功德⼒，威神普覆⼤慈⼒。

en: The power of merit, virtue everywhere;The power of pristine wisdom, free of attachment;
cn: 遍淨莊嚴勝福⼒，無著無依智慧⼒，

en: The powers of wisdom, means, and of samadhi,
cn: 定慧⽅便諸威⼒，普能積集菩提⼒。

en: Perfect all powers of excellent conduct.
cn: 降伏⼀切諸魔⼒，圓滿普賢諸⾏⼒。

en: And liberate completely oceans of beings.
cn: 普能嚴淨諸剎海，解脫⼀切眾⽣海，

en: And totally realize the oceans of wisdom.
cn: 善能分別諸法海，能甚深⼊智慧海。

en: And act for oceans of aeons undiscouraged.
cn: 親近供養諸佛海，修⾏無倦經劫海。

en: I shall awaken through excellent conduct
cn: 三世⼀切諸如來，最勝菩提諸⾏願，

en: The special aspirations of the victorsOf the three times for the awakened conduct.
cn: 我皆供養圓滿修，以普賢⾏悟菩提。

en: Is the one named Samantabhadra.
cn: ⼀切如來有⻑⼦，彼名號⽈普賢尊，

en: Who’s called Samantabhadra by his name.That I might train and follow their example.
cn: 我今迴向諸善根，願諸智⾏悉同彼。

en: Just as the Good Wise One makes dedications
cn: 願⾝⼝意恆清淨，諸⾏剎⼟亦復然，

en: For purity of conduct and pure realms,
cn: 如是智慧號普賢，願我與彼皆同等。

en: I’ll act upon Manjushri’s aspirations.
cn: 我為遍淨普賢⾏，⽂殊師利諸⼤願，

en: Never discouraged, in all future aeons,I’ll complete all these deeds without exception.
cn: 滿彼事業盡無餘，未來際劫恆無倦。

en: May I have conduct beyond any measureAnd qualities, too, that cannot be measured.
cn: 我所修⾏無有量，獲得無量諸功德，

en: Dwelling in conduct that’s immeasurable,I’ll know their each and every emanation.
cn: 安住無量諸⾏中，了達⼀切神通⼒。

en: And likewise to the ends of sentient beings,
cn: ⽂殊師利勇猛智，普賢慧⾏亦復然，

en: Up through the ends of karma and afflictions,Thus far the ends are of my aspirations.
cn: 我今迴向諸善根，隨彼⼀切常修學。

en: Adorned with precious jewelry to the victors,
cn: 三世諸佛所稱歎，如是最勝諸⼤願，

en: Or give the best divine and human pleasures
cn: 我今迴向諸善根，為得普賢殊勝⾏。

en: If someone hears this king of dedicationsOne single time, develops faith, and feels
cn: 願我臨欲命終時，盡除⼀切諸障礙，

en: A longing for supreme enlightenment,That is the most supreme, exalted merit.
cn: ⾯⾒彼佛阿彌陀，即得往⽣安樂剎。

en: Someone who makes this prayer for excellent conductIs one who will abandon lower realms.
cn: 我既往⽣彼國已，現前成就此⼤願，

en: Such people have abandoned harmful friends.They also will see Amitabha soon.
cn: ⼀切圓滿盡無餘，利樂⼀切眾⽣界。

en: They’ll gain well what they need, live easily;They will be welcome in this human life.
cn: 彼佛眾會咸清淨，我時於勝蓮華⽣，

en: Before a long time passes they themselvesWill also be just like Samantabhadra.
cn: 親篤如來無量光，現前授我菩提記。

en: If those who, under the power of not knowing,Have done one of the five heinous misdeeds
cn: 蒙彼如來授記已，化⾝無數百俱胝，

en: Recite this prayer for excellent conduct,It quickly will be fully purified.
cn: 智⼒廣⼤遍⼗⽅，普利⼀切眾⽣界。

en: They will have pristine wisdom, beauty, signs,A good complexion, and good family.
cn: 乃⾄虛空世界盡，眾⽣及業煩惱盡，

en: Invincible to maras and non-Buddhists,In all three worlds they will be given offerings.
cn: 如是⼀切無盡時，我願究竟恆無盡。

en: Defeat all maras and their hordes, awakenTo enlightenment, and turn the Wheel of Dharma.
cn: 最勝安樂施天⼈，經⼀切剎微塵劫。

en: If one should memorize or teach or writeThis aspiration for excellent conduct,
cn: 若⼈於此勝願王，⼀經於⽿能⽣信，

en: Only the Buddha knows how that will ripen—
cn: 求勝菩提⼼渴仰，獲勝功德過於彼。

en: The brave Manjushri knows things as they are,As does in the same way Samantabhadra.
cn: 即常遠離惡知識，永離⼀切諸惡道，

en: Who’s called Samantabhadra by his name.That I might train and follow their example.I fully dedicate all of these virtues
cn: 速⾒如來無量光，具此普賢最勝願。

en: All the victorious ones of the three timesAcclaim this dedication as supreme.
cn: 此⼈善得勝壽命，此⼈善來⼈中⽣，

en: With this, then, I completely dedicate
cn: 此⼈不久當成就，如彼普賢菩薩⾏。

en: I shall see Amitabha right before me
cn: 誦此普賢⼤願王，⼀念速疾皆消滅。

en: Once I have gone there, may these aspirationsAll become manifest in their entirety.
cn: 族姓種類及容⾊，相好智慧咸圓滿，

en: I will fulfill them all without exception—
cn: 諸魔外道不能摧，堪為三界所應供。

en: I’ll take birth in a beautiful, great lotus.
cn: 速詣菩提⼤樹王，坐已降伏諸魔眾，

en: I also will receive a prophecyDirectly from the victor Amitabha.
cn: 成等正覺轉法輪，普利⼀切諸含識。

en: When I’ve received the prophecy from him,
cn: 若⼈於此普賢願，讀誦受持及演說，

en: With many billions of emanations.
cn: 果報唯佛能證知，決定獲勝菩提道。

en: And offering, confessing, and rejoicing,By thus aspiring for excellent conductOffering, confessing, rejoicing,And offering, confessing, and rejoicing,May any little merit I have gathered
cn: 若⼈誦此普賢願，我說少分之善根，

en: Make all the virtuous aspirations ofAll beings come true within a single instant.
cn: ⼀念⼀切悉皆圓，成就眾⽣清淨願。

en: Through the incomparable infinite meritThus gained through dedicating excellent conduct,
cn: 我此普賢殊勝⾏，無邊勝福皆迴向，

en: Achieve the supreme realm of Amitabha!
cn: 普願沈溺諸眾⽣，速往無量光佛剎。

en: May this supreme, great king of aspirations
cn: 以此普賢⼤願王，利益無邊有情眾，

en: Fulfilling this text Samantabhadra adorns—
cn: 成就莊嚴普賢⾏，願諸惡趣悉清淨。

en: And also to the bodhisattvas,
cn: 我今歸命禮，⼗⽅⼀切佛，

en: Sages who have the divine eye.I prostrate to the shravakas.
cn: 菩薩聲聞眾，⼤仙天眼者。

en: Which blocks all paths to lower realms,
cn: 亦禮菩提⼼，遠離諸惡道，

en: Reveals the path to higher realms,And leads to freedom from age and death.
cn: 能得⽣天上，乃⾄證涅槃。

en: Because my mind was overpowered,
cn: 若我作少罪，隨⼼之所⽣，

en: The buddhas and confess them all.
cn: 今對諸佛前，懺悔令除滅。

en: Performing the three types of actions
cn: 我今⾝⼝意，所集諸功德，

en: Become the seed of my omniscience—May my enlightenment be inexhaustible.
cn: 願作菩提因，當成無上道。

en: The offerings given to the buddhas
cn: ⼗⽅國⼟中，供養如來者，

en: In the realms of the ten directions,
cn: 及佛無上智，我今盡隨喜。

en: I confess all wrongdoing.I confess all my wrongdoingWith a mind overpowered by kleshas.
cn: 有罪悉懺悔，是福皆隨喜，

en: May I gain supreme pristine wisdom.
cn: 我今禮諸佛，願成無上智。

en: The ten directions to awakenTo great, supreme enlightenment.
cn: 我今稽⾸禮，願速證菩提。

en: After sublime enlightenment,The maras and their hordes subdued,
cn: 得證菩提已，摧伏於魔軍，

en: Liberate beings from suffering.
cn: 常願住世間，無量俱胝劫，

en: For infinite millions of aeons.
cn: 擊於⼤法⿎，度脫苦眾⽣。

en: Bound tight by the cords of existence.
cn: 我沒於欲泥，貪繩之所繫，

en: Supreme of gods and humans, look
cn: 種種多纏縛，願佛垂觀察。

en: Those who have been mentally stained.
cn: 眾⽣雖垢重，諸佛不厭捨，

en: Be freed from the ocean of existence.Free beings from the ocean of existence!May they, with kind and loving hearts,
cn: 願以⼤慈悲，度脫⽣死海。

en: Those who have passed, and those to come.May I perform acts of awakening.
cn: 所⾏菩薩道，我今願修學。

en: And liberate the beings of the six realms.
cn: 具⾜波羅蜜，成就六神通，

en: May I realize the six clairvoyancesAnd achieve unexcelled enlightenment.
cn: 度脫諸眾⽣，證於無上道。

en: They are unborn. They won’t arise.They have no nature. There’s no place.
cn: 了知諸法空，無相無⾃性，

en: There’s no cognition. There are no things.May I realize that dharmas are empty.
cn: 無住無表⽰，不⽣亦不滅。

en: Just like the buddhas, the great sages,
cn: ⼜如⼤仙尊，善了於無我，

en: No life, no individuals,No nurturers, nor any self.
cn: 無補特伽羅，乃⾄無壽者。

en: Do not abide in anything.
cn: 於諸布施事，不執我我所，

en: Unstintingly give generously.
cn: 為安樂眾⽣，施與無慳吝。

en: Since things do not exist as things,May I spontaneously have wealth.
cn: 願我所施物，不假功⽤⽣，

en: Since everything disintegrates,
cn: 觀察了知空，具施波羅蜜。

en: Discipline that’s completely pure,Discipline that’s completely pure,
cn: 持戒無缺減，得佛淨⼫羅，

en: Not dwelling, like the elements
cn: 忍辱如四⼤，不⽣分別⼼，

en: Patience does not get angry, so
cn: 以無瞋恚故，具忍波羅蜜。

en: Stable, excited, free of sloth—
cn: 願以⾝⼼⼒，發起⼤精進，

en: With illusory samadhiThrough the illusionlike samadhi,Through the heroic-stride samadhi,
cn: 以如幻如化，及勇猛精進，

en: Through the vajralike samadhiAnd through the vajralike samadhi,
cn: ⾦剛等三昧，具禪波羅蜜。

en: Through the three gates of liberation,The equality of the three times,
cn: 願證三明智，⼊於三脫⾨，

en: And manifesting three awarenesses,
cn: 了三世平等，具慧波羅蜜。

en: May that which all the buddhas praise,The blaze of radiance and glory,
cn: 諸佛妙⾊⾝，光明⼤威德，

en: Fulfill completely my intentions.
cn: 菩薩精進⾏，願我皆圓滿。

en: Like him who is renowned for kindness,
cn: 彌勒名稱者，勤修如是⾏，

en: Hells, hungry ghosts, animals, demigods—And reach the state of the Buddha Maitreya.
cn: 惡趣恆棄捨，願獲慈⽒果。

en: When the victorious Maitreya and SimhaPerform the deeds of buddhas in the future,
cn: 彌勒獅⼦佛，未來教化時，

en: And then receive the highest prophecy.
cn: 我住勝菩提，⽰無上授記。

en: From this virtue, in each and every life,
cn: 願以此善業，於⽣⽣世世，得獲暇滿寶，能依善知識，

en: Shoulder the burden of all beings’ suffering,
cn: 承擔群⽣苦，願⾏彌勒教。

en: The Way of the Bodhisattva,
cn: 我於趣⼊菩薩⾏，造作論說⼀切善，

en: May every wandering being enterThe bodhisattvas’ ways.
cn: 以此願令諸有情，皆得趣⼊菩薩⾏。

en: Who’s anguished or diseased
cn: 普於⼀切⽅所中，所有⾝⼼病苦者，

en: An ocean of happiness.
cn: 彼等當以我福德，獲得樂喜廣⼤海。

en: May their happiness never wane.
cn: 乃⾄彼等輪迴中，永不令其退快樂，

en: May beings continuously obtainThe bodhisattvas’ joy.
cn: 令諸眾⽣皆獲得，相續不斷無上樂。

en: In every universe, delight
cn: 得令彼中諸有情，以極樂樂令愉悅。

en: May all those stricken by cold find warmth;Those stricken by heat be cooled
cn: 令寒所逼獲溫暖，令由菩薩⼤雲中，

en: From great clouds of bodhisattvas.
cn: 所從出⽣無邊⽔，炎熱所逼獲清涼。

en: May sword-leaf forests become for themThick groves of sandalwood.
cn: ⼜另於彼刃葉林，變為可愛喜林苑，

en: May the trunks of Shalmali trees growInto wish-fulfilling trees.
cn: 復令設拉末梨林，亦能產⽣如意樹。

en: May the regions of the hells become delightful
cn: 鴛鴦野鴨雁鵝等，出和雅⾳為莊嚴，

en: Made beautiful by grey geese, ducks, ruddy geese,
cn: 那落迦地變愉快，廣⼤芳⾹蓮花海。

en: May the heaps of embers become mounds of jewels;The burning ground become a crystal floor.
cn: 令彼燒聚成寶聚，令燒鐵地變玻璃，

en: May the crushing mountains also become templesOf worship that are filled with sugatas.
cn: 眾合⼭成無量宮，於中充滿諸善逝。

en: Embers, and weaponry be a rain of flowers.
cn: ⽕簇燒⽯⼲⼽⾬，從今為始轉花⾬，

en: May those who smite each other with their weapons
cn: 輾轉互以兵⼽擊，今成遊戰擲投花。

en: Their flesh all fallen off, their bones as white as jasmineflowers,
cn: 諸沒如⽕無極河，⾁壞⾻如君陀⾊，

en: Whose might,” they wonder, “this fine power dispelling thegloom all round and bringing us joy?”
cn: 皆能開解⽣樂喜，此妙善⼒依誰⼒。

en: Seeing a rain of blossoms mixed with scented water
cn: 花⾬和合⾹⽔降，

en: Drench and extinguish the infernal conflagrations,
cn: 睹⾒獄⽕燼波滅，

en: May the beings in hell be sated with a sudden pleasure,
cn: 念忽飽樂此何因，

en: “Friends, cast away your fear and hurry here! Who could this
cn: 友等速來脫離怖，

en: Protecting beings from all, the bodhisattva who has rousedcompassion,
cn: 救⽣菩薩悲所⽣。

en: His eyes are moist with compassion; a shower of many flowersfalls upon his head.
cn: 具⾜⼤悲所潤眼，頂降眾多花聚⾬，

en: behold Manjughosha.
cn: 如是睹⾒妙⾳已，獄中有情歡呼起。

en: Then through my virtue, may the beings in the hells,
cn: 如是以我諸善根，

en: Seeing a cloud of bodhisattvas free of obscurations
cn: ⾒普賢等無障雲，

en: Led by Samantabhadra shower down on them
cn: 降注樂涼芳⾹⾬，

en: A comforting, cool, fragrant rain, take true delight.
cn: 獄中有情皆妙喜。

en: May animals’ fear of being eatenBy one another vanish.
cn: 得令⼀切傍⽣中，遠離互相啖⾷怖，

en: Like humans in Uttara Kuru,May hungry ghosts be happy.
cn: 有如北俱盧洲⼈，⼀切餓⻤轉安樂。

en: May streams of milk flowing from the handsOf Noble Lokeshvara
cn: 依於聖者觀⾃在，⼿中所降妙乳流，

en: Ever satiate, bathe, and refreshThe preta hungry ghosts.
cn: 令諸餓⻤皆飽⾜，作沐浴已恆清涼。

en: May the pregnant give birth without pain,Just like Queen Mayadevi.
cn: 有如天⺟幻化⺟，雖孕無害⽽產⽣。

en: And delicious beverages.
cn: 渴欲飲者獲諸⽔，及諸⽢美妙飲液。

en: Those wracked with grief gain joy.
cn: 諸貧窘者獲財寶，愁憂逼惱獲歡喜，

en: May the despondent be relievedAnd have great stability.
cn: 諸失意者獲還補，⽽令興盛事堅固。

en: Be swiftly cured of illness.
cn: 所有遭病諸有情，速疾解脫其疾病，

en: May none of wanderers’ maladiesEver occur again.
cn: 眾⽣疾病悉無餘，恆常不令其出⽣。

en: May those who are frightened have no fears;
cn: 諸恐怖者離怖畏，諸束縛者得解脫，

en: May the powerless be powerfulAnd friendly with each other.
cn: 諸羸弱者具勢⼒，其⼼輾轉相親愛。

en: May all directions be propitious
cn: 普於⼀切旅⾏者，所⾄諸⽅皆安樂，

en: The aims for which they travel.
cn: 隨其有所進⾏事，不假劬勞皆成功。

en: May those embarked on boats and shipsAccomplish their intentions,
cn: ⼀切乘⾈乘舶者，如⼼所思成功已，

en: To rejoice with their families.
cn: 安穩返到⽔彼岸，得與親屬同歡樂。

en: May those astray on desolate pathsMeet travelers and journey
cn: 徘徊曠野迷途者，令其遭遇旅⾏眾，

en: Unafraid of bandits, tigers, and such,With ease and unfatigued.
cn: 無有劫盜⻁等畏，無有困乏易前⾏。

en: May the young and old without protection
cn: ⼀切荒涼無道處，⽼稚危難無依怙，

en: Asleep, inebriate, or mad—
cn: 睡眠所醉癲醉者，皆為諸天所守護。

en: Have faith, compassion, and prajna.
cn: ⼀切無暇皆脫離，具⾜信慧及憐憫，

en: May they, with perfect food and conduct,Recall their past lives always.
cn: ⾷與受⽤皆具⾜，恆常憶念諸本⽣。

en: Enjoying it as they wish withoutAny quarreling or threats.
cn: 無有⾾爭無侵害，⾃得⾃在⽽受⽤。

en: May beings with little vitalityBe vigorous and robust.
cn: 威勢羸弱諸有情，令彼威勢皆宏⼤，

en: May those ascetics with bad physiquesHave the most sublime bodies.
cn: 諸苦⾏者惡⾊相，轉成具⾜妙⾊相。

en: Become powerful people.
cn: 所有世間諸⺟⾢，彼皆轉變為丈夫，

en: May those who are lowly gain high statusAnd also vanquish pride.
cn: 賤下種族獲⾼貴，亦令遠離於諸慢。

en: May every being without exception,Through this merit of mine,
cn: 以我今此諸福德，⼀切有情悉無餘，

en: Abandon all misdeeds and then
cn: 遠離⼀切惡法已，令其恆常能作善。

en: Never parted from bodhichitta, may theyEngage in enlightened conduct.
cn: 令不離失菩提⼼，善能流注菩提⾏，

en: May every sentient being haveImmeasurably long life.
cn: 得令彼等諸有情，壽命久遠⽽無量，

en: May all live happily forever.May the word death be unheard.
cn: 恆常安樂資其命，雖死⾳聲亦不傳。

en: May pleasure groves of wishing treesFilled with Dharma proclaimed
cn: 遍於⼀切⽅所中，如意寶樹為林苑，

en: By buddhas and the buddhas’ offspring
cn: 諸佛如來及佛⼦，聞法布法者充滿。

en: Everywhere may the ground be free
cn: ⼀切⽅中諸⼤地，亦復無有礫⽯等，

en: As vaidurya in nature.
cn: 平坦有如⼿中掌，琉璃為性住柔潤。

en: Be seated all around,
cn: 所有眷屬中圍中，有諸眾多菩薩眾，

en: And may they beautify the earthWith their magnificence.
cn: 安住於⾃上妙善，所作莊嚴⼤地上。

en: May all corporeal beings hearThe unceasing sound of Dharma
cn: 若⼀切⿃若樹林，⼀切光明及虛空，

en: May they perpetually encounterThe buddhas and their children
cn: 彼等恆常能遭遇，諸佛如來及佛⼦，

en: And with boundless clouds of offerings,Revere the teacher of beings.
cn: ⽽以無邊供養雲，供養⼀切有情師。

en: May crops be excellent.
cn: 天亦因時降⽢⾬，令諸⽲稼皆豐⾜，

en: And may the people thrive.
cn: 國王⼀切能如法，世間⼀切亦興盛。

en: May medicines be efficacious
cn: ⼀切醫葯具威⼒，持誦密咒能成就，

en: May dakinis and rakshasas,And such, be compassionate.
cn: 空⾏及與羅剎等，皆另具⾜慈憫⼼。

en: May no sentient being be miserable,None wicked, none diseased.
cn: 少分有情亦無苦，無有罪惡無病痛，

en: May none be fearful or despised.
cn: 無有怖畏無輕蔑，亦無少分有憂戚。

en: May temples be well established.
cn: 諸寺讀誦及記誦，弘揚增廣善住持，

en: May the Sangha—always harmonious—Accomplish its purposes.
cn: 恆時僧眾皆和合，僧伽義利亦成就。

en: May bhikshus with the wish to trainFind solitary places,
cn: 求所學處諸⽐丘，亦能獲得遠離處，

en: Give up all distraction, and meditateWith minds that are workable.
cn: 捨離⼀切散亂已，其⼼堪任能修習。

en: May the bhikshunis be supportedAnd give up quarrels and harm.
cn: 諸⽐丘尼利相應，如是⼀切出家者，

en: May everyone who has gone forthHave unbroken discipline.
cn: 遠離⾾爭與侵犯，皆不汙損其⼫羅。

en: May those who’ve broken vows repent,
cn: 沒有破戒⼼厭離，恆能令其罪惡盡，

en: Their vows inviolate.
cn: 亦於獲得善趣中，爾時禁戒無汙損。

en: May panditas be veneratedAnd also receive alms.
cn: 獲為智者所恭敬，亦能獲得諸飲⾷，

en: Their mind streams pure, may they be known
cn: 其相續中恆清淨，⼀切⽅所有名稱。

en: Without enduring the lower realms’ painsOr undergoing hardship,
cn: 不受⼀切惡趣苦，亦復無有諸苦⾏，

en: May beings soon become buddhas.
cn: 以望諸天增勝⾝，彼等速疾能成佛。

en: May every being frequently make
cn: ⼀切有情咸數數，令其供養⼀切佛，

en: The buddhas’ infinite bliss.
cn: 得以諸佛無邊樂，⽽令恆常具⾜樂。

en: The sake of beings fulfilled,
cn: ⼀切菩薩利有情，如其意望皆成就，

en: May sentient beings easily gain
cn: 諸為怙主所護念，⼀切有情樂豐滿。

en: Likewise may the pratyekabuddhasAnd shravakas be happy.
cn: 如是獨覺及聲聞，亦令⼀切皆得樂。

en: Until through Manjughosha’s kindness,I achieve the level Joyous,
cn: 我由⾄尊妙⾳恩，於證極喜⼤地中，

en: Live with vitality.
cn: 我以⾷物若粗⿆，具⾜強健⽽存養，

en: Of perfect solitude.
cn: ⼀切⽣中皆獲得，圓滿相應遠離處。

en: May I see without impedimentManjushri, the protector.
cn: 真實怙主妙⾳尊，無有障礙得觀⾒。

en: I will remain to eliminateThe sufferings of beings.
cn: 我於爾時安住已，開解眾⽣⼀切苦。

en: Whatever the sufferings of wanderers,
cn: 隨其眾⽣所有苦，所有於我皆成熟，

en: Beings to happiness.
cn: 菩提薩埵之僧伽，利眾受⽤諸福樂。

en: May the teachings remain for a long time,May the teachings remain for a long time,Supported and respected.
cn: 供養敬事如來教，令其⻑久住世間。

en: I bow to Manjushri, through whose kindnessA virtuous mind arose.
cn: 由誰恩德發善⼼，敬禮⾄尊微妙⾳，

en: I also bow to the spiritual friendsWhose kindness made me thrive.The Sukhavati Prayer "I prostrate with respect"
cn: 由誰恩德我增⻑，我復敬禮善知識。

en: I prostrate with respect to those who see
cn: 親⾒⼀切所知者，究竟無餘勝功德，

en: Peerless perfection of all supreme qualities,And to the genuine Dharma and the Sangha of bodhisattvas.
cn: 得獲無等與正法，菩薩聖眾虔頂禮。

en: The boundless emanations of his bodyIllumine boundless realms of boundless space.
cn: 無際空海無邊⼟，化⾝⾏作令光明，

en: The boundless radiance of AmitayusPervades all boundless beings in samsara.
cn: 萬光⼤⼒無量壽，普遍無邊輪迴眾，

en: The light of the compassion of all-knowing victors,
cn: 遍知諸佛⼤悲光，極圓滿放本智光，

en: Who shines the light of wisdom that dispelsThe pitch dark of conception and existence.
cn: 盡除妄念輪迴黯，頂禮導師無量光。

en: His streaming beams of light fill every realm;Even the slightest glance cast from his eyes
cn: 光鬘明照遍諸⼟，僅以慧眼微照⾒，

en: Of wisdom quells the entire horde of maras.I prostrate to his body’s boundless light.
cn: 無餘魔軍盡寂滅，頂禮無量⾝光佛。

en: I prostrate to the one whose kaya of liberation,
cn: 妙斷有寂解脫⾝，於體性界⽽不動，

en: The expanse of essence, ablaze with marks and signsThat teach wherever a being to tame is found.
cn: 隨彼調伏為教⽰，相好光耀我頂禮。

en: According to their faculties in all times and directions.I prostrate to the light of boundless speech.
cn: 令眾⽣隨類得⼊，頂禮無量宣說光。

en: I prostrate to the effortless, spontaneousRight words that transcend speech, thought, and description—
cn: 雖離⾔思與⾔詮，無勤任運清淨語，

en: The inconceivable secret of speechThat teaches the supreme excellent path.
cn: 以不可思議密⾔，⽰勝妙道我頂禮。

en: Naturally luminous, unseen like space,The play of all-encompassing pristine wisdom
cn: ⾃性明如空無得，具諸相以智化現，

en: I prostrate to the light of boundless mind.
cn: 遍知諸識壇城廣，無量⼼光我頂禮。

en: Unceasing appearances are dazzling.
cn: 萬法體性為寂滅，無礙之相妙展現，

en: You are the wish-fulfilling sustenance for beings,The infinite body, speech, mind, pristine wisdom,
cn: 有情如意尋獲處，⾝語意無量慧⼒，

en: The immeasurable compassion, and activity:O Amitabha, I always prostrate to you.
cn: 及無量⼤悲事業，恆常頂禮無量光。

en: Bodies and riches both real and imagined
cn: 實質意化⾝與財，無執取⽽盡虛空，

en: I confess and admit all misdeeds and offenses
cn: 我及有情之罪業，發露懺悔諸罪過，

en: May never we commit such acts again!
cn: 誓願此後不再造，業障根本願窮盡。

en: I rejoice in the merit of the victors and their children,The listeners, self-buddhas, and all wanderers.
cn: 佛菩薩聲聞緣覺，及眾⽣善皆隨喜，

en: To turn the wheel of mahayana Dharma.
cn: 所有⼗⽅諸如來，請轉勝乘之法輪。

en: I pray them to remain, not passing beyondFor infinitely many oceans of aeons.You remain without passing into nirvana.
cn: 唯然劫海無邊際，祈請不住於涅槃，

en: I dedicate any virtue done in the three times
cn: 三時所積⼀切善，迴向菩提為利他。

en: Until I reach the essence of enlightenment,
cn: 直⾄未獲菩提藏，此⽣未來⼀切世，

en: And may my bodhichitta never wane.
cn: 願得淨妙上師攝，恆時不壞菩提⼼。

en: May I gain the highest leisure and riches with
cn: 族⾊資財盡圓滿，具勝暇滿法與友，

en: May I train step by step in the Buddha’s teachingsWith interest, diligence, and carefulness.
cn: 次第⽽學佛聖教，願具意樂勤不逸。

en: And other leisureless worlds in this unbearable samsara
cn: 惡趣等苦楚輪迴，投⽣無暇世間業，

en: In this very lifetime ripen on me fully,Never to be experienced in another life.
cn: 願彼惡業此⽣熟，來世不再感其果。

en: May I perfect generosity and discipline,May all the conduct of generosity, morality,I pray that through unsurpassable generosity, morality,And patience, diligence, and meditation,Patience, diligence, meditation, wisdom,
cn: 布施持戒忍精進，定慧權巧與稀有，

en: Wisdom and wondrous means, and aspiration,Excellent means, aspiration, strength,Power, and oceans of primordial wisdom.And the ocean of pristine wisdom become perfectly complete.
cn: 願⼒以及智慧海，諸⾏畢竟成圓滿。

en: Without regard for life and limb, my mindMade workable, my being tamed through solitude,
cn: ⾝與性命無依託，⼼調以靜降⾃⼼，

en: The essence of samsara is nirvana;The essence of conception, pristine wisdom.
cn: 輪迴真如即涅槃，妄念真如即本智，

en: May I have wisdom that knows the dharmataTranscending either single or multiple.
cn: ⾃性超越⼀與多，願具證法性智慧。

en: May I, unhindered, enter the qualities of the sugatas,Who dwell in the profound interdependence,
cn: 盡住緣起甚深理，了義離戲之法⾝，

en: The dharmakaya, definitive and unelaborate,With powers, qualities, pristine wisdom, activity, and so forth.
cn: 諸⼒功德慧業等，願無礙⼊如來法。

en: Wherever I go, my mind filled with delight,
cn: 隨⼼所⾏成現喜，諸⼼意⾏皆清淨，

en: My speech melodious, may I teach the oceans of the DharmaAnd be just like the bodhisattvas in my conduct.
cn: 妙⾳語⽰法理海，願同佛⼦諸⾏儀。

en: Until I attain such qualities as those,
cn: 直⾄未獲如是德，仍能勝於不順處，

en: And when this life’s appearances are soon to disappear,
cn: 設若此⽣相將滅，以佛菩薩之加持，

en: May I realize the radiant innate meaning,And then may infinite gods and goddesses
cn: ⽽悟俱⽣光明義，天⼈天⼥無量眾，

en: Come bearing various offerings to welcome me.
cn: 持諸供養迎我前，⾃相無垢法界性，

en: To the completely pure realm of Sukhavati,Stainless appearance, in its nature dharmadhatu.
cn: 於彼極樂淨佛⼟，以⼤樂⼼樂易⾏。

en: Together with a thousand billion bhikshus.
cn: 同具萬俱胝⽐丘，願⾒法王無量光。

en: May I behold the Bhagavan, whose sight can’t satisfy,And then receive a prophecy of great enlightenment.
cn: 紅光盛耀不可視，⾒已菩薩得授記。

en: May I then emanate completely perfect,Amazing, glorious bodies infinite,
cn: 善聚妙作之善果，殊勝圓滿祥瑞⾝，

en: The fruit of great accumulation of virtue,And sing auspicious melodies in praise of that Bhagavan.
cn: 無量化⾝向世尊，以讚頌海⽽讚嘆。

en: May I be inseparable always from the great Maitreya,Manjushri, Samantabhadra, Avalokiteshvara,
cn: 慈⽒⽂殊與普賢，觀⾳與⼤勢⾄等，

en: Mahasthamaprapta, and the other bodhisattvas.May I engage equally in the ways of liberation.
cn: 恆不離諸菩薩眾，願能等⼊⾏傳理。

en: By acting illusorily on oceans of liberations,
cn: ⾏傳海如幻⾏持，勝乘海諸⽅便攝，

en: Achieve the realizations of oceans of pristine wisdom,And liberate all wanderers from the ocean of existence.
cn: 智慧海證悟妙得，輪迴海眾盡解脫，

en: May I continually purify oceans of buddha realms,
cn: 國⼟海恆常清淨，資糧海清淨增⻑，

en: And ripen and mature oceans of sentient beings.May I accomplish the oceans of aspirations.
cn: 眾⽣海極妙成熟，祈願海盡得成就。

en: Made aspirations, performed deeds, and had great power,
cn: ⼀如往昔諸如來，所作發⼼⾏願⼒，

en: So too may I bring every single sentient beingSwiftly to the state of buddhahood.May we and all others quickly reach buddahood.And swiftly be brought to buddhahood.Click here for Brief Offerings to the Protectors Bernakchen and Palden LhamoTEXTS TO RECITE AT TEACHINGS DURING
cn: 我亦如是令眾⽣，迅速安置正覺地。

en: Then, recite the following:
cn: 盡所有無中邊⼗⽅廣⼤佛⼟，

en: or will appear in any of all the boundless realms without center
cn: 三時已逝、當逝、未逝諸佛，

en: all bodhisattvas, shravakas, pratyekabuddhas,
cn: 菩薩、聲聞、緣覺、

en: gods, rishis, and vidyadharas;
cn: 天、仙⼈、明咒師等，

en: and all those, without exception, who have accomplished thetruth: I pray that you consider me.
cn: ⼀切真實成就祈護念。

en: throughout time without beginning or end;
cn: 或教他作，⾒作隨喜，於此世界，

en: on this extraordinary occasion on which we are accomplishingoceans of virtue
cn: 於此⾃他成就善聚海之殊勝時，

en: in accordance with the bodhisattva conduct,
cn: 請轉法輪、請佛住世、

en: and in order that abundant benefit and happiness arise;
cn: 圓滿善法⽽迴向菩提等善業功德。

en: and through the power and strength of all the roots of virtueengaged in,
cn: 復過去、未來、現在所出⽣之

en: encouraged, or rejoiced in by all the buddhas
cn: ⼀切佛菩薩、聲聞、緣覺

en: by all bodhisattvas, shravakas, or pratyekabuddhas,
cn: 將作、正作、教作、

en: summer and warm in winter.
cn: ⽇⽉光明常照，冬暖夏涼。

en: May they not come under the power of others, but always havefreedom.
cn: 願⼀切皆能⾃主，不受他使。

en: May all the deaf in all world-realms acquire the divine ear.
cn: 願⼀切世間聾者得獲天⽿。

en: May the insane gain sanity.
cn: 啞⼈得善說。狂者得正念。

en: May the imprisoned and those under sentence of death beeasily freed.
cn: 願繫閉牢獄或遭殺害者，喜樂解脫。

en: May all be free from the eight and sixteen dangers.
cn: 離⼋懼⼗六怖畏。

en: May they never be separated from what is lovely and pleasing
cn: 願不離妙樂悅意。

en: May they never encounter what is repugnant and displeasing tothem.
cn: 不遇無喜不悅，

en: May everyone be free from untimely death.May they have long lives.
cn: 願無⼀切⾮時死。並獲⻑壽。

en: May all their wishes be fulfilled in accord with genuine Dharmaand their intentions.
cn: ⼀切思意，如法如願。

en: May they be diligent in properly practicing the meaning of whatthey have heard.
cn: 願具於聽聞諸義⽽如理奉⾏之精進。

en: May all sanghas be harmonious and accomplish the purposes of
cn: 願僧伽和合⽽成就⼀切僧伽義。

en: May all persons delight in and diligently engage in virtuousactions.
cn: ⼀切⼈等歡喜勤修善⾏。

en: May bodhisattvas accomplish the benefit for beings that theyintend.
cn: 願諸菩薩如是利⽣意趣，如願成辦。

en: without exception.
cn: 於⼀眾⽣乃⾄無餘有情眾⽣，皆如是⾏。

en: May their retinues be as numerous and bright as the stars inthe heavens.
cn: 如妙⾼⼭，任運成就，眷屬眾如夜半星⾠繁盛，

en: May they abide in utter peace and auspiciousness with perfecthappiness and well-being.
cn: 具⾜燦爛蕩然吉祥幸福圓滿之道，

en: May their kind blessing of happiness last for ten thousandgenerations.
cn: 幸福恩澤得享萬代，

en: May their fame fill every place reached by the sun and moon.
cn: 名聲如⽇⽉般遍⼀切處。

en: of all gods, rishis, siddhas, and all who have accomplished thetruth;
cn: 天、仙⼈、成就者等，⼀切真實成就之諦語之⼒，

en: through the power of mantra, medicine, and substance;
cn: 萬法因果不爽真實⼒，真⾔、藥、物質之⼒，

en: and through the power of the great truth of the Three Jewels,
cn: 三寶⼤真實⼒，

en: may all the wishes of us all—master, disciples, and retinue—
cn: 令我等師徒與眷屬眾⼀切所欲，

en: and whatever aspirations we have made be accomplished asthey were intended.
cn: ⼀切所願，如意成就。

en: All buddhas and bodhisattvas, please think of me.All buddhas and bodhisattvas, please think of me.All buddhas and bodhisattvas, please think of me.
cn: ⼗⽅諸佛菩薩祈護念！

en: Likewise, we dedicate all our own and other sentient beings’roots of virtue from serving the gurus; serving the sangha;
cn: 我等有情，如是侍師、供僧、

en: including those arising from generosity, those arising frommorality,
cn: 為令無有不⾏迴向、劣等迴向、後悔、炫耀之過，為使善業不失輾轉增⻑，其⽅法為⾏迴向。迴向之處乃於代表三寶物質之前得作，具菩提⼼者前得作，⾃⾝上師前得作。迴向之因為迴向三時之⼀切善根，即是迴向過去善業、現在善業、未來善業。所謂⼀切善業，總歸⽽

en: All buddhas and bodhisattvas, please think of me.All buddhas and bodhisattvas, please think of me.All buddhas and bodhisattvas, please think of me.
cn: 住於⼗⽅諸佛菩薩祈怙念我，

en: Venerable members of the Sangha, I ask that you consider me.
cn: 僧伽⼤德眾等祈怙念我，某甲(唸⼰名)

en: and those arising from meditation; roots of goodness
cn: 持戒、修⾏⽽⽣諸善，或教他作、

en: especially those arising this year from such actions aspresenting offerings to the Three Jewels,
cn: 尤以今年所作供奉三寶、

en: serving the Sangha,serving the Sangha,
cn: 承侍僧伽、奉誦波羅蜜多、

en: offering tormas to dharmapalas,offering tormas to dharmapalas,giving tormas to bhutas,giving tormas to bhutas,
cn: 供養護法⾷⼦、布施⻤魔⾷⼦、供養護法⾷⼦、布施⻤魔⾷⼦、

en: and serving feasts to people in my immediate or general area;through these roots of goodness,
cn: 設宴遠近鄉⼈等此諸善業，

en: may I attain omniscient buddhahood for the benefit of allinnumerable beings,
cn: 為以堪布、阿闍黎、⽗⺟為主

en: Having acquired a human body, may I encounter a spiritualfriend of the mahayana.
cn: 得⼈⾝已，願得值遇⼤乘善知識。

en: Noble members of the Sangha, I pray that you consider thedeceased, (name).
cn: 僧伽⼤德眾等祈怙念(亡者名)，

en: serving the Sangha,serving the Sangha,
cn: 承侍僧伽、奉誦波羅蜜多、

en: and serving feasts to the people of our immediate or generalarea;
cn: 設宴遠近鄉⼈等此諸善業，

en: Having acquired a human body, may they hear the words ‘theThree Jewels.’
cn: 獲⼈⾝已得聞三寶之名，

en: Having heard the words ‘the Three Jewels,’ may they gain faithin the Three Jewels.
cn: 聞三寶名已願⽣信⼼。

en: Having gained faith in the Three Jewels, may they take refuge,generate bodhichitta,
cn: 於三寶⽣信⼼已，願能皈依、發菩提⼼、

en: Those members of the Sangha who are present should respond three timeswith:
cn: 僧伽眾當於最後⼀句誦畢⿑念：如是願成。念誦三遍

en: I prostrate to the Three Jewels.I prostrate to the Three Jewels.I prostrate to the Three Jewels.I prostrate to the Three Jewels.
cn: 頂禮三寶，頂禮三寶！頂禮三寶！

en: One will not be seen by any maras, obstructors, or misleaders.
cn: 願⼀切魑魅魍魎不能⾒。

en: One will see all tathagatas and bodhisattvas.
cn: 願所作諸願其果得⾒。

en: One will see the fulfillment of whatever aspirations one hasmade.
cn: 所作諸願如是成就真⾔圓滿。

en: Through whatever hardships I have undergoneThrough whatever hardships I have undergone
cn: 我昔⾏苦⾏，為諸眾⽣故，

en: And through my giving up pleasure,And through my giving up pleasure,May the Dharma long blaze!May the Dharma long blaze!
cn: 捨⼰⾃⾝樂，令法久熾然。捨已⾃⾝樂，令法久熾然。

en: Through giving away my sons,Through giving away my sons,Daughters, spouses, wealth, elephants, chariots,Daughters, spouses, wealth, elephants, chariots,
cn: 我昔為菩提，捨財及妻⼦，我昔為菩提，捨財及妻⼦，

en: May the Dharma long blaze!May the Dharma long blaze!
cn: 寶象⾺⾞乘，令法久熾然。寶象⾺⾞乘，令法久熾然。

en: Of buddhas, pratyekabuddhas,Of buddhas, pratyekabuddhas,
cn: 我昔供諸佛，緣覺及聲聞，

en: May the Dharma long blaze!May the Dharma long blaze!Shravakas, parents, and rishis,Shravakas, parents, and rishis,
cn: ⽗⺟諸師⻑，令法久熾然。⽗⺟諸師⻑，令法久熾然。

en: Throughout millions of kalpas,Throughout millions of kalpas,
cn: 為聞菩提故，無量阿僧祇，為聞菩提故，無量阿僧祇，
