cn: 為遮可畏輪迴險，應以無垢之多聞，

en: One must correctly distinguish between the indicative anddefinitive
cn: 如理觀察正理⼒，無邊經論權實理。

en: It is definitely necessary to achieve learning.
cn: 如實分辨不諉他，智者之位定當獲，

en: However, what need is there to mention the subtle intentions ofthe Buddha?coarsest
cn: 然微妙義不須⾔，於諸粗顯進退處。

en: Points concerning what is appropriate and inappropriate.
cn: 我之慧⽬亦不明，尚且為彼極癡故，

en: I will have no chance of liberation.Considering this, dispel my heart’s darkness.
cn: 久障我⼼無脫時，憶念此狀除⼼暗。

en: Ocean of learning, you heard much about all areas ofknowledgeIn the presence of buddhas and bodhisattvas.
cn: 佛菩薩前諸明處，多⽣多聞海數學，

en: The habit of your training throughout many lives wasawakened.You are the only eye showing beings the good path.
cn: 微妙習氣善醒覺，開⽰妙道唯⼀眼。

en: Refuge on whom I rely repeatedly with respect,Maitreya, you who liberate beings through maitri,
cn: 數數恭敬歸依處，慈慈救度眾⽣尊，

en: Of the supreme vehicle in my every birth.
cn: 速速降臨諸⽣中，作我⼤乘善知識。

en: You ceaselessly regard all beings with constant kindness.My mind, awed by the recollection of your qualities,
cn: 常以悲憫恆無斷，慈視⼀切有情眾，

en: However, because of the distance,
cn: 念尊功德具信⼼，⽇⽉欲往尊⾝前。

en: Therefore, sublime field of merit,
cn: ⾝不能⾏⾄遠⽅，是故最上福⽥尊。

en: In order to please you, and with pure benevolence,I offer you the finest jewels, divine fabric,
cn: 令歡喜故以淨⼼，珍寶⿈⾦並天⾐，

en: And the things that Shakyamuni commended to bhikshus:
cn: 於諸⽐丘佛讚處，三法⾐與錫杖缽。

en: I also present well-arrayed, captivating offerings,Emanated through samadhi and aspiration.
cn: 以及三昧顯變化，奪意供品妙莊嚴，

en: Filling all space with them, I offer them to the leaderattachment.
cn: 所⽣極⽩善資糧，無欲無貪淨⼼獻。

en: Through the pure virtue arising from that,
cn: 遍虛空於⼆⾜尊，以此久漂三有中，

en: Who are tormented by millions of sufferings and lackhappiness.
cn: 俱胝苦逼安樂稀，眾⽣依怙我願成。

en: In every birth may I acquire the support of full renunciation,
cn: 世間導師妙果位，未抵達前諸⽣中，

en: A life of utterly pure brahmacharya.May my disposition for the supreme vehicle be awakened.
cn: 獲淨梵⾏出家⾝，⼤乘種姓願醒覺。

en: May I be patient, honest, free from deception,And acquire fierce courage free from timidity,
cn: 具忍正直無欺偽，不怯⼼⼒猛⼒信，

en: The diligences of devoted and constant effort,
cn: 恭敬精進恆修⾝，觀察勝慧願獲得。

en: Who has achieved perfect learning,
cn: 以正理⼒如實獲，佛陀密意如⾃念，

en: Who has correctly apprehended the Buddha’s wisdom throughpure reasoning,And is skilled in kindly teaching it to others.
cn: 悲引⽅便善巧⾏，為他開⽰智者頂。

en: May I train for a long time, acquiring an ocean of learning.
cn: 依此知識多聞海，⻑時學習普斷疑，

en: Through properly practicing the meaning
cn: 如理修習所聞義，願令善逝眾歡喜。

en: Not transgressing the limits placed by Shakyamuni,May they be respectful of the Buddha’s scion, the spiritualfriend.
cn: 不越能仁所制戒，敬佛⾎統善知識，

en: May their faculties be most acute. May they be free from thefault of disloyalty.May I have an utterly pure retinue.
cn: 利根遠離倒修過，清淨眷屬願具⾜。

en: They obstruct the feast of communal Dharma practice.
cn: 黑品惡⼼能障礙，領受⼤會法⾏宴，

en: Malevolent companions who are Mara’s friends.
cn: 惡魔眷屬罪友伴，願我剎那亦不遇。

en: When respectfully emulating Shakyamuni,
cn: 恭敬隨學能仁時，圓滿廣⼤⾏之障，

en: May there not even be the word “obstacle.”
cn: 隨⾏劣緣諸魔業，中斷名字亦願無。

en: Delight the sublime and were extolled
cn: 諸凡能令正⼠喜，沙⾨莊嚴⼤師讚，

en: By our guide as the ornaments of renunciates.May they be accomplished without hindrance.
cn: 隨順菩提⾏諸緣，無餘無礙願成就。

en: All disciples in full renunciation bound by pure training.
cn: 菩提⾏時諸化機，淨戒約束令出家，

en: Upon merely thinking of doing so.
cn: 彼等合宜諸資具，繫念無餘願賜予。

en: Become a cause of benefit under all circumstancesTo all innumerable beings.
cn: 彼等⼀切於眾⽣，諸時饒益固願成。

en: All beings are tormented by all sorts of suffering.
cn: 猶如喪失愛⼦⺟，於眾苦逼諸有情，

en: May I always hold them affectionately in mindAnd give them all they desire.
cn: 恆常慈愛⼤悲憫，所有⼀切願施彼。

en: When the stains of the stage of devoted endeavorHave been purified, may I become like
cn: 若淨勝解⾏地垢，我於過去與未來，

en: Mount Meru in the center of the golden ground,Prominent among all bodhisattvas
cn: 現在異⽣佛⼦中，猶如⾦⼭中須彌。

en: Of the past, future, or present. In eyes, clairvoyance,Learning, and so forth, may I be supreme.
cn: 眼與神通多聞等，諸般功德為最上，

en: And attain the confidence of independence from others.
cn: 超越凡夫諸衰敗，獨⽴辯才願獲得。

en: When I am training on the levels of an arya bodhisattva,Among all the brave ones abiding on the levels
cn: 若⾄佛⼦諸勝地，我於三世⼀切眾，

en: May I have unimpeded, stainless knowledgeOf all the extremely vast areas of knowledge
cn: 其他佛⼦難測度，極其廣⼤所知處，

en: That are difficult for other bodhisattvas to fathom.
cn: 無垢淨智無礙轉，廣⼤⾏藏我願成。

en: When the result of that conduct is accomplished,
cn: 如是⾏果若成就，三世諸佛⾝與剎，

en: Retinues, deeds, lifespans, and aspirations
cn: 眷屬事業壽願等，總攝為⼀彼⼀切，

en: Having perfected all of this through skillful conduct,
cn: ⽅便善巧⾏圓滿，於此久念諸有情，

en: And liberate them all in one instant.
cn: 降以正法⽢露⾬，願我剎那救度之。

en: Like the ground, you support many qualities.
cn: 地藏攝持⼀切眾，如同⼤地承眾德，

en: Like a wish-fulfilling jewel, you fulfill the hopes of the threelevels.
cn: 滿三界願如意寶，禮讚⼗地⾃在尊。

en: Leading beings from level to level, you establish them inbuddhahood.You increase the earth’s fruit, its herbs and crops.
cn: 遷地導引置佛地，地藏補藥稼續增，

en: I prostrate to and praise you.
cn: 眾寶盛滿於此地，禮讚地之聖天尊。

en: You are like an excellent vase, a wish-fulfilling tree,
cn: 妙瓶⾦樹圓劫雲，露海如是若有⼈，

en: The thought of you brings prosperity.I prostrate to and praise you who embody compassion.
cn: 憶汝安享於其地，禮讚⼤悲⾃性尊。

en: Supreme among the qualities of innumerable buddhas andbodhisattvas.
cn: 浩瀚佛⼦勝佛德，唯尊虛空藏之主，

en: Your limitless qualities are like the light-rays of a jewel.They end forever all degenerate decline.
cn: 無量德寶之光明，盡淨濁時⼀切壞，

en: Your vast activity brings the splendor of fourfold abundance.I prostrate to and praise you.
cn: 四部祥瑞⼒勝⽣，禮敬廣⼤作者業。

en: The Buddha praised you, supreme and foremost bodhisattva,
cn: ⽂殊觀⾃在普賢，彌勒眾等聖菩薩，

en: Manjughosha, Lokeshvara, Samantabhadra, Ajita,
cn: 百般⻑時供祈願；頃刻憶尊諸願想，

en: And the other great bodhisattvas,The buddhas’ disciples, for many kalpas.
cn: 賜予如意更超勝，佛讚上⾸勝菩薩。

en: Please bestow all the splendors that I desire.
cn: 禮讚諸佛無別尊，善賜我願諸祥瑞。

en: May all beings of the three levels gain faith.
cn: 三界眾⽣得信⼒，地之⾃在尊攝持，

en: May the earth’s richness increase. May all on the earth be filledPassing from level to level, may they accomplish the supremelevel.
cn: 地藏瑞增樂遍地，祈願遷地成勝地。

en: These stanzas, equal in number to the eight auspicious substances, werecomposed by Mipam Jampal Gyepa on the twenty-seventh day of the monthTrum in the fire horse year. May virtue and goodness increase!
Glorious lord of all secrets,You know everything in an instant.
cn: 吉祥秘密共主德，⼤智剎那知諸法，

en: I bow to you, great vajra who bestows the supreme.
cn: 意含通曉無邊智，頂禮施願⾦剛尊。

en: Your nature is peace, your appearance variety.You know everything, but see it as nothing.
cn: 吉祥秘密共主德，⼤智剎那知諸法，

en: Youthful bodhisattva, you are the elder of all buddhas.I prostrate to you, Samantabhadra, who are unlike anyone else.
cn: 意含通曉無邊智，頂禮施願⾦剛尊。

en: As with the extremes of the past, you have passed beyond themisery of thought.bodhisattvas.
cn: 如往昔邊妄念登涅槃，如當來邊⼀切佛⼦⺟，

en: You who are wondrous, your life is an ocean of wonders.
cn: 如現今邊住於虛空界，卓倫尊者汪洋本傳善。

en: The ends of space are solely infinite, empty of all.
cn: 虛空邊者無邊唯⼀悉本空，

en: The realms of sentient beings, infinite, are solely illusory.
cn: 眾⽣界者無邊⼀如幻化顯，

en: The wondrous great sage defeated the powers of Mara
cn: 能仁⼤王安於菩提樹王下，

en: When infinite wondrous bodhisattvas gathered,
cn: 無邊卓倫佛⼦悉集會時中，

en: Yet later I developed doubts about you,
cn: 是故我今於尊⽣起猶疑想，以善澈⼼當讚尊者本傳分。

en: Of the oceans of the ten directions,
cn: 尊者顯於⼀切佛前然已遍盡離來去，

en: And yet, saying that you are training on the path,You teach the assemblies of the bodhisattvas.
cn: 然我等眾於修道上依⽌佛⼦集會眾，

en: A glorious jewel vajra,Transcends all the spheres of the senses.
cn: 超於⾦剛寶德⼤王種種之⾏境，

en: Empower you in an instant with great light rays.
cn: 三世諸佛剎那授灌令⼤光明耀。

en: You engage the realms of all sentient beings equallyWith emanations that are the same as the buddhas’.
cn: 諸眾⽣界隨順涉⼊共諸佛等化⼀相，

en: It is your power that this ordinary person’s mindIs not destroyed from the terror of this.
cn: 以尊⼒故凡夫懼於此⼼不令得存有，

en: Does this not frighten the listeners and self-buddhasAnd even all the powerful heroes?
cn: ⼤⼩⼆乘諸⼤勇⼠亦復以是故懼耶？

en: Ema! So wondrous! In a single instant of mind,From a single pore there come out, filling the reaches of the sky,
cn: ⼤哉稀有⼀⽑孔中剎那現於虛空中：

en: Infinite clouds of flowers, incense, masses of lamps,And scented water, food with sublime flavor, and music;
cn: 無邊種種花⾹燈油上味飲⾷伎樂雲，

en: Infinite are the clouds of your various emanationsEqual to the realms of sentient beings—
cn: 等同有情界數種種化⾝無量無邊雲，

en: To some as clouds of great supreme emanationsWho display the twelve deeds.
cn: 復有殊勝⼤雄化⾝開演⼗⼆⾏儀雲，

en: All the buddhas who have appeared in the three timesAlong with their realms and retinues,
cn: 悉能現於⼀⽑孔中如是神通⼒具⾜。

en: And in a single utterance you teachThat many melodies of all dharmas without a single word left
cn: ⼀語之中等諸法數⼀句無餘演聲語，

en: With a single samadhi, you enter an absorptionEqual to everything that can be known.
cn: ⼀三昧⼒能⼊等同諸所知處之三昧，

en: All of the bodhisattva heroes who seeThese manners of aspiration and liberation
cn: 得⾒如是解脫願王無餘佛⼦勇⼠眾。

en: Proclaim “May I dwell in the all good conduct!”—their whirResounds everywhere in the three times.
cn: 願能住於普賢願⾏此願三時悉振聞，
百千數劫無量無邊悉圓成熟有情界，

en: Or uncountable infinite aeons more numerousThan atoms in the billionfold universe.
cn: ⼀剎那中勝三千界諸微塵數令解脫，

en: In a single instant you perform deedsThat the supreme nirmanakaya victors do not.
cn: 殊勝化⾝剎那⾏持諸佛弗為眾加⾏。

en: And yet such desire as this is wondrous,Such longing and never being contented;
cn: 若然於諸無信慧眾起如是貪甚稀有，

en: Amazing such hatred as this that conquersThe maras, false guides and sorcerers.
cn: 摧毀魔障⼤⼒邪軍如是瞋恨堪毀壞，

en: Unmoved even a speck by the attributes of thoughts,Dwelling in great delusion is a marvel.
cn: 分別諸相塵亦無動住⼤愚癡甚稀奇，

en: I have heard you say such prideful thingsAs that your activity equals that of the buddhas of the threetimes.
cn: 事業等同三世勝者聞能說如是我慢。

en: But those who uphold such wisdom called by the namesOf the afflictions are called the Masters of the Secrets.
cn: 如是聖智具煩惱名平等持之秘密主，

en: The Master of Speech, Vajra Dharma,
cn: ⼀切諸佛所樂聞者語之⾃在⾦剛法。

en: The Mind of the Victors, Samantabhadra
cn: 六識意相融於種種勝者之意普賢王，

en: Of your liberation at length in the sutras,
cn: 此⾏傳載能仁⼤王⼤⽅廣經中宣說，

en: Tossed as atoms of longing for that purpose.
cn: 以如是故⽽造此少散為微塵勝解句。

en: Though you have long nurtured them
cn: ⼤哉佛⼦普賢王，往昔劫劫汪洋始，

en: Wanderers still do not follow you—
cn: 常時欲隨汝尊後，⾄今仍未隨尊⾏，

en: Their misconceptions still have power.
cn: 眾⽣思念具⼤勢，⼀切如來雖讚汝，

en: Follow your example in liberation,
cn: ⽂殊觀⾳諸⼤⼠，若欲隨⾏汝⾏傳，

en: What of these beings of the three worlds
cn: 略少分易不得⼊，何況三界諸眾⽣。

en: Is the one named Samantabhadra.
cn: ⼀切勝者有⻑⼦，彼名號⽈普賢王，

en: His wisdom has no equal.”My rejoicing awakened by that,
cn: 智者宣說尊無等，隨喜能仁王所教。

en: I confess before you, with extreme regret,All my past wrongdoing, unvirtuous actions,
cn: 往昔所有罪業不善等，墮罪惡⾏業⼒諸障垢，

en: And downfalls—all my karmic obscurations.
cn: 極悔恨⼒尊前盡懺悔，當來悉皆不復再造作。

en: Dispel the darkness of beings’ minds.I pray that for immeasurable oceans of kalpas
cn: 求勸轉動法理汪洋輪，無以度量汪洋之劫中，

en: May I perfect generosity and discipline,May all the conduct of generosity, morality,I pray that through unsurpassable generosity, morality,
cn: 祈請不⼊涅槃善常住，布施持戒忍辱及精進，

en: Wisdom and wondrous means, and aspiration,Excellent means, aspiration, strength,
cn: 靜慮般若卓倫善巧等，⼤願⼤⼒聖智之汪洋，

en: And may I never forget bodhichitta.May I never forget bodhichitta.Power, and oceans of primordial wisdom.And the ocean of pristine wisdom become perfectly complete.
cn: ⼀切⾏儀願悉得圓滿，菩提⼼念諸時皆莫忘，

en: Always hear the ocean of dharma,
cn: 願恆得⾒如來之海眾，恆時得聞法理之汪洋，

en: And smell the fragrance of the ocean of morality.
cn: 得觸持戒清淨之淨⾹，得嚐⼤乘汪洋法理味，

en: Experience the touch of the ocean of samadhi,And attain the realization of the ocean of pristine wisdom.
cn: 得受三昧汪洋之諸觸，願得聖智汪洋之證量，

en: May I continually purify oceans of buddha realms,Please the ocean of buddhas,
cn: 恆時得習⼀切淨⼟海，親近⼀切勝者海眾尊，

en: Dispel the suffering of the ocean of beings,And always give them an ocean of supreme bliss.
cn: 能滅諸有情海之苦痛，願恆得施勝樂之汪洋。

en: May I be accompanied by the ocean of bodhisattvas,Hold all the means of the ocean of the supreme vehicle,
cn: 共諸佛⼦海眾常助伴，勝乘汪洋諸法悉攝持，

en: And cultivate an illusory ocean of feats.
cn: 煩惱汪洋極善令清淨，解脫汪洋願如幻修習。

en: In all their births, throughout the ocean of their lives,May the ocean of beings always
cn: ⽣世汪洋⼀切⽣世中，⼀切無暇汪洋悉捨除，

en: And attain the qualities of the ocean of leisure and resources.
cn: 暇滿汪洋無餘之功德，有情汪洋恆時皆能得。

en: And through whatever virtue is in these aspirations,
cn: 吾所微略⾄誠祈請⼒，所發此願所有少功德，

en: Who have been abandoned by all buddhas.
cn: 得令諸佛所捨諸有情，悉能引⾄道上因願成。

en: May all beings who give rise to inappropriate thoughts
cn: 若有含識瞋怒於我者，乃⾄貪念⽣起違理想，

en: May my aspirations be perfectly fulfilled.
cn: 願我此願得極善成就。

en: OṂ May this bring joy and goodness!
cn: 願成妙善！

en: The ocean of your two accumulations is immeasurably deep.It is filled with the jewels of your pure qualities.
cn: 深廣⼆資海，盛滿淨德寶，

en: I bow to the feet of the omniscient Shakyamuni.
cn: 勝業遍⼗⽅，禮敬遍知佛。

en: You abide in the ocean of limitless profundity.
cn: 離邊深海住，餘宗萬鵬⿃，

en: You perfectly mastered all sutras and tantras.
cn: 遠離胎中垢，通達經續岸，

en: You defeated the tirthikas in debate.
cn: 迴遮外道論，禮敬提婆⾜。

en: You heard all his words from the Buddha himself.You spread the Buddhadharma
cn: 親近佛親⾝，聽聞佛經教，

en: Like the Buddha himself.
cn: 如佛廣弘教，禮敬聖無著。

en: Adopting the manner of an ordinary person,You achieved the confident retention
cn: 持現凡夫相，九九⼗萬偈，

en: Of ninety-nine lakhs of the Buddha’s words.
cn: 經教盡憶持，禮勝智世親。

en: Through your wondrous eloquence,
cn: 以語殊勝⼒，⼤地六震動，

en: Destroying the confidence of adversaries.
cn: 徹斷辯敵⼒，禮敬陳那⾜。

en: On the golden mountain of good traditionShone the sun of Shakyamuni’s discipline.
cn: 善規之⾦⼭，能仁戒⽇⽣，

en: The lotus garden of those who wear saffron bloomed.
cn: 僧⼈蓮池展，禮敬功德光。

en: Shone the moon of wisdom,
cn: 善說之空際，智慧明⽉⽣，

en: A beautiful ornament of the buddhadharma.
cn: 願吾⼀切⽣，莊嚴佛教法，

en: May I become supreme among thoseWho have all the qualities of training.
cn: 具⾜淨學德，成就最殊勝。

en: The great chariots, Nagarjuna and Asanga,
cn: 明世六嚴稱名者，尤為佛所數授記，

en: Were repeatedly prophesied by the Buddha.The confluence of their lineages
cn: ⿓樹無著⼤乘師，傳承法流悉聚集，

en: Is renowned as the Kagyu,Who are the protectors of all beings.
cn: 匯集稱名為噶舉，咸成眾⽣依怙主，

en: Personification of the three roots, Acharya Padmasambhava;Great abbot Shantarakshita; Dharma king Trisong;
cn: 三根總集蓮華⽣⼤⼠，堪欽靜命⾚松德贊王，

en: Nupchen Sangyay Yeshe; and Nyangton Nyima Özer:
cn: 努千桑傑釀敦尼瑪唯，虔⼼祈請教藏五祖師。

en: Vajradhara in person, the great guru of Sakya, Kunga Nyingpo;Sonam Tsemo; Drakpa Gyaltsen;
cn: ⾦剛持實上師寧波尊，索南澤莫札巴蔣參與，

en: Sakya Pandita; and Pakpa Rinpoche:I pray to the noble lords, the five forefathers.
cn: 薩迦班千⼤寶⼋思巴，虔⼼祈請薩迦聖五祖。

en: Hevajra in person, Marpa Chökyi Lodrö;Milarepa; the peerless Gampopa;
cn: 喜⾦剛⾺爾巴⼤譯師，密勒惹千無⽐岡波巴，

en: Dusum Khyenpa; and Phamodrupa, the protector of beings:I pray to the five Kagyu forefathers.
cn: 杜松虔巴眾怙索南札，虔⼼祈請噶舉聖五師。

en: The protector Amitabha in person, Shri Dipankara;Gyalway Jungnay; Chennga Tsultrim Bar;
cn: 彌陀怙主吉祥燃燈智，加委穹乃間阿楚成巴，

en: Rinchen Sal; and Shönnu Gyaltsen:
cn: 仁⻘賽與循努蔣采尊，

en: I pray to the five Kadampa spiritual friends.
cn: 虔⼼祈請噶當五善師。

en: Manjushri in person, the noble lord Tsongkhapa;Gyaltsap Chöje; Kedrup Gelek Pal;
cn: ⾄尊⽂殊宗喀巴⼤師，賈曹卻傑客珠格勒巴，

en: I pray to the five Manjushris.
cn: 根敦⽵巴班千確吉傑，虔⼼祈請⽂殊五⽗⼦。

en: Have long lives without sickness and behave in accord withDharma.
cn: 如此祈請加被之⼒故，吾等⻑壽無病如法⾏，

en: May we be cared for by genuine spiritual friendsAnd quickly reach the state of awakening.
cn: 勝妙上師善知識攝持，願速證得菩提之果位。

en: May the feet of all Dharma traditions’ holders
cn: 無別持有釋教⼠夫眾，

en: May the Sangha and the Dharma of study and practice increase.May the three worlds be filled with the radiance ofauspiciousness.
cn: 僧伽團與講修教增廣，祈願三地吉祥光遍滿。

en: Great Vajradhara, Telo, Naropa,Marpa, Mila, Dharma lord Gampopa,
cn: ⾦剛總持帝洛那洛巴，⾺巴密勒法王岡波巴，

en: The knower of three times, omniscient Karmapa,Those who hold the four elder and eight younger lineages,
cn: 普明三世遍知噶瑪巴，四⼤⼋⼩傳承持有者，

en: The Drikung and Taklung and Tsalpa, great Drukpa,And others who’ve mastered mahamudra’s profound path,
cn: 直達察派具德⽵巴等，於甚深道⼤印得⾃在，

en: Unequaled protectors of beings, Dakpo Kagyu,We supplicate you. Kagyu gurus, we uphold
cn: 卓袞 達波 噶舉拉 梭哇 喋梭 噶舉 喇嘛南達波噶舉無⽐眾⽣怙，於諸⼝傳上師作祈請，

en: Revulsion’s the foot of meditation, as it’s taught.
cn: 持有傳承記述祈加持。教云離欲即為修⾏⾜，

en: Devotion’s the head of meditation, as it’s taught.
cn: 無著名聞利養祈加持，教云虔敬即為修⾏⾸，

en: The gate to the treasury of oral instructions:
cn: 上師開啟教誡寶藏⾨，於諸恆常祈請之⾏者，

en: The main practice is being undistracted, as it’s taught.
cn: 加持⽣起無偽之虔敬。教云⽏逸即是修正⾏，

en: As ones who whatever arises, rest simply,Not altering, in just that fresh essence of thought:
cn: 隨顯即悟體性⾃如如，住於任運無整之⾏者，

en: The essence of thought’s the dharmakaya, as it’s taught.
cn: 修⾏遠離妄⼼祈加持。教云妄念體性即法⾝，

en: Not anything at all, yet arising as anything,In unceasing play we arise: Please bless us
cn: 所顯⾮真宛然⽽顯現，不滅幻有顯現之⾏者，

en: Perfecting the qualities of the paths and levels,
cn: 受⽤殊勝吉祥之法教，五道⼗地功德悉圓滿，

en: May quickly we reach the state of Vajradhara.
cn: 願速證得⾦剛持果位。

en: I supplicate the incomparable Teacher Shakyamuni,His exalted regent, Noble Asanga,
cn: 無⽐導師薄伽釋迦尊，彌勒菩薩聖者無著怙，

en: Bhaṭṭāraka Vimuktisena who resides on the level of faith, andChokgi De:
cn: 智者頂嚴世親解脫軍，⼤德解脫軍及最勝軍，

en: I supplicate the great scholars Vinitadeva and Vairochana,
cn: 我今啟請祈能賜加持。最善調伏軍及遍明照，

en: The two yogis, and bodhisattva Suvarnadvipa—
cn: 彌勒菩薩攝持獅⼦賢，⼤⼩古薩利及⾦洲師，

en: Great masters of the lineage of vast action.
cn: 廣⾏開派⼤乘師諸眾，我今啟請祈能賜加持。

en: I supplicate Manjushri, foremost son of the Buddha; Nagarjuna;
cn: 上⾸佛⼦⽂殊及⿓樹，聖天以及⽉稱菩薩等，

en: The two Rigpay Khujug and so forth;And Atisha who upholds their two traditions of the Mahayana.
cn: ⼤⼩正理杜鵑論師與，⼤乘⼆教持者阿底峡，

en: I supplicate the great spiritual friend, master Tsultrim Bar;
cn: 我今啟請祈能賜加持。⼤善知識仲敦巴尊者，

en: His disciples Ja Yülwa and Yeshe Bar;Chakriwa; Nesurpa; and so forth—
cn: ⾦厄⽡⽵清巴與其⼦，賈由⽡耶謝巴嘉⽇⽡，

en: A multitude of great spiritual friends.
cn: 內素巴等諸多善知識，我今啟請祈能賜加持。

en: The ford leading into all the rivers of scriptures
cn: 兩⼤軌轍傳承所源之，⼊佛經典瀑流之訣竅，

en: And Dusum Khyenpa, master of the activity of all the victors.
cn: 聖者⽉光童⼦岡波巴，佛業主宰三世遍知者，

en: Who awoke to buddhahood countless aeons agoAnd yet appear to impure beings as nirmanakayas
cn: 順應所欲調伏之眾⽣，化⾝各種相應之顯相，

en: In whatever manner will tame them.
cn: ⽗⼦傳承所有諸聖眾，我今啟請祈能賜加持。

en: I supplicate all those to whom these lineages have been passed.
cn: ⼀切所有傳承之次第，我今啟請祈能賜加持。

en: Bless me to be terrified of the frightening sufferings
cn: 依於如是祈請加持⼒，難忍惡趣痛苦極怖畏，

en: Of the dreadful lower realms. For the sake of the higher realms,
cn: 為得善趣所依之原故，命有危難亦不犯律儀，

en: Bless me to strive to accomplish the pure virtues
cn: 昔造諸業清淨祈加持。勤奮精進修持善⽩業，

en: For the stainless three trainings of those who wish forliberationFrom the pit of fire surrounded by rings of flame—
cn: 輪迴牢籠解脫實困難，於解脫之無垢三學處，

en: Bless those who seek the lesser peace
cn: ⽣起⼤希求⼼祈加持。有⼼希求但寂靜低劣，

en: To rest in the two types of pacificationAnd then develop the great courage
cn: 彼等於寂靜⼆者休停，依次第⽽⼊殊勝菩提，

en: The power of the family of the supreme vehicle is not lesser.
cn: ⽣起勇氣膽量祈加持。妙乘種性之⼒不劣故，

en: For those beings burning in the fires of suffering,
cn: 於受痛苦⽕燃之眾⽣，⽣起悲憫慈愛菩提⼼，

en: After generating bodhichitta, may they display widely
cn: 所⽣之⼼不退祈加持。已發菩提之⼼為利⽣，

en: To sentient beings at all times
cn: 修習殊勝菩提之⾏持，⼀切時中恆於⼗⽅剎，

en: The wondrous conduct of enlightenment for the sake ofwanderers.May they progress through the two vast and profound paths,
cn: 廣⼤教⽰⼀切有情眾。善⾏甚深廣⼤⼆道後，

en: May they become lamps of the world who illuminate
cn: 以離⼆障無上本智⼒，順應調伏彼道無錯誤，

en: From the supreme place of the Potala,
cn: 布達拉勝境，綠⾊當字⽣，

en: Tara, I pray that you come with your retinue.
cn: 當字光度眾，祈並眷屬臨。

en: Gods and demigods bow their crowns
cn: 諸天⾮天頂髻嚴，恭敬跪捧兩⾜蓮，

en: You liberate from all deprivation.I prostrate to Tara, the mother.
cn: 度諸窮苦中之⺟，致禮救度佛⺟前。

en: Noble lady, Arya Tara,
cn: 佛⺟尊聖救度⺟，及諸⼗⽅三世中，

en: Who abide in the ten directions and the three times:
cn: 所有諸佛並弟⼦，我今⼀⼼敬讚禮。

en: I present flowers, incense, butter lamps,Scent, food, music, and other offerings,
cn: 花⾹燈燭及⾹⽔，妙⾷伎樂等供養，

en: I pray that the Arya’s assembly accept them.
cn: 實獻即於意所現，皆願眾聖樂納受。

en: I confess all the wrongdoing I have committedThroughout beginningless time up to now,Throughout beginningless time up to now,
cn: ⾃從無始直⾄今，⼗不善及五無間，

en: I confess all wrongdoing.I confess all my wrongdoingWith a mind overpowered by kleshas.Such as the ten wrongdoings and the five worst,
cn: 由⼼煩惱故所造，⼀切罪惡皆懺悔。

en: I rejoice in all the merit accumulatedThrough the virtuous actions in the three times
cn: 聲聞緣覺諸菩薩，乃⾄凡夫諸有情，

en: Of shravakas, pratyekabuddhas,Bodhisattvas, ordinary beings, and others.
cn: 三世所積諸福善，我皆隨喜盡無餘。

en: In accordance with the thoughtsIn accordance with the thoughts
cn: 應其⼤⼩通常類，勸轉⼀切妙法輪。

en: You not pass into nirvana,
cn: 從今直⾄輪迴空，請常住世不涅槃，

en: Who are drowning in the ocean of suffering.
cn: 為苦海中諸眾⽣，悉願聖⺟慈眼觀。

en: May whatever merit I have accumulatedBecome a cause of awakening.
cn: 我今所集諸福善，皆成無上菩提因，

en: A splendid guide of beings.
cn: 惟願不久於眾⽣，證得無上引導師。

en: I prostrate to Tara, the quick and heroic,Whose eyes flash instantly, like lightning,
cn: 敬禮救度速勇⺟，⽬如剎那電光照，

en: Is like a hundred full autumn moons,
cn: 敬禮百秋朗⽉⺟，普遍圓照無垢⾯，

en: By lotuses born from water blue and gold,
cn: 敬禮紫磨⾦⾊⺟，妙蓮華⼿勝莊嚴，

en: Whose conduct is generosity, diligence,Discipline, peace, patience, and meditation.
cn: 施精勤⾏柔善靜，忍辱禪定性無境。

en: I prostrate to you, the ushnisha of the tathagatas,Whose deeds are boundless, utter victory,
cn: 敬禮如來頂髻⺟，最勝能滿無邊⾏，

en: On whom the bodhisattvas fully rely.
cn: 得到彼岸盡無餘，勝勢佛⼦極所愛。

en: I prostrate to you who fill the desire realm, all directions,
cn: 敬禮怛囉吽字⺟，聲愛⽅所滿虛空，

en: And are able to summon all without exception.
cn: 運⾜遍履七世界，悉能鉤召攝無餘。

en: Vayudeva, Ishvara, and other gods worship,
cn: 敬禮釋梵⽕天⺟，⾵神⾃在眾俱集，

en: Who are praised in your presence by bhutas,Vetalas, gandharvas, and hosts of yakshas.
cn: 部多起屍尋⾹等，諸藥叉眾作稱歎。

en: All the devices of adversaries,
cn: 敬禮特囉胝發⺟，於他加⾏極摧壞，

en: Who blaze amid wild, burning flames.
cn: 展左踡右作⾜踏，頂髻熾盛極明耀。

en: I prostrate to you who totally conquer, with terrifying TURE,The warriors of Mara,
cn: 敬禮都哩⼤緊⺟，勇猛能摧怨魔類，

en: Whose lotus face frowns,Who kill all enemies without exception.
cn: 於蓮華⾯作顰眉，摧壞⼀切冤家眾。

en: I prostrate to you whose fingers adorn your heartWith the mudra of the Three Jewels,
cn: 敬禮三寶嚴印⺟，⼿指當⼼威嚴相，

en: Blazing in all directions.
cn: 嚴飾⽅輪盡無餘，⾃⾝熾盛光聚種。

en: I prostrate to you whose crown, heavy with great joy,Radiates garlands of light,
cn: 敬禮威德歡悅⺟，寶光珠鬘眾光飾，

en: Whose fierce laugh of TUTTĀRAEnthralls maras and all the world.
cn: 最極喜笑 怛哩，鎮世間魔作懾伏。

en: All the guardians of the ground,
cn: 敬禮守護眾地⺟，亦能鉤召諸神眾，

en: Liberate from all deprivation.
cn: 搖顰眉⾯吽聲字，⼀切衰敗令度脫。

en: moon,Who blaze brilliantly with all adornment,
cn: 敬禮頂冠⽉相⺟，冠中現勝妙嚴光，

en: Whose hair is always beautifulWith Amitabha’s brilliant light.
cn: 阿彌陀佛髻中現，常放眾妙寶光明。

en: I prostrate to you who dwell amid garlands of flame
cn: 敬禮如盡劫⽕⺟，安住熾盛頂髻中，

en: Who are delighted, with right leg extended and left bent,Who totally conquer enemies’ forces.
cn: 普遍喜悅半趺坐，能摧滅壞惡冤輪。

en: And trample it with your feet,
cn: 敬禮⼿按⼤地⺟，以⾜踐踏作鎮壓，

en: Who, frowning, with the syllable HŪṂConquer the seven levels.
cn: 現顰眉⾯作吽聲，能破七險鎮降伏。

en: I prostrate to you whose conduct is blissful,Virtuous, tranquil, the peace of nirvana,
cn: 敬禮安穩柔善⺟，涅槃寂滅最樂境，

en: Conquer great wrongdoing.
cn: 莎訶命種以相應，善能消滅⼤災禍。

en: Totally defeat enemies,
cn: 敬禮普遍極喜⺟，諸怨⽀體令脫離，

en: Tara who arises from the awareness HŪṂSurrounded by the ten syllables.
cn: ⼗字咒句妙嚴布，明咒吽聲常朗耀。

en: I prostrate to TURE who stamps her feet,
cn: 敬禮都哩巴帝⺟，⾜躡相勢吽字種，

en: Vindhya, and the three worlds.
cn: 彌嚕曼陀結辣薩，於此三處能搖動。

en: And the syllable PHAṬ are said.
cn: 誦⼆怛囉作發聲，能滅諸毒盡無餘。

en: And all gods and kinnaras rely,
cn: 敬禮諸天集會⺟，天緊那羅所依愛，

en: Who dispel the fiercest contagionBy reciting hara twice and TUTTĀRA.
cn: 誦⼆喝囉咄怛哩，善除惡毒瘟熱病。

en: Through the placement of threefold suchness,
cn: 敬禮具三真實⺟，善靜威⼒皆具⾜，

en: Supreme TURE who conquers the hostsOf spirits, vetalas, and yakshas.
cn: 藥叉執魅尾怛辣，都哩最極除災禍。

en: And the twenty-one prostrations.Return to the beginning of the prayer.
cn: 若有智者勤精進，⾄⼼誦此⼆⼗⼀。

en: Intelligent people with true respect for this devi
cn: 救度尊處誠信禮，是故讚嘆根本咒。

en: Admiration at both dawn and dusk,
cn: 每晨早起⼣時禮，憶念施諸勝無畏，

en: All their wrongdoing will be fully pacified.All lower realms will be conquered.
cn: ⼀切罪業盡消除，悉能超越諸惡趣。

en: From seventy million buddhas.
cn: 此等速能得聰慧，七俱胝佛所灌頂，

en: They will attain what is greater than this.They will reach ultimate buddhahood.
cn: 現世富貴壽延安，當來趣向諸佛位。

en: The strongest poison whether from
cn: 有時誤服諸毒物，或⾃然⽣或合成，

en: The environment or beings,Whether eaten or drunk.
cn: 憶念聖尊真實⼒，諸惡毒藥盡消滅。

en: They will escape all sufferingCaused by spirits, contagion, or poison,
cn: 或⾒他⼈遭⻤魅，或發熱病受諸苦，

en: And so will other beings.If this is recited two, three, and seven times,
cn: 若轉此讚⼆三七，彼諸苦惱悉蠲除。

en: Those who want children will have children,Those who want wealth will gain wealth,
cn: 欲乞男⼥得男⼥，求財寶位獲富饒，

en: All desires will be fulfilled,And all obstructors will be vanquished.
cn: 善能圓滿隨意願，⼀切障礙不能侵。

en: Mother, noble lady, devi Tara.
cn: ⺟於無⽣法界中，安住尊聖之度⺟，

en: You bestow bliss on all beings.
cn: 予諸有情安樂⺟，祈救護我出怖畏。

en: Not knowing ourselves to be the dharmakaya,Our minds come under the power of kleshas.
cn: 不識⼰即法⾝故，⼼為煩惱⼒所縛，

en: Mother, for all beings wandering in samsara,Mother, devi, I pray that you protect us all.
cn: 流轉輪迴如⺟眾，懇請佛⺟慈救護。

en: Without Dharma in my heart or being,
cn: 法義於⼼未⽣際，唯隨名⾔及⽂句，

en: And am deceived by bad philosophy.Mother, perfect devi, I pray that you protect me.
cn: 下劣宗義所矇騙，清淨佛⺟祈救護。

en: Although I’ve seen my mind, so hard to realize,
cn: 難能了悟⾃⼼性，⾒已於彼未修持，

en: I am distracted by bad activities.Mother, devi of mindfulness, I pray that you protect me.
cn: 為諸惡⾏所散亂，正念佛⺟祈救護。

en: Although my mind is self-arisen, nondual pristine wisdom,Because of my habit of dualism
cn: ⾃⽣無⼆之本慧，執為⼆之習氣故，

en: Mother, devi of nondual mind, I pray that you protect me.
cn: ⼀切所作皆繫縛，⼼無⼆⺟祈救護。

en: Although I abide in the true meaning,
cn: 雖安住於清淨義，不識因果緣起故，

en: Mother, devi of omniscience, I pray that you protect me.
cn: 於所知義起愚矇，遍智佛⺟祈救護。

en: The absence of complexity has the character of space.
cn: 離戲具⾜虛空性，⼀切與彼無別故，

en: For individuals still learning,Mother, Buddha, I pray that you protect us all.
cn: 現今弟⼦有情眾，圓滿佛⺟祈救護。

en: I prostrate to Arya Avalokiteshvara, the treasury of compassion.
cn: 頂禮聖觀世⾳⾃在⼤悲藏！

en: I bow to the feet of Tara, to whose lotus feet hundreds of wellformed gods,Such as Vishnu, Lakshmi’s lord, Brahma of the golden womb,Brihaspati the guru of gods;
cn: 天⼈祥瑞之主與梵天，值⽇天財神天⾃在天，

en: The elephant-faced Ganesh, glorious-throated Ishvara,And Surya, the friend of lotuses, offer their crowns.
cn: 蓮親⽇等百天之頂嚴，虔奉度⺟⾜蓮我頂禮。

en: Through the miraculous emanation of Mahakarunika,The wisdom, kindness, and power of all buddhas of the threetimes
cn: ⼤慈悲之⼤悲所化現，三時諸佛之德悲智⼒，

en: Are displayed as a beautiful devi of activity.
cn: 以秀麗事業天⼥⾝相，救諸貧苦度⺟我頂禮。

en: left contracted.I prostrate to you who unite means and wisdom.
cn: 韶年之⾝腿右展左踡，頂禮⽅便智慧雙運⺟。

en: Your breasts are full. You are a treasury of undefiled bliss.
cn: 豐滿雙乳無漏樂之藏，⾯如滿⽉嫣然⽽微笑，

en: Your demeanor is peaceful. Your compassionate eyes are wide.I bow to you, the beautiful one from the sandalwood forest.
cn: 寂靜神韻廣⼤悲眼⺟，妍麗紫檀度⺟尊前禮。

en: Like the extended branch of a turquoise tree,Your smooth, soft right hand is in the mudra of supremegenerosity,
cn: 宛如⽟⽯樹枝⽽伸展，以柔軟右⼿伸勝施印，

en: As though you are summoning the learnedTo the feast of supreme siddhi. I prostrate to you.
cn: 於諸賢者勝悉地饗宴，如迎賓客尊前我頂禮。

en: Your left hand represents the Three Jewels and bestowsprotection,Clearly indicating, “I, who am fearless, will quickly protectbeings,
cn: 左⼿以表三寶勝施印，於諸遇⾒成百懼怖者，

en: Who see hundreds of dangers.”
cn: 我當速速救護勿懼怕，明晰⽽⽰尊前我頂禮。

en: Your two hands are marked by blue utpalas,As though you are spurring all beings on to diligence
cn: ⼆⼿捻持⻘隖巴拉花，表諸有情無貪輪迴樂，

en: By saying, “Be not attached to the pleasures of samsara.Enter the city of great liberation.” I prostrate to you.
cn: ⽽得住於解脫⼤城⾢，如策精進之鞭尊前禮。

en: Adorns your head, bestowing the siddhi of immortality.
cn: 賜無死成就佛頂嚴飾，滅我死魔⽽於尊前禮。

en: Priceless, it is composed of the gods’ wish-fulfilling jewels.
cn: ⼆資糧得善趣功巧作，越量天之如意摩尼寶，

en: It is captivating, the sum of all beauty.I prostrate to you who are well adorned.
cn: 總攝豔麗迷⼈之莊嚴，善能莊嚴⼀切尊前禮。

en: Like a mountain of emeralds adorned by rainbows,
cn: 宛如綠寶⽯⼭佩虹彩，上⾝穿戴天絲之披⾐，

en: Your slender, supple, beautiful waistIs swathed by a skirt of panchālika. I prostrate to you.
cn: 纖細婀娜娟麗之纖腰，編紮黎嘎下裙我頂禮。

en: On your right is Marichi, who eliminates misery.Her demeanor is peaceful. She is golden and radiates light likethe sun’s.
cn: 右⽅住有無憂光天⼥，寂靜之姿⾦⾊放⽇光，

en: I prostrate to the beautiful ones who are majestic with wrathand passion.
cn: 左⽅⼀髻天⼥奪天⾊，怒相莊嚴瑰麗向彼禮。

en: I offer you devis filling all space,Skilled in sixfold song and lovely dance,
cn: 具六歌藝與曼妙舞姿，⽩傘拂⼦琵琶笛⼦等，

en: Holding white parasols, fans, lutes, flutes,And innumerable other offerings. I prostrate to you.
cn: 持握廣⼤供品眾天⼥，遍滿虛空供養我頂禮。

en: Lakshmi, Shachi, Uma,And the thousands of other attractive immortal maidens
cn: 天⺟善⾔⺟與⼭⽣⺟，悅意無死少⼥縱百千，

en: I prostrate to Water Deva.Are hardly worthy of being your servants.
cn: 於尊之前服侍亦難得，娟麗天⼥尊⾝我頂禮。

en: From the vast expanse of your compassion’s cloudsIssues your melodic speech, like Brahma’s, the cloud-drum’sbeat.
cn: ⼤悲祥雲茂盛⽽廣⼤，悅⽿梵⾳如雲⿎雷⾳，

en: Its skillful shower soaks the ground of disciplesWith rain of eightfold sweetness. I prostrate to you.
cn: 遍化⼤地⼋功德法⾬，善巧普降尊⺟我頂禮。

en: Seeing all things, you are a treasury, an ocean of qualities.Who could properly describe them all?
cn: 觀諸所知功德⼤海藏，如是無餘詮說誰能及，

en: Your intellect is unimpeded. Your mind has the ten strengths.
cn: 智慧無礙⼼意具⼗⼒，究竟智慧尊⺟我頂禮。

en: Although you have achieved peace, compelled by compassion
cn: 雖得寂滅依⼤悲他⼒，沈沒痛苦⼤海之群⽣，

en: Beings drowning in the ocean of suffering.
cn: 以⼤悲⼿旋即救拔⺟，究竟慈愛尊⺟我頂禮。

en: You spontaneously, unceasingly,And without delay, like the ocean’s waves, engage
cn: 息增懷誅⼀切諸事業，猶如⼤海浪淘不逾時，

en: In pacification, increase, captivation, and force.
cn: 任運無間斷之趨⼊⺟，事業究竟尊⺟我頂禮。

en: Upon recollection, you protect from great danger,
cn: ⼤恐懼⼋苦及魑魅魔，

en: The eight sufferings, bhutas, and the dangers of
cn: 所知煩惱障等諸懼怖，

en: The kleshas and the cognitive obscuration.
cn: 僅憶尊⾜隨即救護⺟，究竟威⼒尊⺟我頂禮。

en: All beings from sickness, contagion,
cn: 如是皈處尊令諸眾⽣，瘟疫魔障並與⾮時死，

en: Bad dreams, evil omens, and from all danger.
cn: 以及噩夢或不祥惡兆，祈願迅速救護離恐懼。

en: It is inflated, thinking itself superior to others.
cn: 薩迦耶⾒如丘壑伏獅，⼼執勝於他⼈⽽驕慢，

en: It has the claws of disparagement of others.
cn: 輕蔑藐視彼⽅之獅⽖，祈願救出我慢獅懼怖。

en: It cannot be tamed by the sharp hook of mindfulness andalertness.It is maddened by drinking the intoxicating water of pleasure.
cn: 正知念之尖勾不調伏，飲妙欲酒⽽昏醉之⼒，

en: malevolence.I pray that you protect us from the fearsome elephant ofstupidity.
cn: 住於邪道危害之獠⽛，祈願救出愚癡象懼怖。

en: It burns amid vast clouds of the smoke of wrongdoing.
cn: ⾮理作意之⾵所吹動，惡⾏烏雲密佈之中央，

en: It can burn down the entire forest of virtue.
cn: 能作焚燒善業茂林⽕，祈願救出瞋恨⽕懼怖。

en: It clings to its den, thick ignorance.
cn: 無明黯昧⽳中起貪著，⾒他富裕之時極難忍，

en: I pray that you protect us from the fearsome snake of jealousy.
cn: 暴惡之毒迅即⽽擴散，祈願救出嫉妒蛇懼怖。

en: It lurks in the terrifying wilderness of inferior disciplineAnd in the desert of permanence and termination.
cn: 下劣斷⾏可怖荒郊處，徘徊常斷荒穢曠野中，

en: It overthrows the towns and monasteries of benefit andhappiness.I pray that you protect us from the fearsome robber, inferiorviews.
cn: 毀壞⼀切利樂之城鄉，祈願救出惡⾒賊懼怖。

en: I pray that you protect us from the fearsome chains of greed.
cn: 愛之⾨鎖難啟緊相扣，祈願救出慳吝鍊懼怖。

en: It is extremely hard to cross. Its current bears us to samsara.
cn: 極難越渡三有流捲席，猛烈業⾵之緣⽣近業，

en: It roils with the waves of birth, aging, sickness, and death.I pray that you protect us from the fearsome river of desire.
cn: ⽣⽼病死浪⾵極惑亂，祈願救出貪欲河懼怖。

en: And attacks those who seek the definitive.
cn: 徘徊於諸癡眛之虛空，尤為迫害追尋諸了義，

en: I pray that you protect us from the fearsome carnivore of doubt.
cn: 攻擊解脫命之兇惡者，祈願救出懷疑⻤懼怖。

en: Through my praising and praying to you,Through my praise and prayer, please pacifyPlease pacify what hinders Dharma practice.
cn: 願以讚嘆以及祈請⼒，修⾏正法違緣能息滅，

en: Such as life, merit, wealth, and possessions.
cn: 壽命福德吉祥圓滿等，善順因緣如意⽽成辦。

en: Without undergoing hundreds of austerities,May we quickly reach buddhahood.
cn: 無需⾏持百千之苦⾏，願得迅速登⾄正覺果。

en: May I always recollect previous lives.
cn: ⽣⽣世世吾能恆憶持，與菩提⼼恆時不暫離，

en: In pursuit of the vast conduct of the bodhisattvas
cn: 於尋求佛⼦廣⼤之⾏，願精進流相續⽽堅固，

en: May I never hope to accomplish my own benefit.May I immerse myself solely in the benefit of others.
cn: 無有希求於成辦⾃利，唯獨⼊住勤⾏修利他，

en: May I perfect all the conditions for benefiting others,
cn: 五眼六通善⾔忍辱等，⾏利他諸因緣願具⾜。

en: May I never shy from spreading the sublime Buddhadharma
cn: 廣⼤國⼟如來諸正法，興盛弘揚恆時無衰敗，

en: May I easily achieve buddhahood.
cn: 恆常成辦諸眾⽣義故，願能安樂易適成佛果。

en: Mother of buddhas, you are the moon arisen from the oceanOf the amrita of the world-protector’s compassion.
cn: 世間怙主⼤悲之⽢露，⽔藏所化如⽉諸佛⺟，

en: Like a vine of stainless water-crystalEmbraced by white sandalwood,
cn: 無垢⽔晶珍寶如意樹，⽩栴檀⽊環繞如交抱，

en: Your form is utterly white, captivating, and graceful.I prostrate to you who bloom with the youth of sixteen years.
cn: 潔⽩攝意曼妙⾝形⺟，⼗六妙齡豐腴虔敬禮。

en: Your body is slim, beautiful, winsome, like a young vine.
cn: 雙乳豐盈似果豐碩垂，體態纖細貌美如新樹，

en: Bee-like eyes move within the smiling hearts
cn: 蓮花莊嚴⼿⾜似蓮莖，眼睛如蜂⾶曳虔頂禮。

en: Like blue jewels set within pearlsAre your three luminous eyes.
cn: 藍寶鑲於珍珠瓔珞中，光芒燦耀三⽬如⿅眸，

en: Of an elephant in majesty. I prostrate to you, the essence ofbeauty.
cn: 傲視睥睨象群亦卑微，歡悅美麗⾵華虔頂禮。

en: Always smiling, the petals of your lips are like beautiful,Luminous coral surrounding pearls.
cn: 慈顏微笑雙唇如枝葉，如珍珠般透珊瑚光澤，

en: Your single braided topknot,Adorned by jewels and flowers,
cn: 種種珍寶花朵所莊嚴，髮辮編綴深藍之頂髻，

en: Is like a peacock’s beautiful tail displayed
cn: 如望雲彩展翼之孔雀，美豔如同雀屏虔頂禮。

en: Your ears are ornamented by blue utpalas.
cn: 如⽇璀璨冠冕飄帶飾，於⽿際上⻘蓮花飾品，

en: On a tree-branch of crystal. I prostrate to you.
cn: 宛如⽔晶樹⽊之枝脈，杜鵑展翅美姿虔頂禮。

en: Your earrings blaze with jewels.The light they cast upon your cheeks
cn: ⽿飾珍寶璀璨臉頰上，稀有光澤盡彩繪於上，

en: Of your pink complexion. I prostrate to you.
cn: 臉頰粉紅光澤極悅意，百般相互⾾妍虔頂禮。

en: Strings of great clusters of pearls adorn your throat,Stealing the glory of the night,
cn: 頸上珍珠串鍊之裝飾，極碩⼤故宛如夜明珠，

en: All the moon’s whiteness.
cn: 奪攝皎潔明⽉盡無餘，種種莊嚴於尊虔頂禮。

en: Your bangles and bracelets are like flocks of golden geese.Your necklaces smile beautifully like the luminous foam on theGanges.
cn: 臂飾釧鐲鵝⿈珠鬘旋，瓔珞恆河⽔泡般明晰，

en: Their beauty surpasses the splendor
cn: 美妙莊嚴宛如須彌⼭，威赫無與倫⽐虔頂禮。

en: Of Jambu gold that jingle.
cn: 瞻布那達⼩鈴聲震響，光芒燦爛珍寶之腰帶，

en: I prostrate to you, Tara.
cn: 美麗含笑如波之⾝形，妙顏度⺟於尊虔頂禮。

en: Your right hand bestows. Your left holds an utpala by its stem.
cn: 右勝施印左⼿⻘蓮花，蓮莖持已雙⾜跏趺坐，

en: I prostrate to you who revel with beauty.
cn: ⽩蓮翠⽵綴飾之⽉湖，莊嚴⾃在受⽤虔頂禮。

en: The thought of you dispelsUntimely death, sickness, and the eight dangers.
cn: 疾病⾮時死及⼋怖畏，念彼須臾頃刻即淨除，

en: Your heart is beautified by a wish-fulfilling wheel.I prostrate to you, mother of all buddhas of the three times.
cn: 如意寶輪⼼間極莊嚴，三世諸佛之⺟虔頂禮。

en: With stainless light-rays, waves of amrita.
cn: 於諸⽅分無垢之光芒，⽢露波濤充滿諸佛⺟，

en: May all our wishes be fulfilled.
cn: 以尊無⽐恩德為我等，⼼中所有願求令成辦。

en: Through faith, my palms are joined and my eyes wet with tears.call.
cn: 虔信合掌淚⽔潤眼眸，悲切勸請嗚咽虔祈禱，

en: Regard me with compassionate eyes.Bhagavati, do not be idle.
cn: 咕拉利般懇請⼤悲眼，薄伽梵⺟護佑莫懈怠。

en: Graceful on a seat of the blooming lotusOf excellent wisdom and the stainless moon of compassion,
cn: 妙慧盛⼤開展之蓮花，⼤悲無垢⽉墊上鉅座，

en: Goddess, you inspire the three realms. I bow to you.
cn: 汪洋妙⾳悅⽿之琴韻，三界施命天⼥虔敬禮。

en: Most beautiful maiden, you outshine the brillianceOf a snow-covered mountain. You have one face and twohands,
cn: 妍麗天⼥奪攝雪⼭澤，⼀⾯⼆臂⾷⾹琵琶彈，

en: With which you strum the gandharvas’ lute. You are like a swanmaiden
cn: ⻘壯雄蜂⾶曳之蓮園，宛如天鵝之⼥虔頂禮。

en: Even if thousands of beauties from higher realms weregathered,
cn: ⽔晶樹般隨⾵⽽搖曳，縱聚數千善趣之美⼥，

en: Your face, like the stainless moon, gleams white with yoursmile.
cn: 無垢⽉容笑顏⾊⽩晰，臉頰紅潤如⽇出光澤，

en: Your topknot and earrings blaze with jewels.You are beautiful with fragrant flower garlands.
cn: 珍寶頂髻⽿飾光燦燦，芬芳花朵綴鬘極妍麗，

en: Your ears are adorned by blue utpalasPicked today from the gardens of Parijata.
cn: 天神林園今⽇新擷取，⻘⾊蓮花裝飾於⽿際，

en: You are as beautiful as a cuckoo spreading its wings
cn: ⽔晶樹之枝葉如杜鵑，伸展⽻翼貌美虔頂禮。

en: Veiled by the white clouds of your blouse.
cn: 雙乳豐圓如同⼆雪⼭，其上潔⽩上⾐如雲飄，

en: On it fall necklaces with clusters of pearls.
cn: 臉上珍珠瓔珞串鍊垂，倚持悅意拂塵虔頂禮。

en: Its shore beautified by a golden belt and strings of jewels.
cn: 芳⾹⻘蓮臍間⽔塘邊，⾦⾊腰帶珍寶珠串飾，

en: Your colorful skirt is studded with jewels.
cn: 璀璨珍寶鑲綴之下裙，鬆緩⾏儀曼妙虔頂禮。

en: From the sides, siddhas wave beautiful fans.
cn: 下有⿓⼥獻上供⽔海，從旁成就者搧妙拂塵，

en: In front, vidyadhara maidens play cymbals.I praise you, foremost of all with beauty.
cn: 前⽅持明⼥⼦奏銅鈸，⼀切秀麗之主禮讚尊。

en: On your right, kinnaras sing melodious songs.On your left, delightful gandharva maidens strum lutes.
cn: 從右緊那羅⼥妙歌吟，左⽅⾷⾹⽟⼥奏琵琶，

en: Behind you, immortal maidens hold white parasols.I praise you, principal of all with power.
cn: 後有無死空⾏持⽩傘，⼀切具⼒之主禮讚尊。

en: Ravishing maiden of sixteen years, I could never see enoughOf your illusory body of pristine wisdom.
cn: ⼗六妙齡歡悅之姿具，百看不厭智慧幻化⾝，

en: The mere thought of you brings bliss.I bow to Sarasvati, my special devi.
cn: 僅憶念即賜諸喜樂⺟，特別天⼥妙⾳佛⺟禮。

en: Give me the ability to clearly explainAll teachings to all beings.
cn: 為諸眾⽣於無量經典，清楚解說之⼒祈賜我，

en: In the presence of the learned.
cn: 智者匯集擊敗敵論者，論辯遍勝之⼒祈賜我。

en: Give me the ability to compose a hundred treatisesWith stainless words and language.
cn: 結合⽂詞⾔語無垢之，編撰百論之⼒祈賜我，

en: Through the virtue of praising you in this way,
cn: 如是禮讚所有之善業，願我戰勝制伏諸⽅所，

en: May I quickly attain the state of Manjushri.
cn: ⽣⽣世世為尊所護持，⽂殊菩薩果位願證得，

en: For all who memorize, keep, or read this,
cn: 於此記持解說或讀誦，善業願如上弦⽉增盛。

en: In the northwest of Uddiyana
cn: 鄔⾦剎⼟⻄北隅，蓮花花莖胚芽上，

en: You achieved the wondrous supreme siddhiAnd are renowned as Lotus Born
cn: 獲證殊勝妙成就，得⼤名稱蓮花⽣，

en: Encircled by many ḍākinis
cn: 周圍空⾏眾圍繞，我隨本尊勤修持，

en: guru padma siddhi hūṃGURU PADMA SIDDHI HŪṂClick here for Long Life Prayers
cn: 妙融法師 譯

en: guru padma siddhi hūṃGURU PADMA SIDDHI HŪṂClick here for Long Life Prayers
cn: 法⾝阿彌陀佛我祈請，

en: I supplicate the sambhogakaya Mahakarunika.I supplicate the nirmanakaya Padmakara.
cn: 報⾝⼤悲觀⾳我祈請，化⾝蓮花⽣我敬祈請。

en: My guru, the wondrous nirmanakaya,Was born in India, where he engaged in hearing and thinking.
cn: 我之上師殊勝應化⾝，⽣於印度修習聞思法，

en: Abiding in Uddiyana, he benefits beings.
cn: 親臨⻄藏中部伏眾魔，⾝住鄔⾦境中⾏利⽣。

en: Through your wisdom, grant us siddhi.Through your wisdom, grant us siddhi.Through your wisdom, grant us siddhi.Through your wisdom, grant us siddhi.Through your wisdom, grant us siddhi.Through your wisdom, grant us siddhi.Through your wisdom, grant us siddhi.Through your wisdom, grant us siddhi.Through your wisdom, grant us siddhi.Through your wisdom, grant us siddhi.Through your wisdom, grant us siddhi.Through your wisdom, grant us siddhi.Through your wisdom, grant us siddhi.Clear away our obstacles with power.Clear away our obstacles with power.Clear away our obstacles with power.Clear away our obstacles with power.Clear away our obstacles with power.Clear away our obstacles with power.Clear away our obstacles with power.Clear away our obstacles with power.Clear away our obstacles with power.Clear away our obstacles with power.Clear away our obstacles with power.Clear away our obstacles with power.Clear away our obstacles with power.
cn: 以尊密意賜予我成就，以尊威⼒消除我等障。以尊密意賜予我成就。以尊威⼒消除我等障，以尊密意賜予我成就，以尊威⼒消除我等障，以尊密意賜予我成就，以尊威⼒消除我等障，以尊密意賜予我成就，以尊威⼒消除我等障，

en: Clear inner obstacles inside!Clear inner obstacles inside!Clear inner obstacles inside!Clear inner obstacles inside!Clear inner obstacles inside!Clear inner obstacles inside!Clear inner obstacles inside!Clear inner obstacles inside!Clear inner obstacles inside!Clear inner obstacles inside!Clear inner obstacles inside!Clear inner obstacles inside!Clear inner obstacles inside!
cn: 外來障礙於外界消除，內發障礙於內境消除，外來障礙於外界消除，內發障礙於內境消除，外來障礙於外界消除，內發障礙於內境消除，

en: guru padma siddhi hūṃGURU PADMA SIDDHI HŪṂClick here for Long Life Prayers
cn: 觀⾒蓮師⾝之殊勝時，

en: Your right hand formed the sword mudra.Your left formed the mudra of summoning.
cn: 於右⼿結寶劍之⼿印，於左⼿結勾召之⼿印，

en: With gaping mouth and bared fangs, you gazed upward.Gyalway Dungdzin, beings’ protector,
cn: 張⼝露⽛眼睛向上視。具諸佛傳承眾⽣怙主，

en: guru padma siddhi hūṃGURU PADMA SIDDHI HŪṂClick here for Long Life Prayers
cn: 聽聞蓮師珍寶正法時，

en: Your body was lustrous and brilliant with light-rays.Your right hand held a volume of the tripitaka.

en: You’ve comprehended profound Dharma.
cn: 甚深密法⼼中皆通達，左⼿執持普巴之密續。

cn: 尊前恭敬頂禮⽽皈依。尊前恭敬頂禮⽽皈依。尊前恭敬頂禮⽽皈依。尊前恭敬頂禮⽽皈依。

en: When binding those you bound to samaya,You passed through a stainless, delightful place.
cn: 調伏約束護法神眾時，於彼無垢勝地極歡悅，

en: Crossing the border between India and Tibet,
cn: 於印度⻄藏之邊境處，垂賜加持之後降臨時，

en: On Fragrant MountainLotus flowers were born even in winter.
cn: 於「氣味芬芳⾹積⼭」中，蓮花雖於冬⽇亦出⽣，

en: Springs gave forth the amrita of awakening.In that supreme, delightful place,
cn: 「秋密江秋」之泉⽢露⽔，於彼具勝樂之聖地中，

en: Kyechok Tsulzang, you wore the three Dharma robes.Your right hand held a nine-pointed vajra.
cn: 殊勝⼤⼠相妙披法⾐，右⼿執持九鈷⾦剛杵，

en: Your left hand held a precious vesselFilled with rakta and amrita.
cn: 左⼿執持珍寶製寶盒，寶盒之內盛滿⾎⽢露，

en: You bound dakinis and others to samaya.You saw the faces of yidams and attained siddhi.
cn: 調伏約束空⾏護法眾，親⾒本尊獲證勝成就，

en: Clear inner obstacles inside!Clear inner obstacles inside!Clear inner obstacles inside!Clear inner obstacles inside!Clear inner obstacles inside!Clear inner obstacles inside!Clear inner obstacles inside!Clear inner obstacles inside!Clear inner obstacles inside!Clear inner obstacles inside!Clear inner obstacles inside!Clear inner obstacles inside!Clear inner obstacles inside!

en: guru padma siddhi hūṃGURU PADMA SIDDHI HŪṂClick here for Long Life Prayers
cn: 樹⽴佛陀教法之幢時，

en: You practiced in a slate-mountain forest.
cn: 於「⽚⽯⼭」林中作修持，將其修橛擲⼊虛空界，

en: You retrieved it with the vajramudra and rolled it.
cn: 以⾦剛印引領且搓動，搓動爾後拋⼊旃檀林，

en: Peerless Dükyi Shechen,
cn: 所有藥叉焚盡成灰燼，無可匹敵降魔之尊者，

en: guru padma siddhi hūṃGURU PADMA SIDDHI HŪṂClick here for Long Life Prayers
cn: 蓮師調伏羅剎諸眾時，

en: With a wondrous form and a fine complexion.
cn: 現孺童⾝⽽著化⾝服，⾝形巧妙⾊善極稀有，

en: Your teeth are even, your hair blond and beautiful.With the form of a sixteen-year-old,
cn: ⿒⽛均勻髮⿈澤甚美，如同適滿⼗六歲形相，

en: You wear a variety of precious jewelry.
cn: ⾝上穿戴種種珍寶飾，右⼿執持⻘銅普巴杵，

en: You subjugate maras and rakshasas.Your left hand holds a kila of sandalwood.
cn: 於邪魔羅剎眾作調伏，左⼿執持檀⾹普巴杵，

en: You protect your devoted disciples.
cn: 於虔敬弟⼦眾作救護，頸上佩帶鐵製普巴杵，

en: Nondual nirmanakaya Dzamling Gyen,
cn: 實與本尊天眾無差別，無⼆化⾝瞻部莊嚴者，

en: guru padma siddhi hūṃGURU PADMA SIDDHI HŪṂClick here for Long Life Prayers
cn: 前往調伏⻤域之地時，

en: Appeared a lake of a bowshot’s width.
cn: 於彼熾烈⽕堆地基上，化現⼀箭遠寬之湖泊，

en: You dwelled in wisdom on that lotus.
cn: 端坐蓮花上狀似清涼，於蓮花中猶垂視眷念，

en: You became known as Padmakara,
cn: 此時名號亦稱蓮花⽣，乃是正覺尊親⾃降臨，

en: Nirmanakaya of such wonders,
cn: 如此化⾝稀有誠稀有，請尊運悲於我賜加持，

en: guru padma siddhi hūṃGURU PADMA SIDDHI HŪṂClick here for Long Life Prayers
cn: 尊前恭敬頂禮⽽皈依。尊前恭敬頂禮⽽皈依。

en: Glorious leader of faithful beings,
cn: 蓮師作為藏地之⽇時，於具信眾⽣作引導主，

en: You displayed whatever form would tame.In the pass of Tsangkhala
cn: 隨所應化⽽顯現其⾝，於那章卡⼭之⼭頂上，

en: You bound drala upasakas to samaya.
cn: 調伏約束「居⼠⾝戰神」，於「差威」境之「差謝」地⽅，

en: Twenty-one haughty deva upasakasTo samaya. At Jamtrin
cn: 極為⾼傲之天神居⼠，⼆⼗⼀位皆悉受調伏，

en: In Mangyul you bestowed siddhi
cn: 於「芒油」境之「強⾦」地⽅，賜予四⽐丘悉地成就，

en: Great Kyepak Rikdzin,
cn: 極為殊勝之持明聖尊，祈尊運悲於我賜加持，

en: Through your wisdom, grant us siddhi.Through your wisdom, grant us siddhi.Through your wisdom, grant us siddhi.Through your wisdom, grant us siddhi.Through your wisdom, grant us siddhi.Through your wisdom, grant us siddhi.Through your wisdom, grant us siddhi.Through your wisdom, grant us siddhi.Through your wisdom, grant us siddhi.Through your wisdom, grant us siddhi.Through your wisdom, grant us siddhi.Through your wisdom, grant us siddhi.Through your wisdom, grant us siddhi.

en: In the valley of PalmotangYou bound the twelve Tenmas to samaya.
cn: 於「巴莫」境之「巴堂」地⽅，調伏約束⼗⼆位地⺟，

en: You bound Gangkar Shamey to samaya.
cn: 於⻄藏卡列⼭峰頂上，調伏約束「岡嘎下美」神，

en: In front of Damshö LhanyingYou bound Thanglha Yarshu to samaya.
cn: 於「淡謝拉布」之「寧中」境，調伏「湯拉雅薛」⼭神眾，

en: You bound all gods and rakshasas to samaya.
cn: 於那嘿伯⼭之⼭頂上，調伏所有男⼥⻤神眾，

en: Some offered their life-essence mantras.
cn: 該等主要⻤神眷屬中，或能供獻⽣命之精髓，

en: Some began to guard the Dharma.Some promised to serve.
cn: 或祈願為佛教之護法，或能應允俯⾝為僕役，

en: You with great power, miracles, and strength,You with great power, miracles, and strength,
cn: 威能神變⼒極具威者，祈尊運悲於我賜加持，

en: Dharma like a victory banner,
cn: 殊勝佛陀正法之顯揚，如同勝利幢幡樹⽴時，

en: Samye arose spontaneously, without being built.
cn: 任運興建完成桑耶寺，國王意願皆令能達成，

en: Great being, you bear three names.One is Padmakara.
cn: 此時尊奉⼤⼠三勝名，其⼀名號稱為「蓮花⽣」，

en: One is Padmasambhava.One is Lake-Born Vajra.
cn: ⼀名稱為「⾙⾺桑巴⽡」，⼀名稱為「海⽣⾦剛」者，

en: Your secret name is Dorje Drakpotsal.
cn: 密秘名稱「威猛⾦剛」尊，請尊運悲於我賜加持，

en: At Samye Chimpu you engaged in accomplishment.
cn: 桑耶親普寺中修⾏時，遮卻諸惡之源賜成就，

en: You placed the king and ministers on the path of liberation.You defeated the demonic Bön tradition.
cn: 安置王⾂於彼解脫道，毀滅魔像以及苯教法，

en: You displayed the stainless, precious dharmakaya.You placed the worthy on the level of buddhahood.
cn: 開⽰法⾝無垢寶教法，安置諸具緣者登佛地，

en: guru padma siddhi hūṃGURU PADMA SIDDHI HŪṂClick here for Long Life Prayers
cn: 然後前往鄔⾦淨⼟境，

en: And are now subjugating the rakshasas.You are wondrous, superhuman.
cn: 此時師正調伏羅剎眾，實為⼈中之尊極稀有，

en: You with great power, miracles, and strength,You with great power, miracles, and strength,Your deeds are marvelous, amazing.
cn: ⾏事殊勝神妙難思議，威能神變之⼒具威者，

en: guru padma siddhi hūṃGURU PADMA SIDDHI HŪṂClick here for Long Life Prayers
cn: 具佛三密眾⽣引導主，

en: You’ve abandoned all veils and clearly know the three realms.You’ve gained supreme siddhi, the body of great bliss.
cn: 諸障悉斷三界洞然知，得勝成就殊勝⼤樂⾝，

en: You dispel all obstacles to the accomplishment of awakening.
cn: 修菩提道障礙定消除，祈尊運悲於我賜加持，

en: That was excerpted from “Outer Accomplishment through Supplication” inWish-fulfilling Jewel Heart Scripture of Oral Instructions on the Sadhana ofthe Guru’s Mind, Dispelling All Obstacles, recovered by the emanated
cn: 桑波札巴 伏藏永殿侶握、吉美切林 譯

en: EMAHO!EMAHO!
cn: 奇妙哉！⻄⽅具⾜安樂剎⼟中，

en: His compassionate benefit of beings is unceasing.
cn: 為利瞻部洲眾⽽到來。具⾜不斷利⽣之⼤悲，

cn: 乃⾃法王⾚松德贊始，法王嗣統未斷絕之間，

en: Only friend of the Tibetan kings who protect the Dharma,
cn: 三時恆常不斷賜加持，⻄藏護法國王唯⼀友，

cn: 護持國王法⾏具⼤悲，鄔⾦蓮花⽣前我祈請，

en: Glorious guide of bewildered, ignorant beings,
cn: 悲⼼普視藏⼟諸眾⽣，無明顛倒眾⽣引導主，

en: You have the compassion of unceasing kindness and affection.
cn: ⽅便調治愚癡難調眾，恆具關愛⼼之⼤悲者，

en: When the final evil time of degeneration is reached,
cn: 乃⾄惡世劫濁末期時，每⽇晨昏為利藏⽽來，

cn: 具⾜⼤⼒利⽣⼤悲者，鄔⾦蓮花⽣前我祈請，

en: During the final five hundred years, the degenerate time ofdispute,
cn: 加持願望⾃然獲成就。五百劫末諍劫混濁時，

en: The five poisonous kleshas of all beings will be coarse.
cn: 眾⽣悉皆煩惱五毒粗，煩惱粗重五毒⾏⼊⼼，

en: At such times, protect us with your compassion.You have the compassion to guide devoted beings to higherstates.
cn: 此時惟有蓮師慈悲護，具信導⼊善趣⼤悲者，

en: When terrifying armies of Tartars surround us,And the sacred Wheels of Dharma are threatened withdestruction,
cn: 「霍說」可怖軍隊圍繞時，教乘法輪將遭崩毀 ，
