en: Guru Rinpoche, buddha of the three times,Lord of all siddhis, Mahasukha,
cn: 三時如來上師仁波切，⼀切悉地普主⼤樂⾜，

en: Dispeller of all obstacles, Mara-Subduing Drakpo Tsal:
cn: 滅諸障礙⼤能降魔眾，虔敬祈請祈求賜加持，

en: Bestower of supreme siddhi, foremost dakini of mahasukha:I supplicate at the feet of Yeshe Tsogyal.
cn: 賜勝悉地⼤樂空⾏主，耶喜措嘉尊⾜前祈請。

en: And a wonderful name just like yours.
cn: 勝妙相好猶如蓮師尊，我等願能唯此⽽如尊。(以下四句，妙融法師 譯)

en: Through my praising and praying to you,Through my praise and prayer, please pacify
cn: 敬信祈請尊⾝之⼒故，吾等無論居於何⽅所，

en: Click here for Yelpa’s AspirationASPIRATIONS AND DEDICATIONS THATDIRECT VIRTUE TO AWAKENING
cn: 疾病貧窮戰亂悉平息，佛法吉祥祈令俱增⻑。第五章善業迴向祈願菩提⽂集

en: may I become the disciple of a qualified noble guru.
cn: 並成為具德尊者之弟⼦。

en: Taming my being through hearing, thinking, and meditating—the sources of all higher births and certain liberation—
cn: 願我能以⼀切增上⽣與決定勝之來源：聞思修三學，

en: May the roots of entrance to the Dharma, renunciation and thefour reversals of attitude, arise automatically or spontaneously
cn: 願我能將出離⼼與轉⼼四思維此⼊法之根本，

en: Not falling under the power of places, companions, distractions,or other obstacles to the accomplishment of awakening,
cn: 願我不隨順住處友伴放逸等成就菩提之障礙，

en: the path of the three persons.
cn: 能於三寶救護之下⽽學習三⼠道。

en: may the symbolized ultimate wisdom be transferred to me. Maymy realization become equal to space.
cn: 令我得獲名相義之密趣，證悟等似虛空。

en: pass through the four levels of vidyadharas, and become likethe bodhisattvas Padmasambhava and Vimalamitra.
cn: 並⾏進於四持明地⽽成如蓮花菩薩與毗瑪拉。

en: and gain mastery over the realm of Rich Manifestations inAkanishtha.
cn: 覺醒於樂空不⼆之本質中，⽽統御密嚴剎⼟。

en: and be liberated in the youthful vase body like the vidyadharaGarab Dorje.
cn: 成如童⼦瓶⾝解脫持明歡喜⾦剛。

en: a nondharmic worldly thought for even an instant.
cn: ⼀剎那亦不⽣於⼼。

en: giving me the ability to empty the three realms, the ocean ofsamsara, from their depths.
cn: 成⼗⼒四無所畏之能。

en: I prostrate to the rishis who speak the truth.
cn: 南無實語者。

en: The precious Dharma of the omniscient Buddha,
cn: 有情福樂唯⼀源，遍知佛教⼤珍寶，

en: Never weaken in any place, time, or circumstance.
cn: 時地分際皆不衰，祈令興盛於各⽅。

en: I pray that the peerless lamas, the spiritual friendsWith immeasurable wisdom and splendid kindness,
cn: 無量知與具德悲，以命愛重佛教法，

en: Who cherish the Buddhadharma more than their own lives,Have long lives and flourish.
cn: 無等上師善知識，祈令⻑壽並增⻑。

en: I pray that the members of the Sangha, who practice Dharma,Who illuminate for beings the good path of virtue,
cn: ⽰現有情善妙道，承擔講說與修持，

en: I pray that people be without fear of aging, sickness, and death;That they have a correct mundane view;
cn: ⼈⼈無病⽼死懼，具⾜世間清淨⾒，

en: That they have love for one another;And that immeasurable joy flourish.
cn: 彼此皆具慈愛意，祈令無量喜增盛。

en: I pray that towns be beautified by linesOf white banners stirred by gentle winds,
cn: 微⾵輕拂諸聚落，⽩⾊⾶幡羅列嚴，

en: And that they be filled with affluent people
cn: 珍寶妙⾐莊嚴具，祈令遍滿富裕者。

en: Flashing with garlands of lightning in the sky,
cn: 空中麗雲雷霆繞，地上孔雀舞曼妙，

en: By the beautiful dance of joyous peacocks on the earth,And by rain falling as a gentle sprinkle.
cn: 濛濛細⾬緩緩降，祈令有情喜悅增。

en: I pray that mountains be covered by grass, flowers, andwaterfalls;That valleys be filled with livestock and grain;
cn: ⼭川溪流飾草花，平川牲畜稼⽲豐，

en: And that people sing with delight,
cn: 眾⼈極喜⽽歡唱，祈令無驕無爭戰。

en: I pray that monarchs rule their kingdoms peaceably and well,That their subjects respectfully obey their commands,
cn: 王者和平善執政，百姓敬奉王教敕，

en: I pray that temples be beautiful with images of buddhasAnd with many volumes of the genuine Dharma,
cn: 諸經殿中如來像，正法經卷富嚴置，

en: Give forth their great rains.
cn: 無量神物供養雲，祈令供養⼤霖盛。

en: Spiritual friends who guard Shakyamuni’s Dharma,
cn: ⼀切梵剎興佛教，僧⼈善友盡遍佈，

en: Devoting their time to teaching, debate, and compositionAnd causing study and recitation to flourish.
cn: 講辯著⾏以為命，祈令讀誦廣增⻑。

en: I pray that upasakas, shramaneras, and bhikshus,Male and female, have stainless morality and that through
cn: 善男⼥諸僧俗眾，具⾜無垢戒律儀，

en: The activities of pure hearing, thinking, and meditation,The Dharma of the sugata flourish.
cn: 聞思修之清淨⾏，祈令佛教廣弘揚。

en: And in safe, tranquil places isolated from all disturbances,
cn: 諸⾏者盡棄散亂，離⼀切害將放逸，

en: Increase their qualities of realizationThrough the earnest meditation of a renunciate.
cn: 於寂靜處⼒捨卻，祈令了悟功德興。

en: We practitioners and our entourages,
cn: 清淨勝意⾏祈願，我等⾏者眷屬眾，

en: And that our lifespans and genuine Dharma increase.
cn: 富裕圓滿離邪命，祈令壽命正法增。

en: May I perfect generosity and discipline,May all the conduct of generosity, morality,I pray that through unsurpassable generosity, morality,Patience, diligence, meditation, wisdom and so forth,
cn: 布施戒忍及精進，禪定無上智慧等，

en: I perfect all qualities of the buddhasAnd develop the qualities of learning and realization.
cn: ⾃⾝圓滿諸佛法，祈令教證功德圓。

en: I pray that I nurture others through generosity and gentlespeech;That I teach Dharma properly and act accordingly;
cn: 布施攝與愛語攝，利⾏如法宣說⼒，

en: Helping others more and more through Dharma.
cn: 以法⾃他同事攝，祈令如法利他增。

en: Be pacified, that all favorable conditions
cn: 法之違緣畢竟滅，順緣無餘盡圓滿，

en: Be present in abundance, and that all the virtuesPraised by Shakyamuni increase.
cn: 隨能仁所極稱嘆，祈令彼等善增⻑。

en: The truth of the suchness of all dharmas,
cn: 具德師⼤悲聖化，萬法如如之實諦，

en: And my pure, benevolent intentions,The Aspiration to the Stages of the Path
cn: 我以清淨勝意⼒，如所發願⽽成就。

en: By gathering a mass of the two accumulationsAs vast as space through long effort,
cn: ⻑期勤奮⼆資糧，聚積如廣虛空者，

en: A guide of all beings who are blinded by ignorance.
cn: 無明智盲諸眾⽣，我願成佛去接引。

en: Throughout all my lives until that occurs,May I be kindly cared for by Manjughosha,
cn: 未登佛位⽣⽣世，⽂殊師利慈攝持，

en: Find the supreme path that includes all the Dharma’s stages,
cn: 聖教次第⼤道全，諸佛歡喜願修⾏，

en: Motivated by intense affection, may I dispelThe darkness of beings’ minds by skillfully explaining
cn: ⾃我如實證道義，善巧⽅便勇猛慈，

en: May I uphold the Buddhadharma for a long time.
cn: 清除眾⽣蒙昧垢，惟願永持佛聖教，

en: And those places reached by it where it has declined.
cn: 以⼤慈悲動⼼意，惟願能明利樂藏。

en: Through the stages of the path of awakening, establishedthroughThe wondrous activity of the buddhas and bodhisattvas,
cn: 佛弟⼦等殊勝事，善修菩提道次第，

en: May conditions favorable to the accomplishment
cn: 能撰善道藉順緣，能除逆緣⼈⾮⼈，

en: Ever be without this pure path praised by the buddhas.
cn: 惟願世世不脫離，佛陀稱讚菩提道。

en: While properly practicing with diligenceThe ten Dharma activities of the supreme vehicle,
cn: 於無上乘⼗法⾏，如儀精進修⾏時，

en: Chakrasamvara, Hevajra, Guhyasamaja, Mahamaya,
cn: 樂喜密三及⼤幻化網，⼤威德⾺頭等本尊眾，

en: The five classes of dakinis, the Quick-Acting One, Remati,The four attendants, and the ocean of the samaya-bound;
cn: 五部空⾏迅⾏惹瑪蒂，四護法等護法海會聚，

en: All sources of refuge, the Three Jewels and three roots:
cn: 皈處最上三寶三根本，

en: three times,
cn: 尊等加被⼤悲真實⼒，三時所積⼀切善業⼒，

en: I pray that whatever aspirations I make in this birth
cn: 此⽣乃⾄⽣⽣世世中，願所發願迅即得成辦。

en: Extremely hard to get, but give them meaning.
cn: 此極難得暇滿⼈⾝寶，願無虛度使其具意義。

en: Considering that phenomena are impermanent, unstable, andchanging,
cn: 無常無堅變動之有法，思已無暇願無⻑遠計。

en: Virtuous and unvirtuous actions, and be able to observe causeand result.
cn: 於⼀切善惡粗細業果，願⽣信⼼具⼒護因果。

en: Seeing the suffering of the three realms of samsara,
cn: 極⾒三界輪迴之痛苦，

en: May I develop renunciation for the state of samsara.
cn: 祈願決定出離輪迴處。

en: Be under the refuge of the Three Jewels and three roots.
cn: 我等此⽣來世與中陰，願得三根本尊之救護。

en: May love and compassion arise in my depthsFor all beings of the six states throughout space.
cn: 於等虛空如⺟六道眾，願能由衷⽣起慈與悲。

en: In isolated hermitages with all favorable conditions,
cn: 順緣盡具寂靜⼭居處，祈願專⼀修持究竟證。

en: By a genuine guru with all qualities.
cn: 願我⽣⽣世世能承蒙，具德淨妙上師所攝受。

en: May uncontrived devotion arise from my heart
cn: 於即⼀切佛之根本師，祈願無作虔敬由⼼⽣。

en: Of deities as such and stabilize its clear appearance.
cn: 本然⾃⽣本尊之壇城，知彼即是顯明⽽堅固。

en: Merely by practicing the gurus, yidams, dakinis, anddharmapalas,
cn: 上師本尊空⾏護法眾，隨修即得親⾒本尊⾯。

en: May unbearable warmth and bliss blaze in my body,And the samadhi of bliss-emptiness be stable in my mind.
cn: 祈願⾝之樂暖極熾然，⼼之樂空三昧極堅固。

en: Which are like illusions and dreams.
cn: 願於萬法如夢亦如幻，實執迷惑從根⽽寂靜。

en: And multiply, emanate, transform, and travel within them.
cn: 夜間無勤極能持睡夢，祈願觀增變化悟夢境。

en: May I recognize the clear light of light and deep sleep.
cn: 願於無明愚癡眠黯中，善能識別厚薄之光明。

en: May I cultivate ejection into the dharmakaya, the guru,
cn: 法⾝上師本尊天靈蓋，祈願嫻熟遷移空⾏⼟。

en: May the trikaya of the bardo of becoming be manifest.
cn: 願以三⾝⾃⽣無停歇，令有中陰三⾝⽽現前。

en: In the self-liberation of the four flaws and the spontaneouspresence of the four kayas,May I realize the nature, mahamudra, in this life.
cn: 四過⾃解四⾝任運成，此⽣願悟⼤印之實相。

en: May I carry devotion for the guru; appearances and sounds asdeity and mantra;
cn: 虔敬上師相與本尊咒，願相與⼼成夢幻道⽤。

en: By means of the Noble Ladies who abide in the sky of blissemptiness,May I accomplish the path of generation and completion andreach the Khechari realm.
cn: ⼤樂空性⾄尊空⾏⺟，成⽣圓道⼊空⾏剎⼟。

en: The body is matter. The mind is beyond birth and death.May I realize the fruition, immortality beyond deviation.
cn: 悟⾝為物⼼離⽣死繫，願悟無死無謬之意義。

en: May I see the good face of the inseparable guru and protectorAnd accomplish the four activities and supreme siddhi.
cn: 極⾒上師怙主之妙顏，願得現前成就四勝業。

en: May life, merit, authority, experiences,And realization flourish like a river in summer.
cn: 壽福權勢覺受證悟等，願如夏⽇流⽔之豐沛。

en: power.
cn: 為勝利益佛教與眾⽣，願能統攝三界及三有。

en: May the power of forceful mantra blaze like fire.
cn: 為能度化⼗惡之怨敵，願憤怒咒⼒如⽕奮燃。

en: May all my and others’ wrongdoing, includingBreaches and inherent wrongs, be purified.
cn: 我等與諸有情⾃性等，所作罪業無餘願清淨。

en: May I be able to establish all beings in happiness throughThe generosity of material things, Dharma, and protection.
cn: 願以財施法施無畏施，能令⼀切有情住喜樂。

en: Such as pratimoksha and bodhisattva vows, and samaya.
cn: 別解脫菩薩咒誓⾔等，願任何時⼒持諸善戒。

en: May my diligence equal Shakyamuni’s in the practiceOf the great path to the liberation of myself and others.
cn: ⾃他修最勝解脫道時，願精進如釋迦能仁王。

en: From the luminosity of the mind’s nature, the dharmakaya,beyond extremes.
cn: 願離邊光明⼼性法⾝，寂靜尊禪定不動堅固。

en: May my wisdom regarding all dharmas of samsara
cn: 於諸⼀切輪迴涅槃法，願等如智慧⽂殊菩薩。

en: May I perfect whatever I practice from all the Dharma,
cn: ⼀切顯密新舊之諸法，隨所起修皆得⾄究竟。

en: Strength, wealth, and the kindness that makes me pleasing to
cn: 隨⾒悅意願得愛護⼼。

en: May I be like Jambudvipa’s six ornaments and the eight chariotsTo all the Buddhadharma and particularly the Shangpa lineage.
cn: 於佛教與⾹巴之傳承，願成六嚴⼆勝⼋祖師。

en: May I guide beings through rainbow light and relics.
cn: 臨終之時無肢截惡死，願虹光舍利導引眾⽣。

en: And his disciples, immediately after our deaths.
cn: ⾃他命終旋即⾄淨⼟，願往⽣瓊波⽗⼦⾜前。

en: Not abiding in either samsara or nirvana, may we benefitbeingsAs much as all buddhas and bodhisattvas.
cn: 不住有寂但為眾⽣義，願與諸佛佛⼦眾同等。

en: May all connected to me through sight, sound, thought,Touch, food or Dharma be born among my first disciples.
cn: ⾒聞憶持觸⾷諸法緣，願⽣為⾸弟⼦諸眷眾。

en: Of the short path of secret mantra and the mahayana.
cn: 於諸弟⼦捷徑密乘道，及⼤乘法⾬⽔願淋灑。

en: Ultimately, may I alone establish all beings,Without a single exception, in buddhahood.
cn: 究竟無餘⼀切有情眾，我願令置彼等⼊佛地。

en: Until I and others have achieved buddhahood,May obstacles to Dharma not arise even for an instant.
cn: 乃⾄令⾃他⼊佛果前，違法障礙剎那願不⽣。

en: Receive any happiness and virtue I have.
cn: 願我所造喜樂與善業，六道⼀切有情咸獲得。

en: Based on their receiving that happiness and virtue,May they at all times be happy and comfortable.
cn: 得已因依喜樂與善業，願於⼀切時中⽣福樂。

en: May all the suffering, wrongdoing, and obscurations of allbeingsDissolve into me. May only I experience suffering.
cn: 眾⽣所造痛苦與罪障，願我代受其苦我承擔，

en: Have suffering, wrongdoing, or obscurations.
cn: 以代受⼒令無餘眾⽣，苦痛罪障從此不復⽣，

en: The power of the dakinis and dharmapalas,
cn: 願以最上三寶之聖化，空⾏護法守者眾威⼒，

en: The truth of the unchanging absolute,And the power of infallible relative interdependence,
cn: 勝義無異轉之真實諦，世俗因緣無錯謬之⼒，

en: May all these aspirations I have madeBe quickly fulfilled as I intend.
cn: 如是所發⼀切諸祈願，祈願迅速如意⽽成就。

en: To all who have been my mothers, beings throughout space.
cn: 如是我發⼤願諸善根，迴向如⺟等虛空眾⽣，

en: May they never suffer, be completely happy,And all attain buddhahood together.
cn: 離諸痛苦得獲最勝樂，平等共同獲達正覺果。

en: This was composed by Karma Rangjung Kunkhyab, who sits at the end of therow of the glorious Shangpa Kagyu, in the Male Earth Dragon Year. May thisThe Thirty Aspirations
cn: 浪！

en: May the ultimate pointing-out hit the mark.
cn: 願解要義之指引，願證悟如是於⼼⽣，

en: May we receive the prophecy of the ten strengths and fourfoldfearlessness.
cn: 願得⼗⼒無畏與授記，

en: May we accomplish the gazes and perceive interdependence.
cn: 願成神視⽽出⽣緣起，

en: liberation.
cn: 願能安置群⽣⾄成熟解脫道，

en: May our qualities develop like leaves and petals.
cn: 願功德枝繁葉茂，

en: May the fruition ripen like a wish-fulfilling tree.
cn: 願善果似如意樹般成熟，願虔敬如須彌⼭堅固，

en: May our certainty be without doubt.
cn: 願具確信離疑慮，

en: Wearing the armor of diligence, may we purify the world’sstains.
cn: 願披甲精進淨世間垢，

en: May there be no obstacles to accomplishment; may we bestalwart in austerity.
cn: 願修⾏無障嚴峻苦⾏，

en: May channels, winds, and drops become workable.May our intentions always be pure.
cn: 願氣脈明點任運，願思維恆常清淨，

en: May our bodhichitta never weaken.May we experience the view and meditation of the mahayana.
cn: 願菩提⼼無退壞，願體證⼤乘⾒修，

en: May the dualistic cognition be liberated in its own place.May we be born in excellent families.
cn: 願能所⼆現識⾃地解脫，願得⽣殊勝種性，

en: May we train our intellects in the three wisdoms.
cn: 願以三慧修⼼，願⼊灌頂加被，

en: May we attain vajralike bliss.May we have control over consciousnesses, channels, andwinds.
cn: 願得如⾦剛之樂，願於識、氣、脈⾃在，

en: May our bodies be accomplished as rupakayas.May we directly realize the dharmakaya.
cn: 願⾃⾝成佛⾝，願現證法⾝，

en: Kindly consider me. Support and bless
cn: 悲念於我及我所發願，

en: Are born on the snow-covered mountain
cn: 我及無邊⼀切有情眾，意樂加⾏清淨雪⼭⽣，

en: Of the pure intentions and actions of myself and allinnumerable beings.May they flow into the ocean of the buddhas’ four kayas.
cn: 三輪無著善業⻑流⽔，願皆匯⼊四⾝佛海中。

en: May even the words “wrongdoing” and “suffering”
cn: 乃⾄未得如此果位時，所有⼀切⽣⽣世世中，

en: Be unheard. May we enjoy the splendorOf an ocean of happiness and virtue.
cn: 不聞罪業苦惱之⾳聲，願常受⽤善樂福德海。

en: Relying upon good spiritual friends and receiving the essence ofthe instructions,
cn: 侍善知識得授極⼼要，

en: May we practice them properly without obstacle.In all our lives, may we practice genuine Dharma.
cn: 如法⾏持無諸中斷障，願修勝法⽣⽣世世中。

en: Hearing scripture and reasoning frees from unknowing.Contemplating the instructions conquers the darkness of doubt.
cn: 聞思教理無知遮障離，⼝傳抉擇滅諸疑惑闇，

en: May the brilliance of the three wisdoms increase.
cn: 修⽣光明鮮明顯實相，願令三智明照更增勝。

en: The ground is the two truths, beyond the extremes ofeternalism and nihilism.Through the supreme path of the two accumulations, beyondthe extremes of exaggeration and denial,
cn: 離有無邊⼆諦之基義，離增損邊勝道⼆資糧，

en: The fruition, the two benefits, beyond the extremes of samsaraand nirvana, is attained.May we encounter Dharma free from error and deviation.
cn: 離輪涅邊⼆利獲勝果，願遇正法無錯無誤導。

en: The ground of purification is the mind’s nature, a union oflucidity-emptiness.
cn: 淨基⼼性明空本雙運，能淨⼤印⾦剛⼤瑜伽，

en: What is purified is the stains of adventitious delusion.May the result of purification, the stainless dharmakaya, berevealed.
cn: 所淨忽爾迷幻之垢染，願淨之果無垢法⾝現。

en: Sustaining that without distraction is the point of meditation.
cn: 於基斷諸增益決定⾒，守護於此無散為修要，

en: Training in all aspects of meditation is the best action.
cn: 精通於修即是最勝⾏，願於⾒修⾏三得決定。

en: Empty, it is unceasing, and can appear as anything.Having scrutinized it, may we find it.
cn: 空⽽無礙⼀切皆顯現，願善觀察斷增益深根。

en: We mistake self-appearance, which has never existed, to be anobject.Under ignorance’s power, we mistake self-awareness to be aself.
cn: ⾃顯無實迷執為外境，以無明故執⾃明為我，

en: Under the power of dualistic fixation, we wander in theexpanse of samsara.
cn: 被⼆執驅漂泊諸有界，願破無明總斷惑幻源。

en: Not something, it is not seen even by buddhas.Not nothing, it is the ground of all samsara and nirvana.
cn: ⾮有以⾄諸佛亦未⾒，⾮無此乃輪涅⼀切基，

en: This is not a contradiction; it is unity, the middle way.May we realize the mind’s nature, beyond extremes.
cn: ⾮悖此即雙運中觀道，願能領悟離邊⼼法性。

en: Nothing indicates this, saying, “It is this.”Nothing negates this, saying, “It is not this.”
cn: 無有任何可指此即是，亦無任何反證此⾮是，

en: Beyond the intellect, dharmata is not composite.May we realize the perfect, ultimate truth.
cn: 法性超越⼼識本無作，願能確定圓滿真實際。

en: Not realizing this, we circle in the ocean of samsara.If this is realized, buddha is not elsewhere.
cn: 不悟此故流轉輪迴海，若悟此者證覺⾮他處，

en: Everything is this; there is nothing that is not this.May we know dharmata, exposing the all-basis.
cn: ⼀切諸法無有是與⾮，願⾒法性阿賴耶之患。

en: Appearances are mind; emptiness is also mind.Realization is mind; delusion is our own mind too.
cn: 顯現是⼼空寂亦是⼼，了悟是⼼惑幻亦⾃⼼，

en: Arisen, it’s mind; stopped, it’s also mind.May we sever all misconceptions in the mind.
cn: ⽣起是⼼滅者亦是⼼，願斷⼀切增益於⾃⼼。

en: Not sullied by the meditation that is conceptual effort,Nor stirred by the wind of ordinary distractions,
cn: 未經刻意造作修所染，未遭世俗散亂所動搖，

en: May the ocean of shamatha be unmovingly stable.
cn: 離卻昏沉掉舉之渾濁，願得安寧堅固寂⽌海。

en: When looking again and again at the mind, which has nothing
cn: 數數觀察無可⾒之⼼，洞⾒本然不可⾒之義，

en: Without delusion, may we recognize our own nature.
cn: 永斷是耶⾮耶之疑慮，願此無謬⾃性⾃顯現。

en: Looking at objects, there are no objects; they are seen as mind.
cn: 觀察境時無境唯⾒⼼，尋找⼼時無⼼⼼性空，

en: Looking at both, dualism is liberated in its own place.
cn: 觀察⼆者⼆執⾃解脫，

en: Beyond extremes, it is the great middle way.
cn: 此離作意即是⼤⼿印，此離邊者即是⼤中觀，

en: As this includes everything, it is also called the great perfection.
cn: 此攝⼀切亦名⼤圓滿，願由知⼀得悟⼀切義。

en: Unceasing great bliss without attachment;The unveiled clear light, free from conception;
cn: 無貪著故⼤樂續不斷，無執相故光明離遮障，

en: And spontaneously present freedom from thought, beyond theintellect:May effortless experiences be unceasing.
cn: 無念超思任運⾃顯現，願⽣離勤修受無間斷。

en: May ordinary mind, with nothing to remove or add, to lose orgain,Unelaborate, the truth of dharmata, be realized.
cn: 平常⼼無取捨與得失，願悟離戲法性真實諦。

en: Although beings’ nature is always buddha,
cn: 眾⽣⾃性恆常圓滿覺，

en: Not realizing it, we wander in endless samsara.
cn: 未悟此故無盡漂輪迴，

en: May unbearable compassion arise in usFor all beings who suffer endlessly.
cn: 於諸痛苦無邊有情眾，願我⼼續⽣起強烈悲。

en: The display of unbearable compassion is unceasing.Within that affection, its empty nature arises nakedly.
cn: 悲時難忍⼤悲震撼⼒，空性⾚裸閃耀現於前，

en: May we cultivate this integrated path without errorConstantly throughout day and night.
cn: 於此最勝雙運之⼤道，願我晝夜修習永不離。

en: The eyes and clairvoyances produced by meditation;The ripening of beings; the purification of buddha realms;
cn: 修⼒所⽣眼等諸神通，成熟有情清淨諸佛剎，

en: And the completion of aspirations to the buddhas’ qualities:
cn: 願以成就踐⾏諸佛法，

en: And the power of whatever pure virtue there is,
cn: ⼗⽅諸佛佛⼦⼤悲⼒，所有⼀切清淨善業⼒，

en: Be fulfilled in accord with our intentions.
cn: 願我以及⼀切諸有情，所有淨願如意皆成就。

en: You, the wisdom and kindness of all sugatas of the three timesgathered as one,
cn: 三時善逝悲智之總攝，無量光佛加被之化⾝，

en: Whose aspirations, activity, and compassion are supreme;And all buddhas, bodhisattvas, disciples, and arhats;
cn: ⼤願事業悲⼼超絕倫，諸佛菩薩弟⼦阿羅漢，

en: For beings’ benefit, assembly of great compassion,
cn: 本尊護法尊勝勝救護，為眾⽣義⼤悲之匯聚，

en: realms,Witness my benevolent aspirations so that they may be fulfilled.
cn: 等國⼟塵無量福⽥眾，成就勝意祈願為證明。

en: Life will end for me, for my friends, family, disciples;For those with faith, the living or dead;
cn: 我與我之親眷弟⼦⺠，其他信我眾⽣與亡者，

en: Life will end for donors; for those who’ve worked on my landWho’ve served me food, clothing, drink, or necessities
cn: 四信施眾繞我住處地，⾐⾷資具以三⾨業因，

en: With their three gates; for those beings killed for my food;
cn: 遣使為僕或⾷迴向⾁，續命⽽殺為欲⾏搶罵，

en: And those in between; and also all those who’ve seen, heard,thought of, or touched me;
cn: 調順益友或作障害者，及無記等⾒聞憶觸我，

en: At that time, we’ll enter the presence of Yama, the lord of death.
cn: 任何有緣三界之眾⽣，命終⽽⾄死主閻王前，

en: All alone, we’ll regret the wrong we’ve done.At that time, may we recognize the bardo’s appearances to beillusory
cn: 萬般無益於罪愧悔時，於中陰境相知為幻相，

en: Receive us upon our transference, Avalokita!
cn: 除遣惡劣連結之障礙，願尊遷識相迎觀世⾳！

en: Then, the appearances of the bardo may arise.When everything we see appears as an enemy,
cn: 於彼中陰境相或現起，⼀切所⾒如敵瞋恨時，

en: Be our inseparable guide, Avalokita!
cn: 於歪斜道具能扶正棍，願能不離護送觀世⾳！

en: Through passion and anger we will see bad places as good.When everything we see stimulates passion,
cn: 貪瞋⼒故⾒惡以為善，中陰貪瞋⼀切所⾒時，

en: Close the door to lower states and the islands of rakshasis.
cn: 阻斷惡趣羅剎⼟之⾨，祈賜暇滿珍寶觀世⾳！

en: When beings are tormented for kalpas in hot or cold hells,Cooked and burnt by unbearable, terrifying fire,
cn: 或⼊地獄受冷熱燒煮，難忍懼⽕多劫逼惱時，

en: Rain down the water of grace and the camphor of compassion.Put out the fire of anger, Avalokita!
cn: 以⼤悲⽔慈憫冰⽚⾬，願降滅除瞋恨觀世⾳！

en: Some, in the realm of hungry ghosts, lacking food and drink,
cn: 或⼊餓⻤道⽽缺飲⾷，飢渴⾷⽕兵器等諸苦，

en: With your fingers, untie the knot of their greed, Avalokita!
cn: 掌⼼慈流寶藏令滿⾜，妙指解慳吝結觀世⾳！

en: Some eat one another as animals.
cn: 或⼊畜⽣道⽽互殺戳，奴役或因⽪⾁⽽被殺，

en: In the darkness of their dense bewilderment,Light the torch of pristine wisdom, Avalokita!
cn: 願於癡愚厚稠之黑暗，點燃本智燈⽕觀世⾳！

en: With the great cool, shady mountain of equality,Block the wind of jealousy, Avalokita!
cn: 願以平等⼤⼭之涼蔭，斷除嫉妒⾵⾨觀世⾳！

en: Some, in the deva abodes, are distracted by wealth andpleasure.They lose track of the passing years, die, and fall downward.
cn: 或⼊天⼈道⽽受⽤樂，散逸不知⽇逝死驟臨，

en: Humans are swept away by the four rivers of birth, aging,Sickness, and death into the ocean of the three sufferings.
cn: ⼈等⽣⽼病死四⼤河，匯流⽽⼊三苦⼤海中，

en: Grab them with the hook of your compassion, Avalokita!
cn: ⼆執波濤隨波逐流眾，⼤悲勾為引導觀世⾳！

en: Squeeze into the armor of dualism.
cn: 我執⽗⺟所⽣⼩童眾，⼆執鎧甲緊捆著於⾝，

en: They attack others with the weapons of the five poisons.Turn maras to Dharma, Avalokita!
cn: 揮持五毒兵器之⼠夫，願魔眾轉為法觀世⾳！

en: Seeing samsara as pleasurable, we busily use
cn: 猶如圍繞汙穢之蚊蠅，視輪迴為樂並以三⾨，

en: Our three gates to create suffering.End our meaningless activity, Avalokita!
cn: 無閒暇⽽造作諸痛苦，願減無義之業觀世⾳！

en: May we all gain bodies capable of Dharma,And follow and venerate a qualified spiritual friend.
cn: 願獲此等具法之⾝已，並能依敬供養善知識，

en: May our beings be ripened by his instructions.
cn: 彼之宣說成熟於⼼續，賜予決定之⼼觀世⾳！

en: Through hearing, may we learn indicative and definitiveDharma.Through contemplation, may we achieve shamatha andvipashyana.
cn: 聞⽽總攝了不了義法，思⽽現前⽌觀三摩地，

en: Through meditation, may we realize the view beyond extremes.Return us to our mother, our mind’s nature, Avalokita!
cn: 修⽽了悟離邊之⾒地，願指引⺟⼼性觀世⾳！

en: May renunciation plant the seed of morality.May the shoots of altruistic bodhichitta grow. From them, maythere appear
cn: 願出離⼼成戒律種⼦，欲利他菩提⼼枝葉茂，

en: The colorful flowers of secret mantra’s generation andcompletion.Give rise to the fruition of the three trainings, Avalokita!
cn: 由彼⽣圓次第開妙花，能⽣三學之果觀世⾳！

en: May we choose actions that will cause the right results
cn: 願能如理取捨因與果，為增⻑⼆資糧⾏六度，

en: Sever our ambition for greatness and fame. Cut the tight bondsOf our craving for the eight mundane dharmas, Avalokita!
cn: 名望欲求⼋法之緊縛，斬斷貪執之繩觀世⾳！

en: Having transcended all misapprehensions through the levelsand paths,May we achieve manifest buddhahood, all defects abandoned
cn: 願能斷除虛造地與道，棄諸過患具最勝功德，

en: And all qualities perfectly present. Through nirmanakayas,May we spontaneously benefit beings, Avalokita!
cn: 現得佛果⽽以諸化⾝，任運成就利⽣觀世⾳！

en: samsara,
cn: 願於我結善惡因緣者，⽗⺟為主⾄彼未成佛，

en: May I benefit them as you do, Avalokita!
cn: 為彼眾⽣我亦不成佛，願如尊利眾⽣觀世⾳！

en: Having strayed from the path through ignorance, they areoppressed by sufferingAnd hard to tame. They were not tamed by previous buddhas.
cn: ⼊無明謬道受諸痛苦，難伏如昔佛亦未伏者，

en: Than that of the buddhas of the three times, Avalokita!
cn: 於彼以三時佛之⼤願，事業賜更殊勝觀世⾳！

en: May my slight suffering take the placeOf the enormous suffering of all beings.
cn: 我之⼩苦眾⽣之⼤苦，⽤以布施圓滿我善業，

en: May I offer my virtues and abundance to all beings. For thatpurpose,
cn: 盡與眾⽣成彼之利益，願⽣捨命之勇觀世⾳！

en: May I always be impartial toward all beings of all ranks.May anger which, like a vicious poisonous snake,
cn: 於勝劣中平等⼼堅固，眾⽣瞋恨為害如毒蛇，

en: Harms others both directly and indirectly, be purified.Cause me to be liberated, Avalokita!
cn: 直接間接所造傷害業，賜清淨⽽全解觀世⾳！

en: May I and others always be altruistic.May the thought of our own peace and happiness not arise foreven an instant.
cn: 願我等任何時唯利他，剎那⾃⾝寂樂念不⽣，

en: If through wrongdoing we are born in a place without Dharma,Cause us to pass to a place with Dharma, Avalokita!
cn: ⾮法業等不善若⽣時，願轉為具法處觀世⾳！

en: The rishis, the gods, and all the benevolent virtue
cn: 法界清淨無誤三⼤寶，仙⼈天與勝意輪涅善，

en: Of samsara and nirvana, may these aspirationsBe quickly fulfilled without difficulty, Avalokita!
cn: 發意此等具真實祈願，不久迅即成就觀世⾳！

en: The sugatas of the three times, and you, Padmapani.Bring this about quickly, Avalokita!
cn: 攝持納受於我不遺忘，迅速賜此成就觀世⾳！

en: These words of prayer, aspiration, and lamentation directed at Arya Avalokitawere composed for my own and others’ benefit by the bhikshu ChenngaKönchok Ratna, who is kindly cared for by the Vajradhara of Drikung, the king
cn: 作，願善弘揚。頂禮諸淨妙上師，於⾏七⽀法⾏之上⽽誦。

en: Realize all dharmas are like that.Realize all dharmas are like that.Realize all dharmas are like that.Realize all dharmas are like that.Realize all dharmas are like that.Realize all dharmas are like that.Realize all dharmas are like that.Realize all dharmas are like that.Realize all dharmas are like that.Realize all dharmas are like that.Realize all dharmas are like that.Realize all dharmas are like that.Realize all dharmas are like that.Realize all dharmas are like that.Realize all dharmas are like that.Realize all dharmas are like that.Realize all dharmas are like that.Realize all dharmas are like that.Realize all dharmas are like that.Realize all dharmas are like that.
cn: 如尊了知諸萬法，我等群⽣願定知。如尊了知諸萬法，我等群⽣願定知。如尊了知諸萬法，我等群⽣願定知。(於三時皆無所得)如尊了知諸萬法，我等群⽣願定知。(於三時皆無動轉)如尊了知諸萬法，我等群⽣願定知。(於三時皆無變化)如尊了知諸萬法，我等群⽣願定知。(於三時皆無⾏作)如尊了知諸萬法，我等群⽣願得知。如尊了知諸萬法，我等群⽣願得知。(於三時皆無有⽣)如尊了知諸萬法，我等群⽣願得知。如尊了知諸萬法，我等群⽣願得知。如尊了知諸萬法，我等群⽣願得知。如尊了知諸萬法，我等群⽣願得知。如尊了知諸萬法，我等群⽣願得知。如尊了知諸萬法，我等群⽣願得知。如尊了知諸萬法，我等群⽣願得知。如尊了知諸萬法，我等群⽣願得知。如尊了知諸萬法，我等群⽣願得知。

en: Were not thought, are not thought, are like space.
cn: 仁波切尊知萬法，無別無念如虛空，

en: Were not deluded, are not deluded, won’t be deluded.
cn: 仁波切尊知萬法，無惑無疑無迷惘，

en: Realize all dharmas are like that.Realize all dharmas are like that.Realize all dharmas are like that.Realize all dharmas are like that.Realize all dharmas are like that.Realize all dharmas are like that.Realize all dharmas are like that.Realize all dharmas are like that.Realize all dharmas are like that.Realize all dharmas are like that.Realize all dharmas are like that.Realize all dharmas are like that.Realize all dharmas are like that.Realize all dharmas are like that.Realize all dharmas are like that.Realize all dharmas are like that.Realize all dharmas are like that.Realize all dharmas are like that.Realize all dharmas are like that.Realize all dharmas are like that.
cn: 如尊了知諸萬法，我等群⽣願定知。(於三時皆無迷惑)如尊了知諸萬法，我等群⽣願得知。(於三時皆無滯礙)如尊了知諸萬法，我等群⽣願得知。

en: Weren’t observed, aren’t observed, won’t be observed.
cn: 仁波切尊知萬法，無著無得無所緣，

en: Didn’t move, don’t move, won’t move.
cn: 仁波切尊知萬法，無移無遷無動搖，

en: Didn’t arise, don’t arise, won’t arise.
cn: 仁波切尊知萬法，不⽣無⽣無有⽣，

en: Didn’t cease, don’t cease, won’t cease.
cn: 仁波切尊知萬法，無礙無滅無阻滯，

en: Aren’t things, aren’t nothing.
cn: 仁波切尊知萬法，⾮有亦是⾮⾮有，

en: Have nothing of any complexity.
cn: 仁波切尊知萬法，戲論之相妙寂滅，

en: Are pure in cause, path, and result.
cn: 仁波切尊知萬法，因道果皆為清淨，

en: Are sameness, nothing to take or shed.
cn: 仁波切尊知萬法，無取無捨為平等，

en: Three times, three worlds, are pure, no ignorance.
cn: 仁波切尊知萬法，三時三有無明淨，

en: Aren’t dual, one taste, not two.
cn: 仁波切尊知萬法，無⼆⾮⼆別⼀味，

en: Are naturally luminous, a wheel of jnana.
cn: 仁波切尊知萬法，⾃性光明本智輪，

en: How to make the unworthy worthy and ripen disciples.
cn: 仁波切尊知萬法，未等令等熟所伏，

en: I prostrate to the noble lord Maitreyanatha.
cn: 頂禮⾄尊慈⽒怙主，

en: master, and the Sangha: I pray that you consider me.
cn: 與阿闍梨及僧伽眾憶持我。
願得⾼善種性，

en: May we have long lives free from illness.
cn: 願成最勝⻑壽無病，

en: May we have beauty and great presence.
cn: 相好端嚴，富裕無害，
六⼊淨潔，

en: May our senses be pure and our faculties sharp.
cn: 諸根猛利，

en: May we have genuine enthusiasm and workable minds.
cn: 淨妙喜樂，⼼善調柔，

en: May we receive profound instructions and teachings, andcorrectly practice their meaning.
cn: 依隨⼝訣，聞甚深法，如理修持。

en: As well, through these roots of virtue,
cn: 廣⼤利益⼀切有情。復以此善根，

en: May we acquire the support of thought by becoming completelyused to virtue.
cn: 願能正修⾏⼼所依之善法，

en: May we acquire the conduct by implementing the precioustraining.May we have the ground, stable faith.
cn: 願起修諸⾏學處珍寶，願基之信⼼堅固，

en: May we have great compassion in our beings.May we have the companion, great diligence.
cn: 願⼼續具⼤悲，願友伴具善精進，

en: May we gain the essence, pure wisdom.
cn: 願本質具清淨智慧，

en: Through boundless samadhis, may we unify shamatha andvipashyana.
cn: 願以無際三摩地定，使⽌、觀合⼀。

en: Through immeasurable activity, may we benefit beings byripening and liberating the entire three realms.
cn: 願以無量事業，為眾⽣利，成熟解脫三界無餘。

en: acquire it, may we be content.
cn: 願於尋⽽不得無欲求，於既得已知⾜。

en: May we understand that all gain and fame are like vomit.
cn: 願知⼀切資財名聲如嘔穢，

en: May we consider that praise and pleasure are likeimprisonment.
cn: ⽽信⼀切稱嘆世樂如繫牢獄。

en: May we realize that forms are like froth, and that sensations arelike bubbles in water.
cn: 願悟⾊如氣泡、受如⽔沫，

en: that all fixating cognitions are like emanations.
cn: 願悟⼀切境如⽔⽉、⼀切執幻化。

en: As well, through these roots of virtue,
cn: 復次，以此善根，願我及⼀切眾⽣，

en: May we achieve equanimity toward the eight mundanedharmas.
cn: 願證世間⼋法平等，

en: Having sought it, may we, like Sagaramati, never forget theDharma we have heard.
cn: 願尋得正法已，不忘失所聞正法，⼀如慧海菩薩。

en: May we meditate on the unforgotten meaning, like thebodhisattva Gaganaganja.
cn: 願等持於無忘失之義，猶如虛空藏。

en: May we personify the single flavor of wisdom and compassion,like Avalokiteshvara.
cn: 願智慧與慈悲之體性⼀味，猶如觀世⾳。

en: With wrathful compassion, may we tame the unruly, likeVajrapani.
cn: 願以慈悲之怒，調伏粗惡有情，猶如⾦剛⼿。

en: May the activity through which we tame disciples beunsurpassable, like the Buddha Maitreyanatha.
cn: 願於調伏弟⼦之無上事業，猶如聖者慈⽒怙主(彌勒菩薩)。

en: Like the orb of the autumn moon, may my intellect be spaciousand stainless.
cn: 願我聰慧廣⼤無垢，如秋⽉壇城。

en: Like diverse materials that bestow siddhi, may I bestow all thatis wanted and needed in accord with beings’ wishes.
cn: 願我無餘如意，能施予諸需求，亦如種種成就寶物。

en: May the vast ocean of the sufferings of birth, aging, sickness,death,
cn: 願⽣⽼病死、

en: misery, lamentation, unhappiness,
cn: 憂悲苦惱等

en: agitation, and so forth be quickly dried up.
cn: 痛苦⼤海迅即乾枯。

en: such as wholesomeness, purity, happiness, permanence, virtue,and goodness.
cn: 如同如意寶⾃在王。

en: May all the results of my virtuous actions, such as meditationon the profound meaning, not ripen for me alone.
cn: 願我以修習甚深義等所作善業之⼀切果，

en: May I and all beings throughout space be quickly liberated fromthe ocean of suffering,
cn: 不僅成熟於⾃⾝，願⾃他等虛空之⼀切眾⽣，

en: Then, think that the purpose of dedication, buddhahood; what is dedicated,virtue; those for whom it is dedicated, beings; and the dedicator, yourself, areall your own mind. Meditate for a session with an unaltered mind.
cn: 性。⼼無造作⽽安住，修⼀座法。

en: Vajradhara turned the Wheel of the profound and vast Dharma
cn: 三時諸佛無別持⾦剛，彌勒諸等菩薩之眷眾，

en: Within equipoise, his conduct is unelaborate.
cn: 等持性中無作⽽⾏持，祈願吾亦速能如是成。

en: Disregarding life and limb, he did as the lama commanded
cn: 不顧⾝命圓滿師之囑，依於加持虹光法⾝成。

en: In Pullahari the nirmanakaya benefited beings.
cn: 普啦哈⾥化⾝利有情，祈願吾亦速能如是成。

en: Predicted by the nirmanakaya on the glorious mountain
cn: 淨觀吉祥⼭上幻化⾝，授記薩惹哈尊賜加持，

en: The bodhisattva mastered the realization of the quintessence.
cn: 證悟精髓之主佛陀⼦，祈願吾亦速能如是成。

en: A siddha whose supreme benefit to others flows like water.
cn: 利他勝成就者如續流，祈願吾亦速能如是成。

en: On the jewel mountain of self-arisen pristine wisdom,
cn: ⾃⽣本智珍寶⼭之處，⾄尊密勒功德樹⽊⽣，

en: Spreading the limbs and fruits of siddhas and bodhisattvas.
cn: 成就佛⼦枝葉果繁茂，祈願吾亦速能如是成。

en: The emanation of the guide Youthful Moonlight
cn: 導師⽉光童⼦之化⾝，為於⾾爭時劫利眾⽣，

en: As the precious Dakpo who is incomparable in benefittingothers.
cn: 無⽐利他⾏持岡波巴，祈願吾亦速能如是成。

en: In the dharmakaya sky free of the clouds of obscurations,Shine the sun and moon of wisdom and benefit for others,
cn: 覆雲消散法⾝於虛空，利他本智⼤慧⽇⽉明，

en: The compassionate master from Kham, the Lord of Dharma.
cn: ⾄尊康巴法主⼤悲者，祈願吾亦速能如是成。

en: To have no obstacles in achieving liberationAnd to guide beings in future times.
cn: 解脫道上無有中斷障，未來際中導引利眾⽣。

en: the greatest of those with great wisdom,
cn: 願成具⼤精進者中之最勝者。願成具⼤智慧者中之最勝者。

en: the greatest of those with great qualities,
cn: 願成具⼤氣概者中之最勝者。願成具⼤功德者中之最勝者。

en: the greatest of those with good health,
cn: 願成⻑壽者中之最勝者。願成無病者中之最勝者。

en: the greatest of those with fine form,
cn: 願成具⼤威嚴者中之最勝者。願成⾝形美好者中之最勝者。

en: the greatest of those great in wealth,
cn: 願成出⾝⾼貴者中之最勝者。願成具⼤資財者中之最勝者。

en: the greatest of the great in compassion,
cn: 願成⼤好施者中之最勝者。願成具⼤悲⼼者中之最勝者。

en: the greatest of those with great fortitude,
cn: 願成具⼤鎧甲者中之最勝者。願成具⼤堅毅者中之最勝者。

en: the greatest of those with beautiful voices,
cn: 願成具⼤對治者中之最勝者。願成具美聲者中之最勝者。

en: May I achieve the melody of Brahma endowed with sixtyqualities.
cn: 願得具六⼗功德之梵⾳。

en: May they never be displeased for even an instant.
cn: 願剎那皆不令善知識不歡喜。

en: True Dharma.
cn: 願持三學之根基已如理⾏持⼀切正法。

en: May I perfect the power of the qualities.May I uphold the customs that have been passed down.
cn: 願圓滿功德之⼒。願執持傳續之道統。

en: May I, the child, walk in my father’s footsteps.
cn: 願⽗傳⼦繼。願練達空性與慈悲。

en: May I accomplish the two benefits, of self and other.May the wisdom of realization arise.
cn: 願成就⾃他⼆利。願⽣起證悟之本智。

en: May I dispel the darkness of ignorance.
cn: 願驅散無明闇昧。

en: With great compassion, may I be unable to bear others’suffering.
cn: 願以⼤悲⼼不忍他⼈之苦。

en: With great instructions, may I be able to introduce positivequalities into others’ beings.
cn: 願以⼤⼝訣，得能令他⼈⼼續納⼊功德。

en: With compassion, may others be liberated.
cn: 願以悲⼼，令他⼈解脫。願弟⼦時機成熟。

en: May I be skilled in the means of interdependence.May subject and object be purified like space.
cn: 願通達緣起⽅便。願能所如虛空般清淨。

en: May the interdependence of action and result arise.
cn: 願練達不忍悲⼼。願⽣起業、果之緣起。

en: May I gain stability in faith and respect.
cn: 願虔敬⼼無有起伏。願得穩固之敬信。

en: May my belief never be interrupted.
cn: 願信解無有中斷。願師⼼我⼼合⼀。

en: May faults be perfected as qualities.
cn: 願清淨過患具⾜功德。願捨下此⽣。

en: May I feel revulsion from deep within.
cn: 願⼼中⽣起無需求。願由衷厭離。

en: May I eradicate attachments.May my mind not engage in sensory pleasures.
cn: 願根除貪戀。願⼼不涉妙欲。

en: May I penetrate the points of reverse meditation.
cn: 願⼼不涉他⼈⾏為。願趨⼊逆修之要點。

en: May I gain control over the antidotes.May I gain mastery over the remedies.May I gain confidence in equal taste.
cn: 願於對治法得⾃主。願於平等味得定⾒。

en: May I be equanimous about the eight concerns.May I suppress the eight concerns.May pleasure and pain have the same flavor.
cn: 願制伏⼋法。願苦樂成平等味。

en: May bad circumstances appear as aids.
cn: 願逆緣現為友伴。願妄念現為事業。

en: May I be free of negating, proving, giving up, and taking up.
cn: 願阻絕希求與恐懼之淵。願遠離破⽴取捨。

en: May all the circumstances that appear, good or bad, have thesame flavor in the dharma nature.
cn: 願⼀切善惡緣之顯現於法性中成平等味。

en: May appearances arise as the lama.May appearances occur as illusions.
cn: 願普⽣淨觀。願顯相現為上師。

en: May appearances occur as the yidam.May appearances occur as the dharmakaya.
cn: 願顯相現為本尊。願顯相現為法⾝。

en: May appearances occur as the three kayas.May appearances occur as bliss.
cn: 願顯相現為三⾝。願顯相現為樂。

en: May appearances arise as the lama.May appearances occur as illusions.May appearances occur as interdependence.
cn: 願顯相現為幻相。願顯相現為緣起。

en: May appearances occur as jewels.
cn: 願顯相現為珍寶。願能頂戴善、惡、中三者。

en: May we realize ourselves and others to be equal.
cn: 願悟⾃他⼀切為平等性。願能交換苦樂。

en: enthusiasm.
cn: 願能欣喜承擔他⼈⼀切痛苦。
願承擔已，具備能⾏持之悲⼼。

en: May I have equal taste in the meaning of emptiness.
cn: 願以悲⼼轉其為修道。願於空性之義具平等味。

en: May the nature of suffering—undefiled great bliss—appear.
cn: 願苦之⾃性無漏⼤樂展現。

en: enthusiasm.
cn: 願懷欣喜將⾃⾝所有喜樂給予他⼈。

en: May I penetrate the point of one being enough.
cn: 願趨⼊以⼀抵百之要點。

en: May I achieve stability in equipoise.
cn: 願得穩固之平等住。願「⽌」達究竟。

en: May I develop infinite qualities such as clairvoyance andmiracles.
cn: 願⽣起神通與神⾜等無量功德。

en: May thoughts arise as the dharmakaya.
cn: 願斷除覺知之根。願妄念現為法⾝。

en: May faults arise as qualities.May confusion appear as wisdom.
cn: 願引過患為功德。願迷惑現為本智。

en: May I realize samsara to be nirvana.May suffering arise as bliss.
cn: 願悟輪迴即涅槃。願苦現為樂。

en: May I achieve the supreme siddhi of mahamudra.May I attain the supreme siddhi of mahamudra.May obstacles be gathered into siddhi.
cn: 願障礙攝於成就。願得殊勝⼤⼿印之成就。

en: May I have power over appearances.
cn: 願能攝服顯相。願普為結緣。

en: May all those connections be meaningful.
cn: 願所結緣具義。

en: ever become a wrong or neutral path for even an instant.
cn: ⼀剎那亦不成顛倒與無記之道。

en: as well as their seeds be cleansed and purified right now.along with their seeds and propensities.
cn: 因、果、種⼦，當下即清除淨化。

en: May I receive the four empowerments.May I recognize pristine wisdom.
cn: 願得四種灌頂。願識得本智。

en: May I achieve stability in creation and completion.
cn: 願能清淨持守誓戒。願得穩固之⽣圓次第。

en: May I accomplish the four activities.
cn: 願成就四種事業。願知細微之因果。

en: May I understand what awareness entails.
cn: 願知覺知之進退。願知善惡之取捨。

en: May I fully comprehend appearances.
cn: 願了達顯相。願通達外、內、密三者之緣起。

en: May I gain control over others’ perceptions.
cn: 願攝服他⼈看法。願能廣⼤祈願。

en: by way of the four activities,by way of the four immeasurables,
cn: 願以四事業⽽成就。願以四無量⼼⽽成就。

en: by way of the three trainings,
cn: 願以三學⽽成就。願以⼋⼤悉地⽽成就。

en: May I accomplish unfathomable benefit for beings withouteffort or strain,
cn: 願無有努⼒勤作地成就無量眾⽣利。

en: without regard for life or limb.
cn: 願無視⾝體與性命。

en: May I accomplish unfathomable benefit without fatigue ordiscouragement.
cn: 願無有疲勞困倦地成就無量眾⽣利。

en: flesh and bones, limbs and appendages, hair and pores, teethand nails,
cn: 頭髮與汗⽑、⽛⿒與指甲、⾎與⿈⽔、油與脂肪、

en: blood and bile, fat and grease, five senses, and so forth.
cn: 五根等等成就無量眾⽣利。

en: May their experience be stable and continuous.May they develop the supreme samadhi.
cn: 願彼等之體會不間斷⽽穩固。願彼等⽣起殊勝禪定。

en: May they effortlessly attain all the supreme and ordinarysiddhis.
cn: 願彼等無勤證得共通與殊勝之成就。

en: and who insult and ridicule me, cleanse and purify right now
cn: ⼝出惡⾔並嘲弄者，得以當下即清除淨化我之

en: as well as their seeds be cleansed and purified right now.along with their seeds and propensities.
cn: 三時⼀切惡業，以及不善之因、果、種⼦、隨眠等。

en: May the fully-ripened results neither arise in their beings norbecome obstacles to awakening to buddhahood.
cn: 願異熟之果不在彼等⼼續中⽣起，亦不成為覺醒之障礙。

en: In all lifetimes, may all my companions who likewise practicechaste conduct
cn: 於⼀切⽣世，願我所有同等⾏清淨⾏持之友伴，

en: By these roots of virtue, may all the bodies, speech, minds,qualities, activity,
cn: 願上師三世諸佛之⾝、語、意、功德、事業、壽元、

en: May all sentient beings of the three times be happy
cn: ⼀切功德皆圓滿。願三時所有眾⽣皆離苦得樂，

en: and then come irresistably under my influence with sincerityand delight.
cn: 從⽽誠摯歡喜且不由⾃主地為我所攝服。

en: and may they completely perfect all excellent qualities.
cn: 從⽽清淨所有錯誤之過患，完全圓滿⼀切善功德。

en: May I effortlessly accomplish vast benefit for beings.
cn: 願無勤成就廣⼤眾⽣利。

en: with greatest realization in every lifetime.
cn: 復次，以此善根，於⼀切⽣世，願⽣起殊勝證悟。

en: May they develop the supreme samadhi.May I be born with continual experiences.
cn: 願⽣起殊勝禪定。願⽣起不間斷之體驗。

en: May thoughts of selfish desire for this life not occur for even aninstant.
cn: 願剎那亦不⽣私欲此⽣之念。為利益眾⽣，

en: May my life, influence, prosperity, and retinue flourish.
cn: 願壽命、權勢、受⽤、眷屬昌盛。

en: Jewels,
cn: 願消滅所有上師之敵、詆毀三寶威望、毀壞佛陀教法、

en: May I take afflictions as the path.
cn: 願轉煩惱為道⽤。願轉⻤神為道⽤。

en: May I give up ego-clinging.
cn: 願轉死亡為道⽤。願捨棄我執。

en: May I not view suffering as faulty.May I not intentionally accomplish the eight dharmas forhappiness.
cn: 願不視痛苦為過患。願不蓄意為快樂⽽⾏⼋法。

en: May I gain influence over gods and spirits.
cn: 願攝服⻤神。願轉障礙為道⽤。

en: May I gain mastery over appearances.
cn: 願於⼼得⾃在。願於顯相得⾃在。

en: May I gain mastery over appearances.May I gain mastery over the elements.
cn: 願於四⼤得⾃在。願於業⼒得⾃在。

en: May I gain control over the antidotes.May I gain mastery over the remedies.May I gain mastery over the afflictions.
cn: 願於煩惱得⾃在。願於對治法得⾃在。

en: May I gain mastery over the four methods of nurturing.May I gain mastery over the four activities.
cn: 願於四攝法得⾃在。願於四事業得⾃在。

en: May I gain mastery over the four conducts.May I gain mastery over body, speech, and mind.
cn: 願於四⾏持得⾃在。願於⾝、語、意三者得⾃在。

en: May I gain mastery over possessions.
cn: 願於壽命得⾃在。願於受⽤得⾃在。

en: May I gain mastery over magnificence.May I gain mastery over compassion.
cn: 願於威嚴得⾃在。願於悲⼼得⾃在。

en: May I gain mastery over birth.May I gain mastery of longing.
cn: 願於出⽣得⾃在。願於敬慕得⾃在。

en: May I gain mastery of aspirations.May I gain mastery over miracles.
cn: 願於祈願得⾃在。願於神⾜得⾃在。

en: May I gain mastery of pristine wisdom.
cn: 願於本智得⾃在。願於法得⾃在。

en: May I gain mastery over all births, migrations, and sentientbeings.May I gain mastery over death.
cn: 願於⼀切眾⽣得⾃在。願於死亡得⾃在。

en: May I recognize the luminosity in the first bardo and awaken asthe dharmakaya of benefit for myself.
cn: 願於初期中陰認出明光，從⽽覺醒為⾃利之法⾝。

en: If the appearances of the bardo of becoming occur for me, mayI recognize the bardo as being the bardo.
cn: 設若中有之顯相顯現於我⾯前，願我認識中陰即是中陰。

en: May the fire of luminosity incinerate all the imprints of things.
cn: 願明光之⽕燒盡⼀切事物之習性。

en: May I gain control over awareness.
cn: 願阻絕胎⾨。願於覺性得⾃主。

en: May I take birth intentionally and accomplish vast benefit forothers.
cn: 願如所願投⽣，並廣成他利。

en: May I have the six clairvoyances.May I attain the clairvoyance of the divine eye.
cn: 願具備六神通。願得天眼通。

en: May I attain the clairvoyance of the divine ear.
cn: 願得天⽿通。

en: May I attain the clairvoyance of remembering previous lives.
cn: 願得宿命通。

en: May I attain the clairvoyance of knowing others’ minds.
cn: 願得他⼼通。

en: May I attain the clairvoyance of miracles.
cn: 願得神境通。

en: May I attain the clairvoyance of extinguishing defilements.
cn: 願得漏盡通。願得五眼。

en: May I take appearances as the path.
cn: 願具有智眼。願以顯相為道⽤。

en: May bliss arise.May warmth arise.
cn: 願⽣起樂。願⽣起暖。

en: May nonthought arise.May the channels be blissful.
cn: 願⽣起無念。願脈樂。願氣柔。

en: May the samadhi of bliss and emptiness arise.
cn: 願⽣起樂空禪定。願於⽇間練達幻⾝。

en: May the realization of freedom from extremes arise throughthe peaceful samadhi.
cn: 願以寂靜禪定⽽⽣離邊之證悟。

en: May I accomplish wrathful activity through the wrathfulsamadhi.
cn: 願以忿怒禪定成就威猛事業。

en: May wants and needs shower like rain through the samadhi ofincreasing.
cn: 願以增⻑禪定令所需所欲如⾬般降臨。

en: May I gain power over appearance through the ultimatesamadhi.
cn: 願以勝義禪定攝服顯相。

en: May I accomplish whatever I wish through the samadhi ofintense diligence.
cn: 願以威猛精進禪定令所思皆成辦。

en: May I achieve the supreme and ordinary siddhis.May I gain influence over dakinis.
cn: 願得共通與殊勝之成就。願攝服空⾏。

en: May I achieve the kaya of omniscience of all aspects.
cn: 願練達悲⼼。願得遍知⼀切相之⾝。

en: May I subjugate all vicious people.May I gain influence over all three realms.
cn: 願制伏⼀切凶殘者。願攝服三界。

en: May I be skilled in the means of interdependence.May I bring my deeds to their culmination.
cn: 願⾏持達究竟。願通達世間緣起之⽅便。

en: May I achieve accomplishment in wrathful activity.May the Buddha’s teachings spread and flourish.
cn: 願於威猛⾏得成就。願佛陀教法弘揚昌盛。

en: May I subjugate all vicious people.May they never wane.
cn: 願佛陀教法不衰滅。願制伏所有危害教法之凶殘者。

en: May afflictions and thoughts be pacified.
cn: 願開啟眾⽣所需所欲之寶藏。願平息煩惱與妄念。

en: May all false guides be eliminated.May impermanence arise in my being.
cn: 願消滅所有顛倒引導。願無常於⼼續中⽣起。

en: May I remember death.
cn: 願憶念死亡。願捨下此⽣。

en: May I be freed from all attachments.
cn: 願壓制⼋法。願從⼀切執著中解脫。

en: May my mind become workable.
cn: 願⼼堪能作⽤。願⼼柔順堪能利⽤。願⼼向法。

en: May un-Dharmic thoughts not arise for even an instant.
cn: 願剎那亦不⽣⾮法之想。願練達慈⼼、悲⼼、菩提⼼已，

en: May I reverse clinging to appearances as true.
cn: 願悟顯相與⼼無分別。願捨棄執著顯相為實。

en: May all auspiciousness, joy, and goodness appear.
cn: 願⽣起⼀切吉祥與圓滿。

en: May I achieve all excellent wealth and enjoyments.
cn: 願得⼀切珍寶、受⽤、圓滿。

en: throughout space.
cn: 願如我眷眾之數，調伏等虛空之⼀切眾⽣。

en: May all the results of my aspirations ripen and be accomplishedin this very lifetime.
cn: 願⼀切祈願之果於此⽣即成熟並成辦。

en: May they endure until samsara has been emptied.
cn: 願輪迴未空之前住留。

en: May I be their equal in emanations.
cn: 願我等同彼等之⾏誼。願我等同彼等之化現。

en: May I be their equal in confidence.
cn: 願我等同彼等之智慧。願我等同彼等之氣概。

en: May I be their equal in pristine wisdom.
cn: 願我等同彼等之能⼒。願我等同彼等之本智。

en: May I be their equal in compassion.
cn: 願我等同彼等之悲⼼。願我等同彼等之神變。

en: May I be their equal in clairvoyance.
cn: 願我等同彼等之神通。願我等同彼等之利眾。

en: Gurus, yidams, viras,Dakinis, and dharmapalas:
cn: 上師本尊與勇⽗，空⾏護法守者眾，

en: And cause the fulfillment of my aspirations.
cn: 於我等⾏怙念已，祈令願望得成就。

en: Through the virtues of samsara and nirvanaAccumulated by me and others in the three times,
cn: ⾃他三時所積聚，輪迴涅槃諸善業，

en: And the virtue of this aspiration,May I and all others achieve buddhahood.
cn: 或於此處所作善，願令⾃他成佛道。

en: In whatever places we are born,
cn: 隨所投⽣諸處所，無有內外之損害，

en: May the Buddhadharma spread there.May all that is wanted or needed be abundantly present.
cn: 願佛教法廣弘揚，欲求圓滿⽽富⾜。

en: Meet spiritual friends,
cn: 得獲暇滿⼈⾝寶，亦能值遇善知識，

en: Practice genuine Dharma correctly,And achieve perfect buddhahood.
cn: 如理⾏持諸正法，成就圓滿正覺佛。隨所住於何處所，⼀切資財皆如法，

en: Be surrounded by a pure retinue,
cn: 清淨眷屬悉圍繞，⼀切有情之受⽤。

en: Correctly guard their vows,Correctly practice Dharma,
cn: 以此如理護⼫羅，以及如理⾏正法，

en: And achieve the undefiled fruition.
cn: ⽽得無漏之果位。由⼊六度之⾏⾨，

en: May they generate bodhichitta,Realize twofold selflessness,
cn: ⽽發殊勝菩提⼼，及悟⼆無我之義，

en: And quickly attain the fruition of buddhahood.Having entered the gate of the vajrayana, may they receiveempowerment,
cn: 正覺果位願速成。由住⾦剛乘之⾨，

en: And through stable generation and completionAchieve supreme and common siddhi,
cn: 得灌⽣圓次第固，得獲共不共悉地，

en: And attain buddhahood in this life.
cn: 此⽣即得成佛果。若⾒聞憶觸我者，

en: Achieve buddhahood.In pure buddha realms,
cn: ⼀切皆得正等覺。於諸清淨之國⼟，

en: Amid excellent retinue and resources,
cn: 眷屬資財盡圓滿，由轉無上正法輪，

en: And achieve buddhahood for beings’ benefit.
cn: 為眾⽣義願成佛。

en: Through these roots of virtue may I have longevity, freedomfrom sickness, and no obstacles to accomplishment,
cn: 願以此善根於成就⻑壽、無病、不⽣障礙，

en: and may I rest equally, throughout both meditation andpostmeditation, in emptiness and compassion.
cn: 於⼀切根本、後得，住於空性與⼤悲。

en: pleasing to all beings.
cn: 於⼀切⾒聞，以廣⼤利益，⽽令⼀切有情歡喜悅意。

en: May the negative forces of Mara be pacified and defeated.
cn: 願輪迴惡道滅盡空無，願黑魔部眾寂滅遣除，

en: May the innumerable beings become happy and comfortable.
cn: 願無邊眾⽣幸福喜樂，

en: May the scriptures of genuine Dharma spread and flourish.
cn: 願佛典正法弘揚興盛，

en: May spiritual friends have long lives.Through these aspirations of mine,
cn: 願上師善知識壽命⻑久，願以我所發願，

en: accumulated,
cn: 復次，為能以我等⼀切眾⽣之所作⼀切善根，

en: I dedicate them to their knowing samsara to be suffering andliberation to be sublime happiness.
cn: 為能正知輪迴苦與涅槃樂，⽽⾏迴向。

en: I dedicate them to their never abusing their bodies, thinking
cn: 甚或未能遵守佛典所出之三乘戒律，

en: I dedicate them to their never devoting their lives towrongdoing, imagining it to be Dharma.
cn: 為能不於此⽣精進於罪⾏，卻認作是佛教，⽽⾏迴向。

en: I dedicate them so that they never follow charlatans who claimhidden powers
cn: 於真正淨妙聖者之功德⾏傳不⽣信⼼，

en: I dedicate them to their giving rise to the unfabricated faithtaught in the sutras and tantras.
cn: 為能於彼⽣起經續所說之無造作信⼼，⽽⾏迴向。

en: I dedicate them to their generating, in their teacher’s presence,the bodhichitta taught in the sutras and tantras.
cn: 為能於彼上師尊前持取菩提⼼，⽽⾏迴向。

en: I dedicate them so that they generate bodhichitta and meditateon the path the Buddha taught.
cn: 為能發菩提⼼已，修持佛陀教敕之道，⽽⾏迴向。

en: I dedicate them so that once they attain that, the benefit forthemselves and others arises effortlessly and spontaneously.
cn: 為能於得果後，無勤任運成就利他，⽽⾏迴向。

en: I dedicate them to, in the meantime, their never giving rise toattachment or aversion toward any being.
cn: 為能於眾⽣恆常不⽣貪瞋之⼼，⽽⾏迴向。

en: I dedicate them to their never becoming disastrously greedy forfood and wealth.
cn: 為能不於財⾷慳吝⽽成禍根，⽽⾏迴向。

en: I dedicate them to their never craving pleasure so much thatthey mindlessly cease virtuous action.
cn: 為能不致⼤貪愛於妙欲⽽善業⾃然斷除，⽽⾏迴向。

en: I dedicate them to their never uncompassionately preachingviolence as Dharma.
cn: 於他⼈無悲⼼⽽說諸種傷害法，為不成其因，⽽⾏迴向。

en: renunciation, developing the intention to draw otherpractitioners into the world.
cn: 為能無欲無求於⼼不⽣，⾏者不思⼊世間，⽽⾏迴向。

en: and therefore dies without any freedom whatsoever.
cn: 不能作主毫無餘留⽽命終，為不致此⽽⾏迴向。

en: deceived by their own lies, maddened by their own döns, andfinally, when their hair is completely white,
cn: ⾃魔⾃瘋，到頭滿頭⽩髮之際，

en: Jetsun Milarepa said, “As I am a yogin who has accomplished true words, it isappropriate for me to make a good aspiration for the present and ultimatehappiness and well-being of us all.” Then he sang this song of aspiration:
cn: 語畢，即說發願曲：

en: Marpa the Translator: I bow to your feet.
cn: 究竟⼤願眾⽣依，敬禮瑪爾巴譯師前；

en: Meet in the realm of Abhirati.Meet me in Abhirati.Meet me in Abhirati.All you patrons present here,
cn: 願於淨⼟得相遇。所有⼀切諸施主，

en: May all practice Dharma at all times.
cn: ⼀切⽣活皆如法。⾒我聞我說法者，

en: Recollect my life,
cn: 思維我之傳記者，聞我名號事業者，

en: Meet in the realm of Abhirati.Meet me in Abhirati.Meet me in Abhirati.
cn: 願皆相會淨⼟中。於我事業與傳記，

en: Meet in the realm of Abhirati.Meet me in Abhirati.Meet me in Abhirati.
cn: 禮拜轉繞與供養，願皆會聚淨⼟中。

en: May you, through my austerities,Have no obstacles or pitfalls.
cn: 以我苦⾏修持⼒，願無錯謬無障礙。

en: In engaging in austerity for Dharma.
cn: 若有為法修苦⾏，當得無量之福德；

en: There is immeasurable kindnessIn facilitating and encouraging it.
cn: 勸⼈修⾏或⾃修，皆獲無量⼤功德。

en: There is immeasurable blessing
cn: 若有聞我傳記者，當獲無⽐⼤加持；

en: May beings be liberated just by hearing it.
cn: 三⾨無量加持⼒，僅聞名號得解脫。

en: May all be accomplished just by thinking it.May my places, the places I’ve stayed,
cn: 願依思念即圓滿，我之國⼟及住處，

en: Be filled with joy and well-being.
cn: 所有⼀切諸眾⽣，所往無處不安樂。

en: Like earth, water, fire, and air;Wherever the elements of earth, water,Fire, wind, and space are present,
cn: 地⼤以及⽔⽕⾵，空等五⼤所遍處，

en: May gods, nagas, and the rest of the eight classes;
cn: 我亦⻑久周遍住；天⼈⿓族等⼋部，

en: Local gods; and bhutas not cause
cn: ⼭神⻤魅亦如是，不作絲毫之損惱。

en: May your wishes be fulfilled in accord with Dharma.
cn: ⼼願如法得成就，乃⾄蟲蟻⿃獸等，

en: Especially Avalokita, protector of the Land of Snow;
cn: 無謬誤之皈處勝三寶，尤其雪域怙主觀世⾳，

en: Noble lady Tara; Guru Padmakara:I pray to you. Consider your pledges and promises.
cn: ⾄尊度⺟蓮花⽣⼤⼠，祈憶往昔承諾與誓⾔，

en: Through the incorrect thoughts and actions of beings indegenerate times
cn: 祈願加被諸願畢竟成。濁世眾⽣顛倒之⼼⾏，

en: There are new human and animal diseases.
cn: 內外⼤種混亂之因緣，過去未聞之⼈畜疫疾。

en: Blight, frost, hail, and poor harvests; war and fighting;
cn: 曜⿓王魑魅罪惡魔病，銹病霜雹惡年戰爭亂，

en: Earthquakes, fire, danger from the four elements;
cn: ⾬⽔不調⼤雪⿏惡兆，地震⽕災四⼤諸恐懼，

en: And especially invasions that threaten the Dharma.
cn: 尤其毀壞佛教外寇等，傷害此地雪域諸⺠族，

en: Be quickly pacified and eradicated.
cn: 願速寂滅由根本摧伏，⼈與⾮⼈⼀切諸眾⽣，

en: Naturally generate precious bodhichittaAnd be free from malevolent thoughts and actions.
cn: ⼼中勝菩提⼼⼤珍寶，⾃然⽽⽣離損害⼼⾏，

en: May they love one another.
cn: 互相具⾜慈愛之⼼念，雪域中邊幸福且昌盛，

en: May the Buddhadharma spread, flourish, and long remain.Through the power of the truth of the three roots, buddhas, andbodhisattvas;
cn: 如來聖教弘盛且久⻑，三寶諸佛菩薩真實⼒，

en: The power of all the roots of virtue in samsara and nirvana;And the power of our pure benevolence;
cn: 輪涅善業根本盡所有，以我等之勝意樂善⼒，

en: May what we have prayed and wished for be accomplished.
cn: 祈所發願之果得成就。

en: The lord guru Jamyang Khyentse Wangpo said to me, “Because of the greatuncertainty of the present time, I pray six times each day for the well-being ofTibet. It is important that you do so as well.” In accordance with that
cn: 的祈願，你也應如是重視。」我為提醒⾃⼰⽽撰此⽂，願如是成就。羅卓泰耶於如同札⽇聖地之寶崖，藏曆⼗⼆⽉上半⽉有星宿成合之早晨。第六章

en: The greatest of devas, the Buddha Shakyamuni,Once abided at Rajgriha, on Vulture Peak Mountain.
cn: 天中勝天釋迦佛，住王舍城靈鷲⼭，

en: bodhisattvas,
cn: 阿羅漢僧菩薩眾，

en: At that time Shariputra supplicated,
cn: 彼時舍利⼦啟請，為利眾⽣燃法燈，

en: May these pure aspirations be fulfilled.
cn: 吾亦淨信⽽皈依，願此正淨願成就。

en: Is the realm called Abhirati.
cn: 此東⽅過⼤千界，國⼟名妙喜淨⼟，

en: Its qualities are immeasurable.May we practice Dharma in that realm,
cn: 無量功德之佛⼟，我等於彼受⽤法。

en: Engage in that grand conduct with great joy,
cn: ⼀切菩薩之契⼊，最勝⾏與⼤喜樂，

en: Generate bodhichitta, don the armor of diligence,And affirm the qualities of others there.
cn: 發最勝⼼披鎧甲，願⼊詮說功德列。

en: In the past, the Buddha Mahachakshu
cn: 往昔圓滿⼤眼佛，由六度⽽轉法輪，

en: At that time, a great bhikshu vowedTo engage in the grand bodhisattva action.
cn: 彼時有⼀勝⽐丘，誓⾏最勝菩提⾏。

en: circumstances,Since that time, throughout his time as a bodhisattva,
cn: 害⼼不⽣緣不動，由彼時起為佛⼦，

en: (Unshakeable).
cn: 如今成佛名不動，無上最勝名具義。

en: I prostrate to you, even as the bodhisattvaYou were, with heartfelt devotion.
cn: 彼時住於菩薩位，亦由⼼虔意頂禮。

en: May I emulate your deeds.
cn: 如怙主尊發誓願，願隨尊⾏⽽修學。

en: I will abandon all anger, malice, and irritation.
cn: 無諂曲⽽發真⼼，棄瞋害⼼⼀切惑，

en: I will never forget omniscience.
cn: 永不離⼀切智⼼，

en: I will abandon kleshas such as desire.
cn: 棄欲貪欲等煩惱，

en: I will not even have the intention of wrong-doing such askilling.I will always dedicate all virtue to unsurpassable awakening.
cn: 離殺命等不善⼼，恆迴向無上菩提，

en: In every life I will fully renounce, have little desire,Be content, and develop the qualities of training.
cn: ⽣⽣世世得出家，少欲知⾜功德具，

en: I will teach genuine Dharma with the confidence of noattachment.I will never sleep carelessly or lazily.
cn: 無貪之勇⽰正法，永無散逸懶惰眠，

en: householder.
cn: 棄根墮不⽣俗業，⼥⼈謊騙說他過，

en: Harm others, or intimidate them.May I engage in the truth, and abandon bad behavior.
cn: 威嚇害他等不作，⾏真理時棄惡⾏。

en: And all intelligent persons as the teacher.
cn: 乃⾄袈裟⾊為塔，諸智者視為導師，

en: I will diligently listen to genuine Dharma and renounce othergods.I will always give both Dharma and material things equally.
cn: 勤聞正法棄餘神，法與資財平等捨。

en: “Without considering even my own life, I will think of others’suffering.
cn: 不顧⾝命思他苦，夢中亦無壞⼫羅，

en: Where even the word violations is unheard.”
cn: 任何罪墮聲不云，願勝⼟畢竟清淨。

en: Such were the aspirations you made, Akshobhya,And the armor you donned, when you became a bodhisattva.
cn: 若為不動佛之苗，如此⾏祈願鎧甲，

en: “For bodhisattvas with such commitment,Unsurpassable awakening is close,” said the Buddha, praising
cn: 如是具誓願佛⼦，近無上菩提佛讚。

en: Through the power of such truth, the world shook then.All in that world praised you a hundred times, saying,
cn: 真實⼒震動三界，嗟夫空前⼤獅吼，

en: “Oh, such a lion’s roar has never been heard!”
cn: 諸世間百遍稱嘆，願我等亦如是⾏。

en: When other buddhas do a buddha’s deeds,Their radiant light fills all the world.
cn: 餘諸佛⾏事業⾏，光明照遍諸世間，

en: All this occurred when you merely gave rise to bodhichitta.
cn: 息苦⽣無量殊勝，尊初發⼼亦成此。

en: You were praised by all buddhas at the time of your training.They said, “He is far superior to innumerable great aryas,
cn: 賢劫數千菩薩等，無量聖眾中最勝，

en: Such as the thousand bodhisattvas of this fortunate kalpa.”
cn: 於菩薩時諸佛讚，願吾亦如怙主尊。

en: Is a hundred thousand leagues in height.
cn: 不動佛之菩提樹，⾼量有⼗萬由旬，

en: It is made of the seven precious things.Innumerable melodic Dharma sounds issue from it.
cn: 由七珍寶所聚成，出悅⽿無量法⾳。

en: Bhagavan, you will live for a million great kalpasAnd teach Dharma for that long.
cn: 直⾄⼤劫百萬數，世尊住世啟教法，

en: May I always see such buddhas.
cn: ⼊涅聖教壽等住，如此世尊願常⾒。

en: Seven days before your attainment of awakening,All beings were filled with joy and happiness, and freed fromkleshas.
cn: 證獲菩提七⽇前，有情皆喜離煩惱，

en: When you achieved unsurpassable pristine wisdom, the threerealms shook.All prostrated to you and presented countless offerings.
cn: 證無上智震三界，諸頂禮獻無量供，

en: A jeweled parasol a hundred leagues wideIs always present in the sky above your head.
cn: 成百由旬之寶傘，常住稽⾸上虛空，

en: Your great realm of a billion worldsIs always filled with the light-rays of your body.
cn: 於三千⼤千世界，唯⾝光明恆遍照。

en: Activity of maras, tirthikas, fighting, bondage,
cn: 彼⼟無惡趣魔業，無外道爭戰惱伏，

en: Aging, sickness, or loss of any kind.Women there have no disadvantages. There is nothing impurethere.
cn: 盡無⽼病與衰敗，無⼥⼈過不淨物。

en: The shravakas there practice the mahayana.As soon as they see the truth, they attain arhathood.
cn: 諸聲聞依⼤乘法，⾒諦即得阿羅漢，

en: The Sangha of bhikshus is immeasurably vast.The gathering of bodhisattvas is also immeasurable.
cn: ⼤⽐丘眾無量置，菩薩匯聚盡無量，

en: May I and all these innumerable beings
cn: 彼等各各無量德，我及無邊諸有情，

en: Be included in such sublime gatheringsAnd attain the samadhi of Dharma gates.
cn: 得⼊如是勝會聚，願得法⾨之禪定。

en: The colorful ground in your realm is smooth to the touch.It is even and decorated by divine jewels.
cn: 妙⾊柔地軟觸樂，無⾼低鋪陳天寶，

en: It is covered by plenty of golden lotuses.There are no such things as logs, thorns, or gorges.
cn: ⾦⾊蓮花多遍佈，無斷⽊荊棘深淵。

en: Clothing and jewelry come from wish-fulfilling trees.Without effort, food of a hundred flavors
cn: ⾐飾出⾃如意樹，於諸無勤珍寶器，

en: All dwellings there are palaces.
cn: 隨欲出百味珍饈，諸舍宅之越量宮。

en: They are furnished with all luxuries, such as thrones and beds.
cn: 遍諸座褥與資具，於池⽔中鋪⾦沙，

en: Surrounded by ashoka trees.They arise in response to beings’ wishes.
cn: 無憂樹於周匝繞，皆隨⼠夫之願⽣。

en: No one is dominant; all are equally happy.There is no work such as buying, selling, or farming.
cn: 無主眷皆平等樂，無買賣耕等作業。

en: Whatever is wished for arises.
cn: 如是意念如是得，多羅樹林遍各⽅，

en: Pleasant sounds and delicious fragrances abound.Although they enjoy song, dance, and music, all are attentive.
cn: 悅聲⾹味盡處起，歌舞樂戲具正念。

en: Precious lotuses with a thousand petals.
cn: 尊⾏境所⾄⾜印，為寶⽔⽣千瓣蓮，

en: Those lotuses are then worshipped.Between Jambudvipa and Thirty-Three
cn: 彼蓮亦成供養境，世間⾄三⼗三天，

en: There is a stairway of gold, silver, and vaidurya.
cn: 有⾦銀琉璃之梯，彼處天⼈⾏安樂，

en: The gods aspire to be like the people of Jambudvipa.
cn: 如天⼈樂⼈亦樂，諸天亦慕世間⼈。

en: Are all engaged in the perfect path.
cn: 雖有統御魔世間，唯有住於清淨道，

en: Bhagavan Akshobhya, all the beings in your realmConstantly venerate you and listen to Dharma.
cn: 諸眾⽣於不動佛，恆常供養且聞法。

en: They all have few kleshas and are withoutThe stains of wrongdoing and transgressions.
cn: ⼀切煩惱皆輕微，無有罪業罪墮垢，

en: They are all free from attachment to the pleasures of desire.One abides in the womb there for seven days, and experiences
cn: 由欲喜⽽得離貪，住胎如妙宅七⽇。

en: The shravakas there have inexhaustible miraculous powers.The feats of the bodhisattvas there are inconceivable.
cn: 聲聞亦神變無盡，菩薩⾏傳不思議，

en: Surpasses that in all other realms.
cn: 彼勝佛⼟法興盛，威鎮其餘諸國⼟。

en: Is presently the regent of the great protector.
cn: 具悲憫之⾹象者，今最勝怙之攝政，

en: Gandhahasti will become a king of Dharma.
cn: 於不動佛聖教後，⾄七⽇間成法王。

en: That teacher of gods and humans will be known as GoldenLotus.Having the ten strengths, he will be just like Akshobhya.
cn: 天⼈導師名⾦蓮，具⼗⼒如不動佛，

en: His compassionate activity will be inconceivably vast.
cn: 成不思議⼤悲業，願令怙主得歡喜。

en: Bodhisattva action exactly like yours.
cn: 如是世尊之⾏持，⾏菩薩⾏我誓願，

en: Recollect your form as you teach Dharma,Recollect your sanghas of bhikshus and bodhisattvas,
cn: 隨念尊⾝宣正法，⽐丘菩薩僧伽眾，

en: And wholly dedicate all virtue.
cn: 隨念畢竟為迴向，佛說能⽣妙喜⼟。

en: aspirations,
cn: 聞攝政淨名祈願，令淨⼗⽅諸淨⼟，

en: Encourage others to aspire to birth in your realm,Practice The Sutra of Akshobhya’s Realm,
cn: 令他發願⽣彼⼟，⾏持不動佛⼟經。

en: And will reach your realm.
cn: 親⾒尊⾝僧伽眾，無數圍繞往彼⼟，

en: The Buddha spoke these true words.
cn: 佛真實語如是云。諸有情若如是⾏，

en: Gather an accumulation of virtueAnd reach the realm of Abhirati.
cn: 極住福德善聚集，願受⽤妙喜淨⼟。

en: And achieve the state of the protector Akshobhya.
cn: 連根拔除三障聚，願得不動佛果位。

en: May all beings be established in unsurpassable happiness.
cn: 勝享正法之喜宴，願置眾⽣無上樂。

en: Past innumerable worlds
cn: ⾃此⽇落之⽅向，越過無數眾世界，

en: And slightly elevated above us,Is the pure realm of Sukhavati.
cn: 稍許上⽅聖境處，即是清淨極樂剎，

en: There resides the bhagavan Amitabha.The color of ruby, he blazes with majesty.
cn: 彼剎阿彌陀佛尊，紅蓮寶⾊光耀眼，

en: He is adorned by the thirty-two good marks and the eightysigns,
cn: 頂髻相與⾜輪等，三⼗⼆相⼋⼗好，

en: Wearing the three Dharma robes, he is seated in vajra posture
cn: 著三法⾐跏趺坐，

en: On a thousand-petaled lotus and a moon disk seat.
cn: 千瓣蓮花⽉墊上，⾝背倚靠菩提樹，

en: He gazes upon me from a distance with compassionate eyes.On his right is the bodhisattva Avalokita.
cn: 慈悲慧眼遙視我。右側觀世⾳菩薩，

en: On Amitabha’s left is the bodhisattva Mahasthamaprapta.
cn: ⾝⽩左⼿持⽩蓮，左側⼤勢⾄菩薩，

en: protection.
cn: ⾝藍左持⾦剛蓮，右⼿向吾施依印。

en: These three principals are like Mount Meru,Vivid, distinct, and brilliant.
cn: 三⼤主尊如⼭王，巍然明然坦然住。

en: signs.
cn: ⼤乘⽐丘⼗千億，⾝皆⾦⾊相好飾，

en: Wearing the three Dharma robes, they fill the realm withyellow.
cn: 著三法⾐⿈燦燦。敬禮遠近無別故，

en: I devotedly prostrate to you with my three gates.The dharmakaya Amitabha is the lord of the family.
cn: 我以三⾨敬頂禮。法⾝無量光部主，

en: The light-rays of his right hand emanate Avalokita
cn: 右⼿放光化觀⾳，復化百俱胝觀⾳，

en: The light-rays of his left hand emanate Tara
cn: 左⼿放光化度⺟，復化百俱胝度⺟，

en: I prostrate to the dharmakaya Amitabha.Buddha, you kindly and constantly regard
cn: 頂禮法⾝阿彌陀。佛於晝夜六時中，

en: All beings throughout the six times of day and night.You always know what thoughts
cn: 慈眸恆視諸有情，諸眾⼼中所⽣起，

en: You always hear distinctly
cn: 任何分別皆明知，諸眾⼝中所⾔說，

en: The words spoken by every being.I prostrate to the omniscient Amitabha.
cn: 永無混雜⼀⼀聞，頂禮遍知無量光。

en: And make the aspiration to be born in Sukhavati will fulfill thataspiration.
cn: 如願往⽣極樂剎，佛臨中陰引彼剎，

en: I prostrate to the guide Amitabha.For the length of your life, innumerable kalpas,
cn: 頂禮導師無量光。尊之壽量無數劫，

en: It is said that anyone who prays to you with one-pointeddevotion,
cn: 不趣涅槃現住世，⼀⼼恭敬⽽祈禱，

en: Unless that is caused by the ripening of karma,
cn: 除⾮異熟業果外，壽盡亦可享百歲，

en: Will live a hundred years. You will avert all untimely death.I prostrate to the protector Amitayus.
cn: 遣除⼀切⾮時死，頂禮怙主無量壽。

en: And joining one’s palms with faithThan in filling countless billion-world realms
cn: 不如聽聞極樂剎，阿彌陀佛名號後，

en: With jewels and giving them in generosity.
cn: 以信合掌福德⼤，是故敬禮無量光。

en: Sincerely gives rise to faith
cn: 誰聞阿彌陀佛號，⼼⼝如⼀⾃深⼼，

en: From the depths of their heart even once
cn: 僅⽣⼀次誠信⼼，彼不退轉菩提道，

en: I prostrate to the protector Amitabha.Having heard the name of the buddha Amitabha,
cn: 頂禮怙主無量光。聞佛阿彌陀名號，

en: Until one reaches the essence of awakening,born of good family.
cn: 乃⾄未獲菩提間，不轉⼥⾝轉貴族，

en: In every birth one’s morality will be pure.I prostrate to the sugata Amitabha.
cn: ⽣⽣世世具淨戒，頂禮善逝無量光。

en: I offer my body, possessions, and roots of virtue;
cn: 吾⾝受⽤及善根，⼀切真實之供品，

en: Mentally emanated auspicious substances and signs, and theseven jewels;The pre-existing billion worlds with their billion sets
cn: 意幻七寶瑞相物，本成三千世界中，

en: And all the luxuries of gods, nagas, and humans.
cn: ⼗億⽇⽉洲須彌，天⼈⿓之諸受⽤，

en: Bringing all these to mind, I offer them to Amitabha.
cn: 意幻供養無量光，為利我故悲納受。

en: I confess all the wrongdoing I and all beings, my parentsincluded,Have done throughout beginningless time up to now,
cn: ⽗⺟為主吾等眾，從無始時⾄今⽣，

en: I admit and confess the three wrongdoings of body.
cn: 殺⽣偷盜⾮梵⾏，發露懺悔⾝三罪。

en: Lying, calumny, harsh words, and gossip:I admit and confess the four wrongdoings of speech.
cn: 妄語兩⾆綺惡語，發露懺悔語四罪。

en: Covetousness, malice, and wrong views:
cn: 貪⼼害⼼與邪⾒，發露懺悔意三罪。

en: The killing of one’s father, mother, acharya, or an arhatAnd the shedding of a buddha’s blood with malicious intent:
cn: 殺師⽗⺟阿羅漢，惡⼼損害佛⾝體，

en: I admit and confess the five worst actions.Killing a bhikshu or shramanera, seducing a nun,
cn: 發露懺悔無間罪。殺害⽐丘與沙彌，

en: And destroying images, stupas, or temples:I admit and confess the nearly worst actions.
cn: 污尼毀像塔寺等，發露懺近無間罪。

en: Swearing by the Three Jewels, temples, scriptures,
cn: 三寶殿經所依等，以彼作證違誓等，

en: Worse than killing all beings in the three realms
cn: 發露懺悔捨法罪。誹謗諸菩薩之罪，

en: Is the denigration of bodhisattvas.I admit and confess pointless great wrongdoing.
cn: 較殺三界有情重，發露懺悔無義罪。

en: Thinking that the benefits of virtue, the harm from wrongdoing,And the suffering and lifespan in hell
cn: 聞善功德惡過患，地獄痛苦壽量等，

en: Are untrue, mere sayings,Is worse than the five worst actions.
cn: 認為不實卻說法，此罪重於五無間，

en: freed.The four defeats, the thirteen remainders, the downfalls,
cn: 發露懺悔無解罪。⼗三僧殘四他勝，

en: The confessables, and the misdemeanors—the five classes:I admit and confess impairments of the pratimoksha morality.
cn: 墮罪惡作向彼悔，發露懺悔五墮罪。

en: The four negativities; and the five, five, and eight downfalls:I admit and confess impairments of the bodhisattva training.
cn: 四惡法罪⼗⼋墮，發露懺破菩薩戒。

en: The fourteen root downfalls and the eight major branches:I admit and confess impairments of secret mantra samaya.
cn: ⼗四根本⼋粗⽀，發露懺破誓⾔罪。

en: The wrongdoing done when not under vows,Such as fornication and drinking alcohol,
cn: 未受戒律造惡業，⾮梵⾏及飲酒等，

en: Actions that are naturally unwholesome:I admit and confess unwitting wrongdoing.
cn: ⼀切⾃性之罪過，發露懺悔未知罪。

en: Although I have taken the vow of refuge and empowerments,I admit and confess downfalls of commitment through
cn: 雖受皈戒灌頂等，不知守戒護誓⾔，

en: Not knowing how to keep the vows and samaya they entail.Without regret, confession will not purify.
cn: 發露懺悔佛制罪。若無悔⼼懺不淨，

en: I confess all past wrongdoing with great shame, fear, andregret,As though I had swallowed poison.
cn: 昔所造罪如腹毒，以⼤慚懼悔懺罪。

en: Sugata Amitabha and your bodhisattvas,
cn: 亦不造作不善業，阿彌陀佛及佛⼦，

en: One is without the negativity of jealousyAnd rejoices from one’s heart,
cn: 若捨忌妒不喜⼼，誠⼼歡悅作隨喜，

en: Of aryas and ordinary beings.I rejoice in their generation of bodhichitta
cn: 所作諸善皆隨喜，於發無上菩提⼼，

en: And their vast benefit for beings.The ten virtues that are the opposites of the ten wrongdoings—
cn: 廣利有情皆隨喜。斷⼗不善⾏⼗善，

en: Saving others’ lives, giving generously,Chastity, speaking truthfully,
cn: 救護他命⾏布施，守持戒律說實語，

en: Healing discord, speaking gently and straightforwardly,Conversing meaningfully, having little desire,
cn: 化怨⾔語直柔和，少欲⾔說具義語，

en: Cultivating love and compassion, and practicing Dharma:I rejoice in those virtuous actions.
cn: 修持慈悲⾏正法，於彼善法皆隨喜。

en: Perfect buddhahood in any of the
cn: ⼗⽅浩瀚世界中，圓滿正覺後不久，

en: All buddhas, bodhisattvas, holders of Dharma,
cn: 佛以神通知彼義，於佛菩薩持教師，

en: For infinitely many oceans of aeons.You remain without passing into nirvana.And spiritual friends who wish to pass into nirvana:
cn: 諸欲涅槃彼等前，祈請住世不涅槃。

en: And empty samsara’s three realms from their depths.
cn: 願皆速得無上果，根除三界之輪迴。

en: May this virtue quickly ripen in me.In this life, may the eighteen untimely deaths be prevented.
cn: 彼善速成熟於我，遣除⼗⼋種橫死，

en: Unharmed by maras or enemies, may I practice genuineDharma.intentions.
cn: 無魔怨害享正法，如法成就諸所願，

en: May I accomplish vast benefit for Dharma and beings.May my human body be meaningful.
cn: 弘法利⽣⼤益成，使此⼈⾝具意義。

en: The emanated buddha Amitabha
cn: 化⾝無量光，⽐丘僧眷繞，

en: May we be without suffering at death.May the eight bodhisattvas
cn: 無有死亡苦。願⼋⼤菩薩，

en: And lead me to Sukhavati.The suffering in lower states is unbearable.
cn: 接引往⽣也。惡趣苦難忍，

en: The pleasures of gods and humans are impermanent.
cn: ⼈天樂無常，願⽣畏彼⼼，

en: I confess all the wrongdoing I have committedThroughout beginningless time up to now,Samsara has lasted for a very long time.
cn: 無始⾄今⽣，漫⻑漂輪迴，

en: Experience birth, aging, sickness, and death countless times.There are many obstacles in this degenerate time.
cn: 受⽣⽼病死，濁世違緣多，

en: The pleasures of humans and godsAre like food mixed with poison.
cn: ⼈天之安樂，猶如雜毒⾷，

en: My family, food, wealth, and friends
cn: 願毫無貪求。⾷財親朋友，

en: them.
cn: 無常如夢幻，願毫無貪戀。

en: free,
cn: 願知不成實。無解輪迴海，

en: Like a felon escaping from prison.
cn: 如罪犯脫獄，願義無反顧，

en: Having severed all craving and clinging,
cn: 趨往極樂剎。願斷諸貪執，

en: Passing countless worlds
cn: 向⻄⽅空中，無量世界剎，

en: Who is actually present there.May all my obscurations be purified.
cn: 住世無量光，淨除諸罪障。

en: The best of the four births is instantaneous
cn: 四⽣中最勝，蓮花蕊中⽣，

en: My body complete in an instant,
cn: 願得化⾝⽣，剎那⾝圓滿，

en: Would cause me to remain in the lotus for five hundred years.I would be happy and comfortable
cn: 於五百年中，雖具樂受⽤，

en: And would hear the Buddha’s speech,
cn: 聽聞佛語聲，然花不綻放，

en: May I see Amitabha’s face.
cn: 往⽣華即開，願⾒無量光，

en: Through merit and miraculous powers,May vast clouds of offerings
cn: 以福⼒神變，⼿掌中放出，

en: Emanate from my palms.May I present them to the Buddha and his entourage.
cn: 不可思供雲，願供佛眷屬。

en: At that time, may that tathagata extend
cn: 爾時願如來，展右⼿摸頂，

en: May I receive prophecy of my awakening.Having heard profound and vast Dharma,
cn: 得菩提授記。聞深廣法後，

en: May my being be ripened and liberated.
cn: 願熟解⾃續。願佛⼆⻑⼦，

en: Gather from the ten directions in order to
cn: 每⽇中⼗⽅，無量佛菩薩，

en: Present offerings to Amitabha
cn: 供養無量光，蒞觀彼剎時，

en: With unimpeded miraculous powers,
cn: 以無礙神變，願上午前赴，

en: Perfect Action, and Densely Arrayed.Going there in the morning, may I receive
cn: 現喜具德剎，妙圓密嚴剎。

en: Empowerment, blessings, and vows fromAkshobhya, Ratnasambhava, Amoghasiddhi,
cn: 不動寶⽣佛，不空毗盧佛，

en: Having presented many offerings,
cn: 求灌頂加持，受戒做廣供，

en: May I return without difficultyTo Sukhavati in the evening.
cn: 傍晚無艱難，返回極樂國。

en: Chamaradvipa, and Uddiyana;
cn: 普陀楊柳宮，鄔⾦妙拂洲，

en: May I meet a billion Avalokitas, Taras,
cn: ⼗億化⾝剎，願⾒觀世⾳，

en: May I present oceans of offerings to them
cn: 度⺟⾦剛⼿，蓮師⼗億尊。奉如海供品，

en: And receive empowerment and profound instructions.May I quickly then return unimpeded
cn: 求灌頂深教，速抵⼤樂⼟，

en: My surviving family, monks, and disciples.
cn: ⽣前友侍徒，加持並護佑，

en: The duration of this fortunate kalpa
cn: 亡時接彼剎。賢劫⼀⼤劫，

en: Throughout countless kalpas, there is no death.
cn: 極樂剎⼀⽇，無數劫無死，

en: From Maitreya up to Rochana,
cn: 願恆住彼剎。彌勒⾄勝解，

en: When all the buddhas
cn: 賢劫諸佛陀，降臨此剎時，

en: Present offerings to those buddhas, listen to the genuineDharma,
cn: 以神變詣此，供佛聞正法，

en: And return unimpededTo the realm of Sukhavati.
cn: 爾後願無礙，返回極樂剎。

en: Of the realms of eighty-one septillion buddhas
cn: ⼋百⼀⼗萬俱胝，那由他佛之佛剎，

en: Are combined in that realmThat is superior to all others.
cn: 功德莊嚴皆合⼀，願⽣勝過諸剎⼟，

en: Vast and spacious, it blazes brightly and radiantly.
cn: 寬敞明亮光閃閃，壓陷抬返富彈性，

en: May I be born in that pleasant, gentle, spacious realm.The wish-fulfilling trees are composed of many jewels
cn: 願⽣輕滑舒適剎。眾寶所成如意樹，

en: And are decorated by leaves of silk and precious fruit.In them are emanated birds whose sweet calls
cn: 樹葉錦緞珍果飾，其上幻⿃出妙⾳，

en: There are many rivers of scented water with the eightattributes.There are also bathing pools of amrita,
cn: 眾具⼋⽀⾹⽔河，如是⽢露諸浴池，

en: Surrounded by steps and bricks of the seven jewels.Lotus flowers with sweet fragrance and fruit
cn: 七寶階梯寶轉圍，芳⾹蓮花具果實，

en: Emit countless rays of light. The ends of thoseLight-rays are adorned by emanated buddhas.
cn: 蓮花散射無量光，光端嚴飾化⾝佛，

en: Even the names of the eight unleisured states
cn: 願⽣極其稀奇剎。無⼋無暇惡趣聲，

en: And lower realms are unheard there. Kleshas,The five and three poisons, sickness, döns, enmity,
cn: 病魔煩惱三五毒，怨敵貧乏戰爭等，

en: Poverty, quarreling, and all other sufferings are unheard of inthat realm.
cn: 彼剎未聞諸痛苦，願⽣極其安樂剎。

en: All are born from within lotus flowers.
cn: 無有⼥⼈無胎⽣，皆由蓮花苞中⽣，

en: Everyone’s bodies are alike, and golden in color.They are adorned by the marks and signs, such as the ushnishaon their heads.
cn: 諸⾝無別⾦⿈⾊，頂鬘等相隨好飾，

en: All have the five clairvoyances and the five eyes.May I be born in that realm of countless attributes.
cn: 五眼五通悉具⾜，願⽣無量功德剎。

en: In self-arisen palaces of diverse jewelsWhatever is wanted arises upon recollection.
cn: ⾃然眾寶無量宮，所欲受⽤意念⽣，

en: No effort is necessary; everything one needs or wants isspontaneously present.
cn: 無勤任運所需成，無有你我無我執，

en: Offering clouds of whatever one wishes arise from the palms ofone’s hands.Everyone there practices the unsurpassable mahayana Dharma.
cn: 所欲供雲⼿掌⽣，⾏持無上⼤乘法，

en: A fragrant breeze sends down rains of flowers.
cn: 願⽣諸樂之源剎。⾹⾵普降妙花⾬，

en: From all the trees, rivers, and lotuses,Clouds of sumptuous offerings constantly emerge,
cn: 諸樹河蓮中恆⽣，悅意⾊聲⾹味觸，

en: Pleasing forms, sounds, scents, tastes, and textures.Although there is no ordinary gender,
cn: 受⽤以及供雲聚，雖無⼥⼈眾化⾝，

en: Emanated devis constantly present offerings.When one wishes to sit, there are precious palaces.
cn: 供養天⼥恆時供。欲安住時無量宮，

en: When one wishes to lie down, there are mattressesAnd pillows of silk on fine, precious beds.
cn: 欲睡眠時妙寶座，具眾錦緞被墊枕。

en: When one wishes to hear them, birds, trees, rivers, and musicGive forth the melodic sound of Dharma.
cn: ⿃樹河流樂器等，欲聞時出妙法⾳，

en: When one does not wish to listen, they are unheard.
cn: 不欲之時即不聞，彼等⽢露池溪流，

en: Of whatever temperature is desired.
cn: 冷暖適度隨所欲，願⽣如意所成剎。

en: In that realm, the perfect buddha Amitabha will remain,Not passing into nirvana, for countless kalpas.
cn: 彼剎阿彌陀佛尊，住無數劫不涅槃，

en: After Amitabha passes into peace,
cn: 願於此間承侍彼。⼀旦佛陀趣涅槃，

en: During that time, may I be inseparable from Avalokita,His regent, and uphold the genuine Dharma.
cn: 不離補處觀世⾳，願於期間持正法。

en: The Dharma will wane at sunset.At the following dawn, Avalokita will attain buddhahood,
cn: ⿈昏法沒次黎明，觀⾳現前成正覺，

en: Becoming the buddha called King of MassiveSplendor Elevated Above All. From that time,
cn: 爾後彼佛名號為，勝光妙聚王如來，

en: Ninety-six septillion kalpas.
cn: 俱胝那由他劫久，願恆恭敬⽽承侍，

en: After his nirvana, his Dharma will remain
cn: 不忘總持持正法。涅槃之後彼教法，

en: During that time, may I uphold the Dharma
cn: 住世六億三⼗萬，俱胝劫間持正法，

en: And be inseparable from Mahasthamaprapta.Then, Mahasthamaprapta will attain buddhahood,
cn: 願恆不離⼤勢⾄。爾後⼤勢⾄成佛，

en: Becoming the tathagata called King of Amassed JewelsAnd Stable Qualities. His lifespan and Dharma
cn: 佛號堅德寶堅王，⽽成功德寶積王，

en: Will equal those of Avalokita. May I continually
cn: 壽量教法等觀⾳，願於期間恆承待，

en: And uphold all his genuine Dharma.Then, after that life, either in that realm
cn: 供品供養持諸法。願我壽盡即往⽣，

en: And achieve perfect buddhahood.Or in another pure realm,
cn: 於彼剎或他淨剎，獲得無上正等覺，

en: After my buddhahood, like Amitayus, may I ripenAnd liberate all the beings who even just hear my name.
cn: 成佛後如無量光，僅聞名號熟解眾，

en: May I guide beings through countless emanationsAnd benefit beings effortlessly, spontaneously, andimmeasurably.
cn: 化⾝無數引眾⽣，無勤任運利有情。

en: Tathagata of immeasurable lifespan,Merit, qualities, pristine wisdom, and majesty;
cn: 善逝壽量及福德，德智威光皆無量，

en: Dharmakaya Amitabha;Bhagavan of immeasurable life and wisdom:
cn: 法⾝無量光佛陀，壽智無量出有壞。

en: Who recollects your name will be protected from
cn: 何⼈持誦尊聖號，除⾮往昔業異熟，

en: Fire, water, poison, weapons, yakshas, rakshasas,And all danger, unless it is the ripening of previous karma.
cn: ⽔⽕毒兵夜羅剎，佛說諸畏皆可救。

en: I pray that you protect me from all danger and suffering.
cn: 我持佛號頂禮尊，祈求⼀切怖畏苦，

en: May my aspirations be fulfilled as intended.
cn: 成就所發之⼤願。

en: That is the dharani for the fulfillment of aspiration prayers.
cn: 滿願咒)

en: If after saying that you do three prostrations, it is said that they will beequivalent to a hundred thousand. Therefore do, if possible, one hundredprostrations, or as many as you can, or at least seven. If possible, recite this
cn: 拜七次。⼜極善永不中斷，次者數年或數⽉不斷，下者於任何時間，⾯向⻄⽅極樂淨⼟，淨信合⼗，憶念無量光壽佛，專⼼念誦，即於此⽣壽命障礙得清除，命終無礙往⽣極樂淨⼟。此為《阿彌陀經》、《莊嚴經》、《⽩蓮花阿彌陀⿎⾳經》之含意。由我⽐丘噶阿瑟，為令

en: How wondrous is the Buddha Infinite LightWith the lord Great Compassion on his right,
cn: 稀有難得無量光，右有⼤悲觀世⾳，

en: Of buddhas and bodhisattvas beyond number.
cn: 左為⼤⼒⼤勢⾄，無量佛菩薩圍繞，

en: Without another lifetime in between
cn: 但有無量之妙樂，此即清淨極樂國。

en: In that pure land of untold happinessAnd wonder that is called Sukhavati
cn: 願我命終隨即能，不為他⽣所阻斷，

en: And see the Buddha Amitabha’s face.I ask all buddhas and bodhisattvas of
cn: ⽣彼親⾒彌陀佛，我今如是發願已，

en: In the two accumulations, and I offer
cn: 三世所積諸善業，悉以供養三寶尊，

en: May the teachings of the Buddha flourish.I dedicate this virtue to all beings.
cn: 願諸佛法普傳揚。善業迴向有情眾，

en: May every being achieve buddhahood.Gathering all roots of virtue into one,
cn: 願諸眾⽣悉成佛。積聚⼀切諸善根，

en: The two veils and perfect the accumulations,
cn: 唯願⾃⼼得成熟，⼆障清淨資糧圓，

en: Increase my long life, health, experience,And realization, and rise through the ten levels
cn: ⻑壽無病證悟增，願我此⽣登⼗地，

en: And with that body may I gain buddhahood.
cn: ⽣已蓮花開放時，即依彼⾝願成佛，

en: Once I’ve achieved enlightenment, may IGuide beings with my emanations forever.
cn: 乃⾄得證菩提果，願以化⾝度有情。

en: Decorated by jewels, trees, and lakes,
cn: 如掌平坦寶嚴飾，園林湖景⼤地中，

en: Buddha Shakyamuni and the great arhats,I pray that you come to this place, accompanied by yourentourages.
