具⼀切圓滿功德。

en: unsullied and luminous.Colorful divine flowers that give off the fragrance
cn: 地域遼闊廣⼤。觸即輕軟安樂。無垢光明。

en: of snake-heart sandalwood are scattered evenly over it.Bordered by bricks made of jewels
cn: 諸種蛇⼼旃檀⾹味芬芳之天⼈花朵鋪陳。

en: and sprinkled with powdered gold,
cn: 珍寶欄栒周匝圍繞。⾦銀珍珠琳琅滿⽬。

en: such as utpalas, kumudas, and lotuses.
cn: 鄔波羅花。君陀花。蓮花優美柔軟遍滿。

en: where water fowl swim and float with delight, giving forth theirsweet calls.
cn: 歡悅繚繞⾶舞。莊嚴諸⼋功德海。

en: strings of pearls, and jewels,
cn: 天⼈寶。珍珠寶鬘。珍寶垂掛。

en: Strings of golden bells ring out the sound of genuine Dharma.
cn: ⾦鈴⾃然搖動出正法⾳。

en: Upon this formally arranged and finely adorned ground
cn: 羅列莊嚴⼤地。住最勝光曜七寶莊嚴。

en: is a great palace, blazing greatly with the seven jewels.
cn: 放⼤光明普照⼀切無邊世界無量⽅所。

en: Their great light-rays utterly fill innumerable world-realms.
cn: 妙飾間列周圓無際。

en: and is of immeasurable vastness.
cn: 其量難測超過三界。

en: It is a place that perfectly transcends the three realms.
cn: 所⾏之處勝出世間。

en: It is utterly pure and has the character of masterful awareness.It has arisen from supramundane roots of virtue.
cn: 淨識為相。如來所都。

en: It is utterly pure and has the character of masterful awareness.
cn: 諸⼤菩薩眾所雲集。

en: It has the Sangha of bodhisattvas. Innumerable gods, nagas,yakshas, gandharvas,
cn: 無量天⿓藥叉

en: and non-human beings move about within it.
cn: ⼈⾮⼈等常所翼從。廣⼤法味喜樂所持。

en: features superior to all others.
cn: 遠離眾魔過諸莊嚴。如來莊嚴之所依處。

en: It is emancipation through great recollection, intelligence, andrealization.
cn: 念慧⾏以為遊路。

en: It is the mount on which shamatha and vipashyana ride.
cn: ⽌妙觀以為所乘。

en: there are lotus seats atop lion thrones.
cn: 寶蓮花墊獅⼦座上，導師世尊釋迦牟尼佛周圍最勝⼠夫，

en: On them are the Teacher—the Bhagavan Shakyamuni—and aretinue of great masters
cn: 有⾺、密、達三祖師等

en: Rechungpa and other masters of the whispered lineage;
cn: 美、鄂、楚等解傳法脈，惹瓊巴等⽿傳法脈，

en: all surrounded by many great masters and spiritual friends.
cn: 願⼀切親教師友海會圍繞⿑住於位，

en: All the noble beings in this great assembly have beautiful seatsthat accord
cn: 各各聖者合宜成就其勝願、威勢，

en: and fine articles used by gods and humans.
cn: 具⾜悅意⾹。味。觸等。珍饈。

en: with aromas pleasant to inhale, flavors delightful to taste,
textures pleasant to swallow, and a pleasing appearance.
cn: 吮⾷等陳設諸種殊勝供⾷。⾐服。

en: May all the noble ones take their seats,
cn: 願⼀切聖者亦匯集

en: Glorious, peerless king of the Shakyas and retinue of the oceanlike assembly
cn: 吉祥無⽐釋迦王聖僧海會弟⼦無邊眷屬聖眾。

en: buddhas.
cn: 復因通達萬法⽽成正覺。

en: fill with samadhi all the places where lotuses grow.
cn: 三摩地遍滿。如⽇光遍照於蓮池。

en: The mandala of light that issues from within your ushnishas
cn: 由頂髻中普⽣光明壇城。

en: You teach the Dharma.
cn: 藥叉主者之頂髻⼤寶。⼊佛⾜趾⽽說法。

en: You guide the world. You befriend us.
cn: 導引⼊寂靜之道。導引世間。摯友知⼰。
明澈如燈縵羅列。
⾦塔安置。

en: You know all things just as they are, Bhagavan;You know all things just as they are, Bhagavan:You know all things just as they are, Bhagavan;
cn: ⼀切所知萬物盡無餘。

en: I pray that you protectors of wanderers,
cn: 有情怙主具悲眼。於離戲論之法⾝。

en: The dharmakaya free of elaborations
cn: 以⾊⾝相⽽起⾝。為眾⽣義祈降臨。

en: We have such merit and good fortune.
cn: 於此世尊善來臨。我等福德賢劫具。

en: We offer you this eight-petaled lotus,I offer you this hundred-petaled lotus,Spacious and comfortable, equal in size
cn: 等同⼀切三千界。百瓣蓮花具花蕊。

en: Just like the current of the River Ganges,Just like the current of the River Ganges,The stream of argham also is unceasing.
cn: 如恆河⽔流。供⽔亦不斷。

en: And pray that you accept it with compassion.And pray that you accept it with compassion.
cn: 以此無上供。祈⼤悲納受。以此無上供。祈⼤悲納受。

en: May my thoughts and those of all beings be purified.
cn: 願淨我。與⼀切無邊有情。

en: May we achieve the utterly pure bodies of Tathagatas.
cn: 諸念想。⽽得如來善逝清淨⾝。

en: I bathe your feet with purified water, unbroken dūrva grass,fragrance, and flowers.
cn: 以新鮮芳⾹。具花茅草。淨拭雙⾜。

en: Just like the current of the River Ganges,Just like the current of the River Ganges,This stream of cooling water is unceasing.
cn: 如恆河⽔流。濯⾜⽔不斷。

en: Alluring pillars are aglow with jewels,Alluring pillars are aglow with jewels,Alluring pillars are aglow with jewels,And glistening pearls are draped in canopies,
cn: 寶柱⽣悅意。珠蓋頻閃爍。

en: I bathe the sugatas and bodhisattvasI bathe the sugatas and bodhisattvasFrom precious vases that have been filled full
cn: 諸珍寶瓶。盛滿妙⾹⽔。

en: To those we venerate as precious,Adorned with sublime qualities,
cn: 如似⾼⼭⽽端嚴。淨妙功德為莊嚴。

en: Who are as magnificent as mountains,I offer this ablution.I offer this ablution.
cn: 於彼珍寶侍奉處。我為澡浴⽽侍奉。

en: To those, whom compassion truly fillsSo that they always bring benefit
cn: ⼤悲之⼼定遍滿。恆時常⾏利樂業。

en: I offer this ablution.I offer this ablution.And happiness, the supremely peaceful,
cn: 於彼最勝調柔者。我今侍浴以為供。

en: With cloths that are beyond compare and clean,With cloths that are beyond compare and clean,
cn: ⾹熏極潔淨。浴⼱拭其⾝。

en: Well-dyed and most delightfully perfumed.Well-dyed and most delightfully perfumed.
cn: 拭已復獻上。⾹極妙⾊⾐。

en: With fabrics that are delicate and softAnd hundreds of the finest ornaments.
cn: 莊嚴普賢尊。⽂殊觀⾃在。

en: Who vanquished all the tirthikas,
cn: 隨所障縛盡斷卻。諸外道眾盡降伏。

en: Who subdued Mara and his hordes,And achieved the supreme awakening.
cn: 摧滅波旬魔軍眾。頂禮獲得勝菩提。

en: Tames us and guides; he cuts the bonds and fetters.Tames us and guides; he cuts the bonds and fetters.Best among humans, the tathagata
cn: ⼈中之尊調御者。斬斷結縛善如來。

en: His body of utterly pure pristine wisdomWith many precious qualities, great marks,
cn: 功德珍寶⿑匯聚。相好智慧畢淨⾝。

en: I prostrate to Water Deva.And golden hue is revered by gods and humans.
cn: ⼈天應供⾦⾊相。頂禮世尊天中天。

en: the best and most excellent, special and fine, bounteous,
cn: ⽽出⽣之無等等供養。

en: unsurpassable offerings equal to the unequalled—fill all the external worlds in the ten directions to overflowing.
cn: 最勝。最要。清淨。殊勝。賢善。圓滿。無上。

cn: 聖者海之供品⽽成就。淨⼟海之繁花海會聚。

en: May my discipline and that of all infinite sentient beings becompletely pure;
cn: 願我與無邊⼀切有情眾⽣。

en: may we have authentic discipline.
cn: 清淨律儀。具正⼫羅。

en: I offer with an ocean of faith these oceans of scented waterMade from the offerings of oceans of buddhas
cn: 聖者海之供品⽽成就。淨⼟海之供燈海會聚。

en: dispelled;

cn: 聖者海之供品⽽成就。淨⼟海之⾹⽔海會聚。

en: May the water of samadhi purify me and all infinite sentientbeings
cn: 願我與無邊⼀切有情眾⽣。以三摩地⽔。

en: of the stains of distraction; may we be happy and satisfied.
cn: 清淨散逸垢染。得喜樂意⾜。

en: I offer with an ocean of faith these oceans of scented waterMade from the offerings of oceans of buddhas
cn: 聖者海之供品⽽成就。淨⼟海之神饈海會聚。

en: By offering the five sensory pleasures
cn: 如來無漏資財得⾃在。為眾⽣義供養五妙欲。

en: For the sake of beings, may all throughout spaceEnjoy a treasury of inexhaustible merit.
cn: 等虛空界⼀切有情眾。受⽤無盡福德之寶藏。

en: By arranging here and mentally offeringThe seven precious articles of kings
cn: ⼈王此等七珍寶。佛與佛⼦盡無餘。

en: May all beings enjoy an endless trove.
cn: 以我陳設意供養。眾⽣受⽤無盡藏。

en: Just as the eight auspicious goddesses make offerings toThe lord of gods when he defeats the demigods,
cn: 梵天戰勝阿修羅。⼋吉祥天⼥獻供。

en: I make this offering of the eight auspicious substancesTo the victorious buddhas and the bodhisattvas.
cn: 諸如來與菩薩眾。我亦獻上⼋瑞物。

en: This wheel that has arisen out of merit,
cn: 怙主⼤悲⽽加被。由福德因⽣輪寶。

en: Which the compassionate protector blessed,Which the compassionate protector blessed,Which the compassionate protector blessed,Which the compassionate protector blessed,Which the compassionate protector blessed,Which the compassionate protector blessed,Which the compassionate protector blessed,Which the compassionate protector blessed,May the wheel of genuine Dharma turn.
cn: 隨奉彼於剎那頃。願轉正妙之法輪。

en: This stainless and most beautiful endless knot,
cn: 怙主⼤悲⽽加被。無垢美妙吉祥結。

en: Which the compassionate protector blessed,Which the compassionate protector blessed,Which the compassionate protector blessed,Which the compassionate protector blessed,Which the compassionate protector blessed,Which the compassionate protector blessed,Which the compassionate protector blessed,Which the compassionate protector blessed,May we have omniscient pristine wisdom.
cn: 隨奉彼於剎那頃。願具遍⼀切智慧。

en: This precious vase filled with elixir,
cn: 怙主⼤悲⽽加被。珍寶精華滿寶瓶。

en: Which the compassionate protector blessed,Which the compassionate protector blessed,Which the compassionate protector blessed,Which the compassionate protector blessed,Which the compassionate protector blessed,Which the compassionate protector blessed,Which the compassionate protector blessed,Which the compassionate protector blessed,May we be adorned by the perfection of merit.
cn: 隨奉彼於剎那頃。願福德圓為莊嚴。

en: This lotus, stainless and immaculate,
cn: 怙主⼤悲⽽加被。無染清淨此蓮花。

en: Which the compassionate protector blessed,Which the compassionate protector blessed,Which the compassionate protector blessed,Which the compassionate protector blessed,Which the compassionate protector blessed,Which the compassionate protector blessed,Which the compassionate protector blessed,Which the compassionate protector blessed,May we be untainted by samsaric faults.
cn: 隨奉彼於剎那頃。願輪迴過無染著。

en: This stainless and completely white great conch,
cn: 怙主⼤悲⽽加被。無垢潔⽩⼤法螺。

en: Which the compassionate protector blessed,Which the compassionate protector blessed,Which the compassionate protector blessed,Which the compassionate protector blessed,Which the compassionate protector blessed,Which the compassionate protector blessed,Which the compassionate protector blessed,Which the compassionate protector blessed,
cn: 隨奉彼於剎那頃。願⾾爭敗法⾳揚。

en: This stainless golden fish so very pure,
cn: 怙主⼤悲⽽加被。無染清淨此⾦⿂。

en: Which the compassionate protector blessed,Which the compassionate protector blessed,Which the compassionate protector blessed,Which the compassionate protector blessed,Which the compassionate protector blessed,Which the compassionate protector blessed,Which the compassionate protector blessed,Which the compassionate protector blessed,
cn: 隨奉彼於剎那頃。願度脫⼤輪迴海。

en: The highest protection, the precious parasol,
cn: 怙主⼤悲⽽加被。聖救護端嚴寶傘。

en: Which the compassionate protector blessed,Which the compassionate protector blessed,Which the compassionate protector blessed,Which the compassionate protector blessed,Which the compassionate protector blessed,Which the compassionate protector blessed,Which the compassionate protector blessed,Which the compassionate protector blessed,
cn: 隨奉彼於剎那頃。願為⼀切聖救護。

en: This unwaning victory banner of True Dharma,
cn: 怙主⼤悲⽽加被。正法不衰聖幢幡。

en: Which the compassionate protector blessed,Which the compassionate protector blessed,Which the compassionate protector blessed,Which the compassionate protector blessed,Which the compassionate protector blessed,Which the compassionate protector blessed,Which the compassionate protector blessed,Which the compassionate protector blessed,
cn: 隨奉彼於剎那頃。正法不衰豎幢幡。

en: This supreme food has the best form,Sound, fragrance, taste, and texture.
cn: ⾊聲⾹味觸。此最勝勝⾷。

en: By offering to the victors and their childrenWith faith this well-prepared, enticing food
cn: 百味珍饈意歡悅。善合妙味佛⼦眾。

en: That has a hundred flavors, may all beings
cn: 以信供奉願眾⽣。受⽤富⾜禪定⾷。

en: The victor conquered Mara and awoke to enlightenment.The victor’s body has no hunger or thirst.
cn: 世尊伏魔證菩提。雖佛尊⾝無饑渴。

en: We offer you this food we have prepared.
cn: 為成吾等福⽥境。以奉珍饈妙味⾷。

en: Thus may our crops of virtue ever flourish;May we be born from lotuses in Sukhavati
cn: 恆時善果得增⻑。極樂淨⼟蓮花⽣。

en: And enjoy the food and Dharma of samadhi.
cn: 願享三摩地法⾷。

en: To the completely perfect buddhas surrounded by a sangha ofbodhisattvas,
cn: 清淨正等覺佛。周圍菩薩僧伽眾所圍繞。

en: I present this assortment of bountiful, fragrant, divine foods—vegetables, breads,
cn: 以各種妙⾷。菜餚。湯品。珍饈。奶酪等圓滿天供。

en: grains, yoghurt, and more—along with vases filled with purewater.
cn: 盛滿妙⾹⽔之寶瓶等。

en: other sentient beings,
cn: 祈攝受吾與施主等⼀切眾⽣。

en: Victorious protector, dwelling in resplendent glory,Who achieved through merit and through pristine wisdom thefive kayas,
cn: 尊怙威德巍然住。具獲福智與五⾝。

en: By offering you the sublime five sets of five essences,May every wandering being realize their own buddha essence.
cn: 供養精妙五五部。願有情得如來藏。

en: Through my offering you the five grains, may the world’s cropsincrease for all beings,
cn: 以奉五穀。願⼀切眾⽣世間之穀物豐盛。

en: and may the harvest of virtue flourish at all times.
cn: 恆時善果增⻑。

en: Through my offering you the five jewels, may the preciouswish-fulfilling jewel satisfy
cn: 以奉五寶。願如意寶滿⼀切眾⽣之欲求。

en: Through my offering you the five medicinal herbs,may all beings be freed from the suffering of the four hundredand four illnesses,
cn: 以奉五藥。願⼀切眾⽣遠離四百四種病苦。

en: and may the medicine of compassion free them from theillnesses of the three poisons.
cn: 以⼤悲藥解三毒病。

en: Through my offering you the five essences,may all beings possess the essence of suchness.
cn: 以奉五精華。願⼀切眾⽣具⾜真實性藏。

en: Through my offering you the five perfumes, may all the stainsof distraction of all beings
cn: 以奉五味。願⼀切眾⽣以禪定⽔淨諸散逸垢。

en: satisfied.
cn: 喜樂意⾜。

en: I offer to the precious, supreme beingsThe sky embellished with the sun, moon, planets,
cn: 虛空⽇⽉星曜虹。華雲並與朝霧等。

en: Stars, rainbows, lovely clouds, and plumes of mist,And more as well, my mind truly sincere.And mountains that yield all we need and want.Such other buildings that are like great mansions.Bedecked with beautiful embellishments.The attractive, beauteous buildings there may be.And streamers, curtains, strings of flags, and such.Conch, beryl, crystal, coral, and all gems.Lakes, ponds, pools, springs, and other waters, too.A wonderful variety for the senses.With inconceivable taste and potency.Prepared well from the finest ingredients.And all the pleasurable things he has.And all the wondrous things that they possess.Their seven precious articles and armies.And wearing gems and precious jewelry.Who roam the forests and the mountainsides.And all great mounts there are in every world.And all the lovely birds who sing sweet song.As well as natural things that are unclaimed.And all the beautiful music there may be.
cn: 極莊嚴⽽意爽朗。奉予珍寶勝⼠夫。

en: The supreme mountain, lesser peaks, snow mountains,
cn: ⾼廣⼭與眾丘壑。雪⼭藥⼭寶⼭等。

en: And more as well, my mind truly sincere.And mountains that yield all we need and want.Such other buildings that are like great mansions.Bedecked with beautiful embellishments.The attractive, beauteous buildings there may be.And streamers, curtains, strings of flags, and such.Conch, beryl, crystal, coral, and all gems.Lakes, ponds, pools, springs, and other waters, too.A wonderful variety for the senses.With inconceivable taste and potency.Prepared well from the finest ingredients.And all the pleasurable things he has.And all the wondrous things that they possess.Their seven precious articles and armies.And wearing gems and precious jewelry.Who roam the forests and the mountainsides.And all great mounts there are in every world.And all the lovely birds who sing sweet song.As well as natural things that are unclaimed.And all the beautiful music there may be.Herb-bearing mountains, and great hills of gems,
cn: 隨願所⽣⼀切⼭。奉予珍寶勝⼠夫。

en: The precious earthen ground that ripens crops,
cn: 珍寶⼤地稻穀熟。林苑廟宇殿堂等。

cn: 猶似王城圓滿聚。奉予珍寶勝⼠夫。

en: I offer to the precious, supreme beingsAll of the wondrous and best palaces
cn: ⼤越量宮有涼亭。⾨樓牌坊眾寶嚴。

cn: 佛殿並與皇宮殿。房舍鄉鎮市城國。

en: I offer to the precious, supreme beingsAll kinds of decorations—canopies,
cn: 華蓋傘幢與⾶幡。飄帶搖曳幡旗縵。

cn: ⾦銀銅鐵與珍珠。琉璃硨磲與⽔晶。

cn: 珊瑚等⼀切妙寶。奉予珍寶勝⼠夫。

en: I offer to the precious, supreme beingsAll unpolluted water with eight traits—
cn: ⼤海河⽔與溪流。湖池⽔塘與泉眼。

en: I offer to the precious, supreme beingsAll of the fragrant and delicious grains,
cn: 稻穀草芽與⽔果。具⾹味滋養有情。

en: I offer to the precious, supreme beingsAll healing medicines that there may be—
cn: 旃檀⿓腦紅花等。味與⼒⽤不思議。

cn: ⼀切除病之藥相。奉予珍寶勝⼠夫。

en: I offer to the precious, supreme beings
cn: 勝⾷材緣善調和。嚼⾷啖⾷舔及飲。

cn: 世間勝⾷盡無餘。奉予珍寶勝⼠夫。

en: I offer to the precious, supreme beings
cn: 世間最極華美⾐。勝妙著⾝極柔美。

cn: 各式無量盡所有。奉予珍寶勝⼠夫。

en: I offer to the precious, supreme beingsThe ruler of the gods, his vassal kings,
cn: 三⼗三天與梵天。俊美男⼥眾圍繞。

cn: 受⽤妙欲之⼀切。奉予珍寶勝⼠夫。

en: I offer to the precious, supreme beingsAll demigods, all nagas, yakshas, and
cn: 阿修羅⿓及藥叉。乾達婆王男⼥等。

cn: 眷屬受⽤盡稀妙。奉予珍寶勝⼠夫。

en: I offer to the precious, supreme beingsAll of the universal emperors
cn: 轉輪王⾃在⼈王。后妃皇⼦七珍寶。

cn: 驍勇軍隊盡所有。奉予珍寶勝⼠夫。

en: I offer to the precious, supreme beingsAll lesser monarchs and all men and women,
cn: 邦國及凡夫男⼥。童男童⼥著華服。

cn: 彼等眾寶所嚴飾。奉予珍寶勝⼠夫。

en: I offer to the precious, supreme beings
cn: 獅⼦⽜王⼤⼒等。⿅王美麗獸畜等。

cn: ⾏於茂林⼭路眾。奉予珍寶勝⼠夫。

en: I offer to the precious, supreme beingsAll swift and powerful conveyances
cn: 駿⾺⼤象與⾞乘。世間最勝之駕⾞。

en: And more as well, my mind truly sincere.And mountains that yield all we need and want.Such other buildings that are like great mansions.Bedecked with beautiful embellishments.The attractive, beauteous buildings there may be.And streamers, curtains, strings of flags, and such.Conch, beryl, crystal, coral, and all gems.Lakes, ponds, pools, springs, and other waters, too.A wonderful variety for the senses.With inconceivable taste and potency.Prepared well from the finest ingredients.And all the pleasurable things he has.And all the wondrous things that they possess.Their seven precious articles and armies.And wearing gems and precious jewelry.Who roam the forests and the mountainsides.And all great mounts there are in every world.And all the lovely birds who sing sweet song.As well as natural things that are unclaimed.And all the beautiful music there may be.Like horses, elephants, and chariots,
cn: ⼒⾜速⾏彼⼀切。奉予珍寶勝⼠夫。

en: I offer to the precious, supreme beingsGaruda kings and kalavingka birds,
cn: 鵬⿃王迦陵頻伽。孔雀杜鵑⿈鴨鶴。

en: And more as well, my mind truly sincere.And mountains that yield all we need and want.Such other buildings that are like great mansions.Bedecked with beautiful embellishments.The attractive, beauteous buildings there may be.And streamers, curtains, strings of flags, and such.Conch, beryl, crystal, coral, and all gems.Lakes, ponds, pools, springs, and other waters, too.A wonderful variety for the senses.With inconceivable taste and potency.Prepared well from the finest ingredients.And all the pleasurable things he has.And all the wondrous things that they possess.Their seven precious articles and armies.And wearing gems and precious jewelry.Who roam the forests and the mountainsides.And all great mounts there are in every world.And all the lovely birds who sing sweet song.As well as natural things that are unclaimed.And all the beautiful music there may be.And cranes and peacocks, cuckoos, ruddy geese,
cn: 悅⽿美妙眾⿃禽。奉予珍寶勝⼠夫。

en: I offer to the precious, supreme beings
cn: 天⼈受⽤受持者。無受持諸⾃然物。

en: And more as well, my mind truly sincere.And mountains that yield all we need and want.Such other buildings that are like great mansions.Bedecked with beautiful embellishments.The attractive, beauteous buildings there may be.And streamers, curtains, strings of flags, and such.Conch, beryl, crystal, coral, and all gems.Lakes, ponds, pools, springs, and other waters, too.A wonderful variety for the senses.With inconceivable taste and potency.Prepared well from the finest ingredients.And all the pleasurable things he has.And all the wondrous things that they possess.Their seven precious articles and armies.And wearing gems and precious jewelry.Who roam the forests and the mountainsides.And all great mounts there are in every world.And all the lovely birds who sing sweet song.As well as natural things that are unclaimed.And all the beautiful music there may be.What gods and humans enjoy as their own,
cn: 所有堪能妙受⽤。奉予珍寶勝⼠夫。

en: The external world, its palaces, and mansions,
cn: 外器世間越量宮。內情眾⽣化現類。

en: And more as well, my mind truly sincere.And mountains that yield all we need and want.Such other buildings that are like great mansions.Bedecked with beautiful embellishments.The attractive, beauteous buildings there may be.And streamers, curtains, strings of flags, and such.Conch, beryl, crystal, coral, and all gems.Lakes, ponds, pools, springs, and other waters, too.A wonderful variety for the senses.With inconceivable taste and potency.Prepared well from the finest ingredients.And all the pleasurable things he has.And all the wondrous things that they possess.Their seven precious articles and armies.And wearing gems and precious jewelry.Who roam the forests and the mountainsides.And all great mounts there are in every world.And all the lovely birds who sing sweet song.As well as natural things that are unclaimed.And all the beautiful music there may be.Its denizens, various beings and emanations,
cn: ⼀切美妙之樂⾳。奉予珍寶勝⼠夫。

en: And all the beings that there are throughout space
cn: 我之⼀切⾝與財。等虛空際有情眾。

en: I pray that you accept us with compassion and protect us.
cn: 盡⼀切供勝⼠夫。⼤悲納受祈救怙。

en: I pour oceans of the drinking water of study,Strew everywhere the flowers of brilliant awareness,
cn: 善聞供⽔海妙遍。鮮豔智花盡盛放。

en: Waft the scents of the incense of pure discipline,
cn: 清淨律儀薰煙冒。說法燈⽕啟⽩晝。

en: Pour the scented water of debate that cleanses faults,Lay out the hundred-flavored food of meditation,
cn: 辯證滅過塗⾹滿。禪定百味神饈設。

en: And play the sweet tune of elegant composition.
cn: 著作善韻悅⽿樂。聖眾欣悅此等供。

en: To the great lama, the victors, and their children—To all the venerable sources of refuge.
cn: 無上師佛菩薩眾。堪供救怙⾏供養。

en: I offer this to the succession of Kagyus,Who make the vehicles of cause and result
cn: ⼀如最勝導師教。因乘果乘於諸⼟。

en: You have the supreme marks; your face, a stainless moon.You have the great marks and a face like the stainless moon.You have the supreme marks; your face, a stainless moon.Your color is like gold; I prostrate to and praise you.
cn: 稽⾸我佛真⾦⾊。相好最上⾯如⽉。

en: Immaculate, there’s none like you in the three worlds.worlds.Immaculate, there’s none like you in the three worlds.You’ve great and peerless wisdom; I praise and prostrate to you.
cn: 功德智慧無等倫。永離三有常清淨。

en: Your fame resounds throughout the three worlds.Your fame resounds throughout all the three worlds.We prostrate to and praise you, the supreme protector.
cn: 名聞三界⾳悠遠。禮讚尊勝怙主尊。

en: The Victor’s body is a stainless moon.The Victor shines the light of a thousand suns.
cn: 佛⽉清淨。滿⾜莊嚴。佛⽇暉曜。放千光明。

en: The Victor’s eyes are stainless lotuses.The Victor’s teeth, immaculate lotus roots.
cn: 如來⾯⽬。最上明淨。⿒⽩無垢。如蓮華根。

en: The Victor’s qualities are like an ocean
cn: 功德無量。猶如⼤海。

en: The Victor, an ocean filled with wisdom’s waters,Is wholly filled with millions of samadhis.
cn: 智淵無邊。法⽔具⾜。百千三昧。無有缺減。

en: Two wheels are drawn upon the Victor’s feetWith outer rims, a thousand spokes as well.
cn: ⾜下平滿。千輻相現。

en: The Victor, stainless, golden king of mountains,
cn: 光明晃耀。如寶⼭王。微妙清淨。如鍊真⾦。

en: I prostrate to the Buddha, lord of mountains.
cn: 所有福德。不可思議。佛功德⼭。我今敬禮。

en: Tathagata, like the moon, a moon in water,
cn: 佛真法⾝。猶如虛空。應物現形。如⽔中⽉。

en: Illusory and mirage-like, nothing clings.I prostrate to the Victor, free of stains.
cn: 無有障礙。如焰如化。是故我今。稽⾸佛⽉。

en: Your body, beyond measure or count,Is equal to space—indestructible,
cn: 其⾝無量數。亦如虛空處。

en: Through my long practice of discipline,Through my long practice of discipline,Morality, and austerityMorality, and austerity
cn: 我修戒律儀，⻑夜常勤⾏，

en: Through my past diligence,Through my past diligence,Always stable and outstanding,Always stable and outstanding,
cn: 我昔常忍辱，忍諸惡眾⽣，

en: So that all beings may be liberated,So that all beings may be liberated,May the Dharma long blaze!May the Dharma long blaze!
cn: 為眾除煩惱，令法久熾然。

en: Through my constant patience and discipline,Through my constant patience and discipline,And my patience with abuseAnd my patience with abuse
cn: 我昔勤精進，堅固常伏他，

en: By beings degraded by kleshas,By beings degraded by kleshas,May the teachings remain for a long time
cn: 度脫諸眾⽣，令法久熾然。

en: Through the power of my meditationThrough the power of my meditation
cn: 我修禪解脫，無⾊三摩提，

en: And through my past teaching of many shastras,And through my past teaching of many shastras,May the Dharma long blaze!May the Dharma long blaze!
cn: 演說無量論，令法久熾然。

en: Through my having given, out of love,Through my having given, out of love,
cn: 我昔常憐愍，捨⼰⾝⾎⾁，

en: Establishing them in the three vehicles,Establishing them in the three vehicles,
cn: 安置於三乘，增⻑正法施。

en: Through my having in the past with meansThrough my having in the past with meansAnd wisdom freed beings from inferior viewsAnd wisdom freed beings from inferior views
cn: 我昔智⽅便，度脫諸惡⾒，

en: And established them in the authentic view,And established them in the authentic view,May Dharma flourish.May Dharma flourish.
cn: 安置於正慧，法⾬令不絕。

en: Through my having freed beings from the kleshas’ fireThrough my having freed beings from the kleshas’ fireThrough the four means of nurturing;Through the four means of nurturing;
cn: 我昔以四攝，救度諸眾⽣，

en: And through my increasing their virtue and defeat of evil,And through my increasing their virtue and defeat of evil,May my assembly long remain.May my assembly long remain.
cn: 滅惡煩惱⽕，令四眾久住。

en: Through my liberation of tirthikasThrough my liberation of tirthikas
cn: 我昔除外道，諸惡邪⾒網，

en: Had others do from ignorance.Due to our carelessness and impure conduct.And anything that we have forgotten.
cn: ⾃作或教作。於此祈安忍。

en: We beings of bad times with little merit,Polluted by ignorance and the afflictions,
cn: 惡劫眾福薄。無名煩惱染。

en: Had others do from ignorance.Due to our carelessness and impure conduct.And anything that we have forgotten.Have not fulfilled the wishes of the nobles ones:
cn: 聖者意不滿。於此祈安忍。

en: We’re overcome by stinginess, unskilled,So our offerings are poor and badly arranged.
cn: 持吝無嫻熟。劣供陳設薄。

en: Had others do from ignorance.Due to our carelessness and impure conduct.And anything that we have forgotten.Protectors who have great compassion,
cn: 怙主具⼤悲。於此祈安忍。

en: Had others do from ignorance.Due to our carelessness and impure conduct.And anything that we have forgotten.
cn: 不⾏極迷惑。於此祈安忍。

en: We also beg your patience withOur adding things and leaving things out,
cn: 餘剩及不⾜。儀軌⽀弱敗。

en: Had others do from ignorance.Due to our carelessness and impure conduct.And anything that we have forgotten.Our spoiling parts of the ritual,
cn: 吾之健忘等。於此祈安忍。

en: With the intention to kindly and repeatedly
cn: 復以悲憫吾等意趣數數駕臨。

en: in samsara or nirvana throughout the three times, may I and allbeings
cn: ⼀切善業。功德迴向。⼀切有情。

en: May I benefit all beings with my speech.
cn: 語利益⼀切眾⽣。

en: May thoughts of pride, jealousy, gain, position,fame, renown, and this life never arise.
cn: 我慢。忌妒。欲求。敬奉。聲譽。名望。

en: love, compassion, and bodhichitta,
cn: 此⽣⼼思不⽣。慈⼼。悲⼼。菩提⼼澤潤眾⽣⼼續。

en: and may I become a spiritual friend equal to space.
cn: 願⼤師善知識眾等似虛空。

en: mahamudra.
cn: 願我於此⽣得獲最勝⼤⼿印成就。

en: May I become familiar with the utterly clear mind essenceand the utterly clear dharmata
cn: 與極明⼼性。瑩澈法性同⾏。

en: and then achieve the supreme siddhi of mahamudra either at
cn: 願於臨終中陰必定獲得⼤⼿印成就。

en: May the blessings of the Dharma lord, the sun, the victor,
cn: 最尊最上無上⼤勝師。法王如⽇如來⽽加被。

en: Subdue our harmful enemies, the maras and obstructors!May we always dwell in glorious good fortune day and night!May we always dwell in glorious good fortune day and night!May we always dwell in glorious good fortune day and night!
cn: 寂滅魔害障難之怨敵。願具靈瑞晝夜恆吉祥。

en: May the blessings of the nectar of the truth of genuine Dharma,
cn: 法性勝義無上尊勝法。真實正法⽢露⽽加被。

en: May we always dwell in glorious good fortune day and night!May we always dwell in glorious good fortune day and night!May we always dwell in glorious good fortune day and night!Subdue the foe, the torments of afflictions and suffering!
cn: 息滅煩惱苦痛憂惱敵。願具靈瑞晝夜恆吉祥。

en: May the blessings of the truth of bodhisattvas’ helpful deeds,
cn: 功德珍寶輝耀聖僧眾。佛⼦利⽣勝義⽽加被。

en: May we always dwell in glorious good fortune day and night!May we always dwell in glorious good fortune day and night!May we always dwell in glorious good fortune day and night!Free us from any moral flaws and make our virtue flourish!
cn: 遠離過患福善盡增盛。願具靈瑞晝夜恆吉祥。

en: May there be the auspiciousness of the benevolent gods;
cn: 梵天帝釋護法所加被。利⽣⽽成天⼈之吉祥。

en: accomplished,And may we have long lives, good health, comfort, andhappiness!
cn: 福樂妙善如意念成就。願具弘壽無病與福樂。

en: Pristine pervasive awareness,Inseparable ground and wisdom,
cn: 本來極淨普覺性，基智無有離合中，

en: Knowing how things are and all there is,You’ve achieved the dharmakaya: I pray that you live long.
cn: 如所智盡所智者，證顯法⾝祈⻑壽。

en: Rid of the two veils’ darkness, you are loving,Non-composite, glorious, spontaneous presence.
cn: ⼆障暗除悲⼼住，無為任運所成德，

en: Buddha’s regent in Tibet: I pray that you live long.
cn: ⼒等功德所源主，雪域佛紹祈⻑壽。

en: Your rupakaya, indivisible from it, is newly revealed.
cn: 從質1無礙⾃性明，⾊⾝無離新顯現，

en: Inconceivable magic of the five certainties,Pervasive, perfect source of the coemergent: I pray that you livelong.
cn: 五定2不思議化現，遍圓俱⽣祈⻑壽。

en: Inexhaustible, ornamental wheel of unlimited appearances;Great source of all that tames each;
cn: 任顯無盡莊嚴輪，任伏如數眾源尊，

en: Unrivaled ornament of the three realms;Emanated guide of beings: I pray that you live long.
cn: 三界無⽐唯⼀嚴，化顯眾導祈⻑壽。

en: Source of buddhas, you’ve taken countless intentional births.
cn: 無量佛源3如意⼒4，

en: Fearless, peerless, glorious lord, armored with
cn: 離懼無⽐勝吉祥，

en: Unrivaled generosity: I pray that you live forever.
cn: 施甲無匹祈⻑壽。

en: You distinctly see the great ground of morality.You are the master of your actions.
cn: 如似廣境之⼤地，無紊智⾏⾃主者，

en: Lotus of morality: I pray that you live long.
cn: 無勤語權通萬法，戒成蓮華祈⻑壽。

en: Your vision is vast; you’ve studied oceans of dharma.Beings’ minds appear distinctly to you.
cn: 觀視經海之廣⽬，無紊明分眾⽣界，

en: With endless confidence, profound ocean of intelligence,
cn: 勇氣無盡深智海，忍圓無⽐祈⻑壽。

en: Arises unobstructed, inexhaustible wisdom of the ground
cn: ⼀切如實智深廣，無貪礙盡聚基道，

en: And path that liberates, ripens, frees, and cares for beings.Your commitment to diligence is firm: I pray that you liveforever.
cn: 解熟離持智⼀顯，精進昔誓祈⻑壽。

en: The greatest jewels among the wise and attained of Tibet,Glorious Atisha and Lobsang Drakpa, taught the four truths
cn: 雪域智成唯⼀嚴，聖阿底峽宗喀巴，

en: Far beyond even the slightest doubt about scripture andreasoning,
cn: 離細教理增益邊，多聞除魔離熟果，

en: Your resultant freedom and ripening are an unfathomable,boundless ocean.Splendid treasure of wisdom and love: I pray that you live long.
cn: 深廣⼤海測機無，予智慈德祈⻑壽。

en: The majesty continuously born from your three wheelsHas seated you on the fearless lion throne of dharma.
cn: 以之三輪常設德，無畏獅⼦之⾼座，

en: Effortlessly endowed with the royal primordial seven,You are the crown jewel of the teachings of all traditions.
cn: 元成七寶無勤住，無偏教之眾頂寶。

en: May his good intentions and aspirationsFor a wondrous new age of perfection
cn: 圓時新況勝絕妙，尊以善⼼祝禱詞，

en: Like the true words of sages’ aspirations,
cn: 周遍娑婆各⽅界，如同仙諦之禱詞，

en: May my prayers be fulfilled.
cn: 如祈之果願實現。直⾄未來⼀切劫，

en: Please always care for and protect me.
cn: 無離攝受常守護。

en: Encircled by a ring of snow mountain ranges,
cn: 北域雪⼭環繞境，藏地法住佛⼟中，

en: You are a treasure of compassion, the source of allThat benefits all beings and brings them happiness.
cn: 九⽣⼀切眾利樂，⽣源福⽥⼤悲藏，

en: You, Tenzin Gyatso, are the crown jewel of
cn: 觀世⾃在⼈形尊，釋教持者海眾之，

en: The oceans of those who uphold the Sage’s teachings.May you live unwaveringly until the end of existence.
cn: 頂嚴上師尊⾜蓮，永世不動祈安固。

en: powers,The lord of the world, Gyalwa Gyatso,
cn: 圓滿⼗⼒具德釋迦王，觀世⾃在佛海觀世⾳，

en: The essence of compassion, the Lake-Born Vajra,And all the sources of refuge grant good fortune here and now.
cn: ⼤悲主者蓮花⾦剛⾜，願諸皈境賜今時妙善。

en: The sun that shines brightly on the fortunate aeon of this realmAnd fulfills our hopes and benefit.
cn: 令此⼟光明善緣⽣起，⽽成我等希望具義者。

en: The glory that upholds the Victor’s teachings of scripture andrealization,You are the embodiment of the ocean of pervasive compassion.
cn: 佛法教證法理聖執持，悲⼼⼤海普遍⼤⾃性，

en: That fully possesses the activity of spontaneous power.
cn: 任運獲得灌頂之事業，頂禮持⾦剛尊噶瑪巴。註：丹增昆洽旺吉多傑(標記處)為達賴喇嘛為第⼗七世噶瑪巴所命之名「持教周遍⾃在⾦剛」⾳

en: The Karmapa’s successive births, a string of pearls,
cn: ⾏佛事業⽩⾊之光紋，歷代噶瑪轉世珍珠鬘，

en: You are skilled in properly upholding their examples.Glorious protector of beings, I pray that you live long.
cn: ⼀切⾏傳如理⽽執持，具德有情怙主常住世。

en: The fine silk of vast scriptures, draped and waving,Is beautified by the jewel of complete experience andrealization
cn: 廣⼤教之曼妙絹飄揚，殊勝覺證珍寶頂嚴飾，

en: May this great being, the victory banner of the teachings, livelong.
cn: 智慧⾦柄極堅固無變，勝⽣聖教法幢常住世。

en: You have received the treasury of instructions from manymahasiddhasSuch as the crown jewel of siddhas, Lhodrak Marpa, and others.
cn: 成就頂嚴洛札⾺巴等，成就⼤海⼝訣藏得獲，

en: Protector who sustains and spreads the siddhas’ teachings,
cn: 成就種性持增教之怙，勝成就壇城主常住世。

en: By embracing China, Tibet, and all other countries,
cn: 漢藏並與東⻄⽅諸域，隨所⾏作畢境攝諸⼟，

en: You have planted the seeds of all beings’ joy and goodness:
cn: 樹⽴眾⽣之善樂根本，圓滿法財善規得增⻑。

en: By the union of dharmata and interdependence, the nature ofthings;
cn: 上師本尊三寶真聖化，法性緣起雙運實質性，

en: And by the mighty strength of truthful words from a puremotivation:
cn: 清淨勝意真實語嚴詞，諸祈願處無勤任運成。

en: Your thousand rays of deeds strike the ground, disciples,
cn: 所知虛空遍智廣壇城，事業千光照射世間界，

en: Clearly illuminating all the Buddha’s teachings.Precious Kagyu gurus, I pray that you live long.
cn: 遍處明⽰如來之法教，祈願噶舉仁波切⻑壽。

en: Descendents of Naro and Maitripa, the Shangpa,Of Marpa the Translator’s close sons—the four great pillars—
cn: 那洛彌勒所傳⾹巴派，譯師⾺巴四柱諸⼼⼦，

en: Of Rechungpa, the Densa Kagyus, and other great beings
cn: 醫王叔侄惹瓊⼝傳派，

en: The Karmapas embody the activity of all buddhas.Great holder of the line of incarnations, I pray that you livelong.
cn: 總集諸佛事業噶瑪巴，願轉世持傳承者⻑壽。

en: Striking the vital points of bliss and emptiness, mahamudra,mixing, and phowa,And manifesting mahamudra of the nature, the secret path,
cn: 合牽樂空⼤印擊要害，捷徑實相⼤印得現證，

en: All great beings who uphold his lineage, I pray that you livelong.
cn: 超絕承侍上師跋絨派，願⼀切持教聖者⻑壽。

en: The meaning of all scriptures coalesced into one,Your wisdom mind is filled with the profound fivefoldinstructions.
cn: 佛典無餘意趣盡結集，甚深五分訣要溢⼼續，

en: The Drikungpas are unrivalled in holding their vows.
cn: 無與倫⽐戒勤⽌貢巴，願如⽇⽉⼆救怙⻑壽。

en: Adorned with the wondrous, amazing thirty-nine life stories,Majestic with the great dharma of the four jewels,
cn: 殊妙三九⾏傳成莊嚴，四妙寶法⽽成⼤威嚴，

en: The Taklungpas have reached the ultimate through theirdevotion.Shapdrung Rinpoche, I pray that you live long.
cn: 究竟虔敬具德達隆巴，祈願霞崇仁波切⻑壽。

en: The Drukpas are the great nest of the Snow Land’s siddhas.Gyalwang Drukchen, I pray that you live long.
cn: 雪域成就⼤巢雷⿓派，願佛王⼤⽵巴尊⻑壽。

en: Additionally, the Pakdru, Tsalpa, and Tropu Kagyu,The Mar, Yelpa, and Shugsep Kagyu, and others:
cn: 復⼜帕⽵采巴與綽普，瑪倉耶巴雅修噶舉等，

en: May the glorious lamas live long;May the glorious lamas’ lotus feet be firm.May happiness come to all throughout space.
cn: 祈願具德上師⾜堅固，畢竟等虛空眾皆福樂，

en: Swiftly to the state of buddhahood.May we and all others quickly reach buddahood.And swiftly be brought to buddhahood.Click here for Brief Offerings to the Protectors Bernakchen and Palden LhamoTEXTS TO RECITE AT TEACHINGS DURINGGathering merit and wisdom and purifying obscurations,May I and all others gather the accumulations, purifyobscurations,
cn: ⾃他無餘由積福淨障，願皆旋即登位⼊佛地。

en: Embodiment of all lords of the tenth stage,Shenpen Namrol, Padmasambhava,
cn: 利他化現蓮花⽣⼤⼠，薩惹哈與陸耶蔣秋等，

en: Saraha, Luyi Jangchub, and others:Renowned Karmapa, I pray that you live long.
cn: ⼗地⾃在總攝於⼀⾝，願稱名噶瑪巴者常住。

en: Lord of Dance, magic display of Vajradhara,You bear the great burden of the teachings
cn: 舞⾃在持⾦剛之幻⾝，觀世⾃在具德噶瑪巴，

en: Of the glorious Karmapa, who is Lokeshvara.
cn: 聖教嫻熟荷擔稱舉者，願持佛冠夏瑪巴常住。

en: You teach the true path to beings throughout space.
cn: 教⽰等虛空眾善妙道，祈願灌頂⼤司徒常住。

en: Glorious Vajradhara, lord of all families, magic displayOf Guru Rinpoche’s peerless regent Vairochana,
cn: 具德諸部遍主持⾦剛，無等上師攝政⽩若尊，

en: Jamgön Rinpoche, I pray that you live for a hundred kalpas.
cn: 化⾝南洲佛教之勝炬，願蔣貢上師百劫常住。

en: Emanations of Samantabhadra’s wisdom
cn: 普賢本智⼤悲之化⾝，⼗⽅佛⼟無緣之⼤悲，

en: Vast ocean of blessing, you hold
cn: 廣⼤成就本智之⽢露，總攝為⼀之聖化⼤海，

en: Truly Amitayus, through profound means of tamingYou remove all the obscurity that sullies beings’ minds,
cn: 無量壽尊隨化深⽅便，盡除眾⽣濁⼼之昏黯，

en: Skillfully bringing us to the end of the path to liberation.
cn: 善巧置於解脫善道頂，願導師最勝哲厚常住。

en: Through the power of praying with faith and devotion
cn: 如是精髓佛教⼤珍寶，護持弘揚聖者師尊眾，

en: The precious essence of the teachings,May all beings throughout space achieve perfect buddhahood.
cn: 願以信奉恭謹祈請⼒，願等虛空有情得正覺。

en: I supplicate that the lamas may be healthy.I supplicate that their lives be supremely long.
cn: 祈請上師⾝安康，祈請最殊勝⻑壽，

en: I supplicate that their activity spread and flourish.
cn: 祈請事業廣弘揚，加持與師不分離。

en: Swiftly to the state of buddhahood.May we and all others quickly reach buddahood.And swiftly be brought to buddhahood.Click here for Brief Offerings to the Protectors Bernakchen and Palden LhamoTEXTS TO RECITE AT TEACHINGS DURINGGathering merit and wisdom and purifying obscurations,May I and all others gather the accumulations, purifyobscurations,
cn: ⾃他積資淨障後，迅速安置於佛地。第⼗⼆章⼤祈願法會期間開⽰之念誦⽂

en: By acting generously and so forth,By acting generously and so forth,By acting generously and so forth,
cn: 以我布施等功德，為利眾⽣願成佛。念誦三次。

en: In the three times in worlds of ten directionsIn the three times in worlds of ten directionsIn the three times in worlds of ten directionsSincerely with my body, speech, and mind.Sincerely with my body, speech, and mind.
cn: 我以清淨⾝語意，⼀切遍禮盡無餘。

en: With all the victors right before my mind.With all the victors right before my mind.
cn: ⼀⾝復現剎塵⾝，⼀⼀遍禮剎塵佛。

en: Completely fill the entire dharma expanse.Completely fill the entire dharma expanse.
cn: 無盡法界塵亦然，深信諸佛皆充滿。

en: I also imagine offering to all victorsI also imagine offering to all victorsThat which is vast and unsurpassable.That which is vast and unsurpassable.
cn: 我以廣⼤勝解⼼，深信⼀切三世佛，

en: The lamps of the worlds of the ten directions—The lamps of the worlds of the ten directions—The lamps of the worlds of the ten directions—To turn the Wheel that cannot be surpassed.XVII. The Branch of Supplicating to RemainTo turn the Wheel that cannot be surpassed.To turn the Wheel that cannot be surpassed.
cn: 我今⼀切皆勸請，轉於無上妙法輪。

en: Slight merit I have gathered from prostrating,Slight merit we have gathered from prostrating,Slight merit I have gathered from prostrating,
cn: 所有禮讚供養福，請佛住世轉法輪，

en: And offering, confessing, and rejoicing,By thus aspiring for excellent conductOffering, confessing, rejoicing,And offering, confessing, and rejoicing,
cn: 隨喜懺悔諸善根，迴向眾⽣及佛道。

en: The ground is the powerful golden earth.
cn: 極清淨⼤⾃在⿈⾦之地基，

en: to the west Bountiful Cow,
cn: 東聖⾝洲、南瞻布洲、⻄⽜貨洲、北俱盧洲 (惡⾳洲)、

en: Deha and Videha,Chāmara and Avara,
cn: ⾝洲、聖⾝洲、拂洲、別拂洲、⼩⾏洲、勝道⾏洲、

en: Kurava and Kaurava,
cn: 俱盧洲、俱盧⽉洲(惡⾳洲、惡⾳⽉洲) 、寶⼭王、

en: the precious wheel, the precious jewel,the precious queen, the precious minister,
cn: 輪寶、如意寶、后妃寶、⾂寶、

en: the precious elephant, the precious horse,the precious general, the vase of great treasure,
cn: 象寶、⾺寶、將軍寶、鉅藏瓶、

en: the maiden of charm, the maiden of garlands, the maiden ofsong, the maiden of dance,the maiden of flowers, the maiden of incense, the maiden oflamps, the maiden of perfume,
the sun, the moon, the jeweled parasol,
cn: ⽇、⽉、寶傘、威攝⼗⽅尊勝幢，

en: more numerous than the atoms in infinite oceans.Return to the Offering to the Seven Tathagatas
cn: 此莊嚴羅列無量無邊塵數海，供養與

en: from the Lord of All Families, Great Vajradhara, who is called
cn: 遍主⾦剛總持無別之具德淨妙上師，若稱其名諱即為：

en: the glorious and good,
cn: 尊前，

en: When requesting empowerment:When requesting a transmission:
cn: 灌頂時：為祈求賜與能使成熟之甚深灌頂⽽作此供。

en: When requesting a transmission:
cn: ⼝傳時：為祈求開⽰⼤乘妙法⽢露⽽作此供。

en: as an offering in thanksgiving for the kindness
cn: 若是祈壽時獻供：為祈蓮⾜劫海永固，

en: and that you continuously turn the Wheel of profound and vastDharma.
cn: 常轉深廣正法輪⽽作此供。

en: For a long life offering:as an offering in thanksgiving for the kindness
cn: 如於祈壽時：為酬謝圓滿納受祈求蓮⾜劫海永固，

en: We pray you accept this compassionately for the sake of beings.
cn: 祈以⼤慈憫，為眾⽣義⽽納受，受已祈求賜與加持。

en: So that all beings enjoy a perfectly pure realm.
cn: 觀為佛國作供獻，有情咸受清淨剎。

en: In accordance with the thoughtsIn accordance with the thoughts
cn: ⼤乘⼩乘與共乘，悉皆祈請轉法輪。

en: All wanderers from the ocean of existenceAll wanderers from the ocean of existenceChurned by great waves of birth, age, sickness, and death.
cn: ⽣⽼病死洶湧之波濤，願度眾⽣解脫輪迴海。

en: Sole source of benefit and happiness,
cn: 利樂唯⼀所⽣源，教法⻑久住於世，

en: And may the beings who uphold the teachingsHave lives as steadfast as a victory banner.
cn: 持守正教⼤師眾，⾝壽幢幡恆永固。

en: Karmapa who embodies the compassion of all buddhas,Karmapa who unites the activity of all buddhas,
cn: 諸佛悲⼼總集噶瑪巴，諸佛事業總集噶瑪巴，

en: Karmapa who is empowered as the regent of all buddhas,We pray that Ogyen Drodul Trinley live long.
cn: 諸佛傳承灌頂噶瑪巴，鄔⾦卓都欽列敬祈請。

en: Lamas, yidams, dakinis, protectors of the Dharma,
cn: ⼗⽅四世諸佛與菩薩，上師本尊空⾏護法眾，

en: I bow respectfully with body, speech, and mind.
cn: 以⾝語意⾄誠⽽頂禮，以外內密真如⽽供養，

en: And regret for present non-virtues, so I confess them fully.
cn: 現前不善我今皆悔過，往後不復造罪我⽴誓，

en: Gatherings of Victors, without passing to nirvana,
cn: ⼀切福德善業皆隨喜，諸佛如來住世不⼊涅，

en: I dedicate all virtue to wandering beings.
cn: 祈轉三藏無上之法輪，眾善無餘迴向眾⽣⼼，

en: Buddhas and your children, think of me.
cn: 願眾⽣⾄無上解脫地。懇請諸佛菩薩鑑知我，

en: Just as Samantabhadra and his childrenAnd the noble Manjushri have known
cn: 以我所著此妙善願⽂，猶如普賢如來與佛⼦，

en: May I train following all of their examples.
cn: ⽂殊菩薩眾等所知曉，盡諸⼀切我願皆隨學。

en: May the precious lamas, splendor of the teachings,Pervade everything like space.
cn: 聖教祥瑞諸上師珍寶，願如虛空遍滿諸⽅所，

en: Be harmonious, disciplined and rich with the three trainings.
cn: 聖教根基僧伽⼤珍寶，⼼合戒淨願廣博三學。

en: May the essence of the teachings, practitioners of the secretmantra,
cn: 聖教⼼髓密咒實修部，願具誓戒⽣圓得究竟。

en: May the kings who protect Dharma, the sponsors of theteachings,Have increasing power and benefit the teachings.
cn: 聖教施主護法諸君王，治政廣⼤願護持佛教。

en: May nobles and ministers, servants of the teachings,Increase in intelligence and have power.
cn: 聖教侍從王統諸⾂⼦，願智慧廣具⾜眾能巧。

en: May the vast countries, faithful to the teachings,Have happiness and may their problems be pacified.
cn: 信奉聖教廣⼤眾國⼟，願具福樂息滅諸障礙。

en: Our commitments and accomplish our intentions.
cn: ⾏法道上我等瑜伽⼠，願無犯戒所願皆成就。

en: Be cared for by the Victors temporarily and ultimately.
cn: 任何於我有善惡緣者，現前究竟願佛皆攝持。

en: May all wanderers enter the gate of the highest vehicleAnd attain the great kingdom of Samantabhadra.
cn: 眾⽣安住無上乘之⾨，願能獲得普賢⼤江⼭。

en: By the merit of being generous, and so forth,
cn: 以我布施等功德，為利眾⽣願成佛。

en: Above the crown of myself and all beingsThroughout all space, on a white lotus
cn: 我等遍虛空有情，頭頂⽩蓮⽉輪上，

en: Bright white and shining lights of five colors.
cn: 舍字化成聖觀⾳，⽩⾊明淨五光燦，

en: His smile is handsome, his gaze compassionate.
cn: 莊嚴微笑悲眼視，四臂⾸對為合掌，

en: The lower two hold a crystal mala and white lotus.He is bedecked with silks and precious jewelry.
cn: 晶珠⽩蓮後⼆持，綢緞瓔珞珠寶飾，

en: He wears a deerskin upper robe,And Amitabha graces his crown.
cn: ⿅⽪於肩做披飾，無量光佛為頂嚴，

en: A stainless moon supports his back.
cn: 雙⾜⾦剛跏趺坐，背倚無垢滿⽉帷，
攝諸皈依處⾃性。

en: Unstained by faults, your body is white.A perfect buddha crowns your head.
cn: 淨極無瑕⼤悲⾝，阿彌陀佛頂上嚴，

en: Your eyes view beings compassionately.I bow to Avalokiteshvara.
cn: 慈眼悲憫視眾⽣，頂禮觀世⾳菩薩，

en: From praying thus one-pointedly, light shinesFrom the Arya’s body and purifies the impure
cn: 以我專誠祈求⼒，從聖者⾝放光明，

en: Karmic appearances and confused mind.
cn: 淨諸惡業及煩惱，娑婆頓成妙淨⼟，

en: The body, speech and mind of the beings withinBecome Chenrezik’s body, speech, and mind—
cn: 有情眾⽣⾝⼝意，悉成觀⾳⾝⼝意，

en: The appearance of my own and others’ bodies is the Arya’sbody.Sounds that resound are the melody of the six syllables.
cn: ⾃他⾝相皆是聖者⾝，⼀切⾳聲悉為六字明，

en: Accomplish Noble Chenrezik.
cn: 願我迅速以此善，成就觀⾳⼤⼠尊，

en: May I bring every sentient being,The Lamp Prayer
cn: ⼀切眾⽣盡無餘，悉登彼等之聖位。

en: world realm of the great Three Thousands.
cn: 願燈具成為等同三千⼤千世界，

en: May its oil fill the surrounding oceans.
cn: 願燈炷僅成須彌⼭王，願燈油僅成汪洋，

en: In number, may a hundred million appear before each andevery buddha.
cn: 此燈之數，億盞得現於每尊佛前，

en: of the ten directions so they are clearly seen.
cn: 皆得顯明親⾒。

en: I offer this amazing, wonderful, bright lampTo the one thousand buddhas of this fortunate aeon
cn: 稀有光明此燈燭，供獻賢劫千佛等，

en: And gatherings of deities in the mandalas
cn: 無餘廣⼤⼗⽅境，師尊空⾏護法眾，

en: My parents in the fore, may every sentient being
cn: 壇城聖眾盡奉獻。⽗⺟為⾸有情眾，

en: In this lifetime and all the places they take birthSee the pure realms of the perfect buddhas directly
cn: 此⽣以及各所⽣，皆能親⾒佛淨⼟，

en: And the deities of the Three Roots I’ve made this prayer.
cn: 吾等如此所發願，祈請加被速得成。
